1a1(khri brgyad): @##/ /khri brgyad ga pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi
1b2(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa lnga pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
1b3(khri brgyad): s ems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par
1b4(khri brgyad): bgyi| ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji
2a1(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das
2a2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs ya ma brla dang / gzugs gsog
2a3(khri brgyad): dang | gzugs snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
2a4(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa ya ma brla dang /
2a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa gsog dang / rnam par shes pa snying po med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad
2b1(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ zhes zer ba ni/ nam mkha'
2b2(khri brgyad): ltar stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ji ltar
2b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par bgyi/ zhes zer ba ni/ nam mkha' ltar stong pa nyid bsgom pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
2b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la yun ring po ji srid cig tu spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
2b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa| rab 'byor/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /de ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
3a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci sems kyi rgyun ma chad cing / ma bral bar rjes su 'brel pas spyad par bgyi lags sam/ bka' stsal
3a3(khri brgyad): pa| rab 'byor/ yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi go skabs mi dbye bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /rnam
3a4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa mi dor bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya zhing / shes rab kyi pha
3a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang sems dang sems
3a6(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i chos rnams mi rgyu ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /de ltar mngon par bsgrub par
3b1(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de ltar bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b2(khri brgyad): pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin
3b3(khri brgyad): no| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ma bsgoms pas lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na bsgoms kyang bsgoms
3b4(khri brgyad): la| ma bsgoms kyang ma bsgoms pas lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na bsgoms pa'ang ma lags/ ma bsgoms
3b5(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma lags pas lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
3b6(khri brgyad): lags| bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /gsol pa/ de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba bzhin no/ /
3b7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi
4a1(khri brgyad): khams ji lta ba dang / sems can gyi khams ji lta ba dang / srog gi khams ji lta ba dang / gang zag gi khams ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
4a2(khri brgyad): 'das| bdag gi khams dang / gang zag gi khams kyi bar dag ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ bdag gam sems can dag dmigs
4a3(khri brgyad): su yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor| bdag gam sems can dmigs su med
4a4(khri brgyad): na| ji ltar sems can gyi khams gdags par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar sems can du 'dogs par mi byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang 'dogs par mi byed/
4a5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad du'ang 'dogs par mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdags
4a6(khri brgyad): su ma mchis pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
4a7(khri brgyad): pa'ang gdags su ma mchis pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gdags su ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes
4b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdags su med pa yin no/ /'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ chos thams cad kyi bar dag kyang
4b2(khri brgyad): gdags su med pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad gdags su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du sems can dmyal ba
4b3(khri brgyad): gdags su mchis par gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas gdags su mchis par gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gdags su mchis par gyur/ mi dang lha gdags su mchis par gyur/ rgyun
4b4(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdags su ma mchis par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das
4b5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can du gdags pa dmigs su yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal
4b6(khri brgyad): pa| rab 'byor/ sems can dmigs su med na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / dgra
4b7(khri brgyad): bcom pa'i bar dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag ji ltar gdags par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
5a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ de ltar gdags su med pa'i chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na byang chub
5a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la bslab par bgyi lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
5a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa la bslab par bgyi lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs la dor ba med
5a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dor ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
5a5(khri brgyad): 'das| ji ltar dor ba ma mchis pa dang / bsnan pa ma mchis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ skye ba
5a6(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'gag pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gzugs la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis par bslab par bgyi/
5a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis par bslab par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mngon
5b1(khri brgyad): par 'du bya ba med pa ste/ 'du byed rnams bsgom par yang mi bya/ gzhig par yang mi bya bar bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis par bslab
5b2(khri brgyad): par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mthong bas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
5b3(khri brgyad): 'das| chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par ji ltar bslab par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong par blta'o/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong
5b4(khri brgyad): par blta'o/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong par blta'o/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyis stong par blta'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong par blta'o/ /
5b5(khri brgyad): mig gi bar ni mig gis stong par blta'o/ /yid kyi bar ni yid kyis stong par blta'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
5b6(khri brgyad): bar ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong par blta'o/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ni 'gog
5b7(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong par blta'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong par blta'o/ /byang chub kyi bar ni byang chub kyi bar gyis
6a1(khri brgyad): stong par blta ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslab par bya'o//
6a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / byang chub kyi bar yang byang chub kyi bar gyis stong lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na byang chub sems
6a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par ji ltar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ spyod pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du spyod pa ma mchis pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bka'
6a5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa'ang mi dmigs/ gang la spyod pa dang / gang
6a6(khri brgyad): gis spyod pa dang / gang du spyod pa de'ang mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ de gang la spyod pa de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
6a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te spyod pa ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags na/ bcom
6b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'o na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la
6b2(khri brgyad): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de ltar mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad la bslab par bya zhing / des sbyin pa
6b3(khri brgyad): sbyin pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /tshul khrims srung ba na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o/ /bzod pa sgrub pa na mi dmigs pa'i
6b4(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bzod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus rtsom pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa na mi dmigs pa'i
6b5(khri brgyad): tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /shes rab sgom pa na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom par bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
6b6(khri brgyad): du'ang de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na mi dmigs par 'gyur/ ji tsam gyis na dmigs par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ji tsam du gnyis
6b7(khri brgyad): yod pa de tsam du dmigs pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni mi dmigs pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mig dang gzug
7a1(khri brgyad): kyi bar dang / yid dang chos kyi bar dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni gnyis so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis su
7a2(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mig dang gzugs kyi bar du med pa dang / yid dang chos rnams kyi bar du med pa dang / byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du med pa ste/
7a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ni gnyis su med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci dmigs su ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/ 'on te gnyis su mchis pa mi dmigs lags
7a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dmigs su yod pas mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ dmigs su med pas mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/ rab 'byor/ 'on kyang dmigs su yod
7a5(khri brgyad): pa dang | dmigs su med pa mnyam pa nyid ni dmigs su med pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med
7a6(khri brgyad): pa mnyam pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /gsol
7a7(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ gsal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ dmigs pa la mi chags shing / mi dmigs pa
7b1(khri brgyad): la'ang mi chag pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji ltar sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/
7b2(khri brgyad): sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas kyang ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
7b3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni dmigs pa la gnas shing sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
7b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dmigs pa la gnas nas/ sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dmigs
7b5(khri brgyad): su med la/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med cing / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'ang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
7b6(khri brgyad): chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang dmigs su ma mchis/ byang chub
7b7(khri brgyad): kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa de'ang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
8a1(khri brgyad): la spyod pas ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos thams cad la 'di ni gzugs so/ /'di ni tshor ba'o/ /'di ni 'du shes so/ /'di ni 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni rnam
8a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa'o/ /'di ni byang chub kyi bar ro/ /zhes ji ltar rab tu rnam par dbye bar bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
8a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ji ltar byas pas gzugs dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par 'gyur ba de ltar
8a4(khri brgyad): chos rnams la rab tu rnam par 'byed par mi byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
8a5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi bar du'ang mi dmigs la gnas na/ 'o na ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
8a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs par bgyis shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
8a7(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis nas kyang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur lags /
8b1(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor
8b2(khri brgyad): lo bskor bar 'gyur lags/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur lags/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas kyang sems can rnams 'khor
8b3(khri brgyad): ba las yongs su thar par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
8b4(khri brgyad): mi spyod do/ /byang chub kyi bar gyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8b5(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi ched du'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
8b6(khri brgyad): mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma byas pa/ chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang ma byas pa dang /
8b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med pa yin la/ byang chub kyang ma byas pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa yin zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang ma byas pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/
9a1(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /gsol
9a2(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad ma bgyis pa dang / 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa
9a3(khri brgyad): dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'di dag rnam par dgod par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ma byas pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i chos
9a4(khri brgyad): rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa gang yang dmigs su med de/ mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par bsags pa'i chos rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa dmigs su
9a5(khri brgyad): yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni phung po lnga la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs kyi phung po la mngon par zhen par byed/ rnam
9a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i phung po'i bar la mngon par zhen par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su byed/ gzugs
9a7(khri brgyad): la dmigs par byed/ byang chub kyi bar la rlom sems su byed/ byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par byed pa'i phyir te/ de 'di snyam du bdag mthong na bdag ni byang chub mngon par
9b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs dang /
9b2(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi bar gang yin pa dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan lngas kyang ma dmigs na/ skyes bu blun po sangs rgyas la skur pa 'debs pa de dag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las
9b3(khri brgyad): yongs su thar par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
9b4(khri brgyad): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan lngas kyang sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba dag ma dmigs
9b5(khri brgyad): lags na/ 'o na nga bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams yang dag pa nyid du nges
9b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / log pa nyid du nges pa dang / ma nges pa'i phung po gsum du lung bstan par mdzad lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ngas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b7(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'am/ log pa nyid du nges pa'am/ ma nges pa'i sems can 'ga' yang ma dmigs mod kyi/ rab 'byor /
10a1(khri brgyad): 'on kyang sems can rdzas med pa la rdzas su 'du shes pa 'di dag ngas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yang dag pa ma yin pa la 'jig pa de las bzlog gi /don dam
10a2(khri brgyad): par ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas don dam pa la bzhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
10a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ 'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
10a4(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags bsam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te don dam pa la bzhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
10a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
10a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
10a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur lags grang / bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
10b1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
10b2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/ de ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams
10b3(khri brgyad): gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang la'ang mi gnas
10b4(khri brgyad): mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / sdod pa dang / 'dug pa'ang yod la/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
10b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
10b6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
10b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nang
11a1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin
11a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po la sgom zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur la/ sprul pa des kyang
11a3(khri brgyad): sems can dpag tu med pa dag sprul nas/ phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des sems can 'ga' yang phung po gsum du
11a4(khri brgyad): lung bstan pa yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sprul pa
11a5(khri brgyad): lta bur mkhyen te/ sprul pa de lta bur mkhyen nas sems can gang yang btul ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs
11a6(khri brgyad): pa'i sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad sprul ba lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan
11a7(khri brgyad): 'das| de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sprul ba la bye brag ni ci mchis/ tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis/ dgongs pa ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
11b1(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni bye brag ci'ang med de/ tha dad du bya ba ci'ang mi
11b2(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni bye brag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las gang
11b3(khri brgyad): mdzad pa de ni sprul pa'ang byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul ba sug las bgyid lags sam/
11b4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug las ji ltar bgyid lags/
11b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' ma dmigs nas/ sprul pa sprul nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /
11b6(khri brgyad): sprul ba des kyang phyi na bskal pa las lhag par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/ des phyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das 'da'o/ /zhes skye bo rnams kyis
11b7(khri brgyad): kun tu shes kyang sprul pa la ni skye ba med/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
12a1(khri brgyad): cad sprul ba lta bur mos par bya zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te sprul pa dang / de bzhin
12a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa la bye brag ma mchis na/ sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar yang ji ltar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba
12a3(khri brgyad): de dag ni phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du nam yang bas par mi 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan
12a4(khri brgyad): ' das| de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis sprul ba la yon phul ba de dag kyang phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
12a5(khri brgyad): par gyur gyi bar du na ma yang bas bar mi 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha dang bcas
12a6(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos nyid de nyid kyis sprul pa'ang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
12a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog gi /rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
12b1(khri brgyad): byams pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed na/ de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byams
12b2(khri brgyad): pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa lta'ang zhog gi / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas shing nam mkha' la me tog snyim pas gtor
12b3(khri brgyad): na| de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa dang ldan pas yid la byed pa lta'ang zhog /nam
12b4(khri brgyad): mkha' la me tog snyim pas gtor ba lta'ang zhog gi / rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar byed na/ de dag thams cad kyang rim
12b5(khri brgyad): gyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba ni de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar phan yon che ba yin te/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
12b6(khri brgyad): des na 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid tshad mar byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bye brag cung zad kyang med par rigs par bya ste/ rab
12b7(khri brgyad): 'byor| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /chos rnams kyi chos nyid la zhugs nas/ chos nyid de'ang rnam par dkrugs
13a1(khri brgyad): par mi bya ste/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid do/ /zhes rnam par dkrugs par mi bya'o/ /chos
13a2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi bar dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par mi bgyi lags na/ bcom ldan
13a3(khri brgyad): 'das| gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni gzugs so/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa'i bar ro zhes bgyi ba dang / de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang bka' stsal/
13a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma
13a5(khri brgyad): lags pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang bka' stsal te/ rnam par dkrugs par mdzad na/ de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams kyi
13a6(khri brgyad): chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par ma gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin te/ ngas ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis khong du chud par 'gyur zhes ming
13a7(khri brgyad): dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan te/ chos rnams brjod par zad kyi/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs pa ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
13b1(khri brgyad): 'das| gal te gzhan dag gis khong du chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang mtshan mas chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan te/ chos rnams brjod pa mdzad na/ bcom
13b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos rnams ji ltar ming dang mtshan ma sa brjod pa mdzad lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ brjod pa ni ming dang mtshan ma
13b3(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor/ gzhan du na sdug bsngal nyid brjod par zad de/ ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
13b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ni ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ gal te ming la ming mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/ mtshan ma la mtshan ma mngon
13b5(khri brgyad): par zhen par 'gyur na ni/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur la/ mtshan ma med pa'ang mtshan ma med pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa'ang
13b6(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' la mngon par zhen
13b7(khri brgyad): par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings kyang chos kyi dbyings la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ 'di
14a1(khri brgyad): ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam du zad pas/ de dag ming tsam la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14a2(khri brgyad): pos de ltar ming dang mtshan ma tsam lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya zhing / de la'ang mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
14a3(khri brgyad): gal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas pa lags na/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi ched du byang chub tu sems bskyed par
14a4(khri brgyad): bgyid cing / byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang 'du byed sna tshogs rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sbyin pa stsol ba dang /
14a5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid la bsgom
14a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang /
14a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa dang / de bzhin
14b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod gang 'di skad du
14b2(khri brgyad): gal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas na/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyid ces zer ba ni/
14b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du zad la/ ming dang mtshan ma de dag kyang ming dang mtshan mas stong ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
14b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo
14b5(khri brgyad): skor bar byed la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang / sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed kyang / ming dang mtshan ma de dag skye
14b6(khri brgyad): ba'ang med/ 'jig pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
14b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces gsung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad
15a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ces nga smra'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyang bka' stsal cing / de bzhin gshegs
15a2(khri brgyad): pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces mdor yang bka' stsal la/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ thams
15a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum po 'di dag la bye brag ni ci mchis tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thams cad shes pa nyid ni
15a4(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa
15a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad
15a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags/ ci'i slad du
15a7(khri brgyad): thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ phyi nang gi chos gang dag ji snyed pa de dag
15b1(khri brgyad): thams cad ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shes la/ lam thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
15b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
15b3(khri brgyad): pos ni lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing / lam thams cad shes par bya dgos te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang
15b4(khri brgyad): yin pa'i lam de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos la/ lam de dag gis lam gyi bya ba byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
15b5(khri brgyad): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par mi bgyi zhing / des yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi bgyi lags sam/ bka'
15b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa| rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par
15b7(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon
16a1(khri brgyad): sum du bgyid lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na lam ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/ bka'
16a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na lam dang lam ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin no//
16a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na lam yang ma lags/ lam ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin no//
16a4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji
16a5(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ khyod lam la gnas te/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
16a6(khri brgyad): so| |bka' stsal pa/ 'o na lam ma yin pa la gnas te'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'o na lam dang / lam ma yin pa la gnas
16a7(khri brgyad): te'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'o na khyod lam yang ma yin/ lam ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa la
16b1(khri brgyad): gnas te/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang la
16b2(khri brgyad): gnas te'ang zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi sems ni ji ltar gang la'ang mi gnas pas sems rnam par grol lags
16b3(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ci la'ang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon
16b4(khri brgyad): sum du bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste/
16b5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam pas so/ /rab 'byor/ yang rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gi chos rnams stong zhes bya bar brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag
16b6(khri brgyad): dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
16b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum po 'di
17a1(khri brgyad): dag las 'di'i spong ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'o/ /'di'i spong ba ni lhag ma ma mchis pa'o/ /zhes bgyi bar nyon mongs pa spang ba la tha dad du bgyi ba
17a2(khri brgyad): mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nyon mongs pa spang ba la ni tha dad pa med mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad
17a3(khri brgyad): spangs pa yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad
17a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'dus ma bgyis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma bgyis
17a5(khri brgyad): la bye brag dmigs su mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin te/ 'dus ma byas la ni bye brag dmigs su med do/ /gsol
17a6(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'dus ma bgyis la bye brag dmigs su ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
17a7(khri brgyad): ba spangs pa yin no/ /'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa ma yin no zhes bka' stsal lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
17b1(khri brgyad): ba ni nyon mongs pa ma yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba'ang yod mod kyi/ lus kyi 'gyur ba'ang 'byung ste/ de dag ni
17b2(khri brgyad): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos rnams la'ang ma yin te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
17b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te lam yang dngos po ma mchis la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang dngos po ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du 'di ni rgyun du
17b4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bshad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
17b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad
17b6(khri brgyad): ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci 'dus ma bgyis te/ 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
17b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag lags so/ /zhes rab tu 'byed par bgyid lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas ni rab tu 'byed par mi byed mod kyi 'on kyang 'jig rten
18a1(khri brgyad): gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te brjod par zad kyi/ don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la tshig gi lam gyis gdags su
18a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyi ma'i mtha' ji ltar gdags lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te/ gang dang gang
18a3(khri brgyad): dag gis mtha' chad pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mthar gdags kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa
18a4(khri brgyad): la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs lags na/ phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos
18a5(khri brgyad): thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs na/ phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'on kyang sems
18a6(khri brgyad): can gang dag gis chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes pa de dag la 'di ni sngon gyi mtha'o/ /'di ni phyi ma'i mtha'o zhes bstan par zad kyi/ rab 'byor/ rang
18a7(khri brgyad): gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang
18b1(khri brgyad): gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa ni nang ngam/ phyi'am/ 'dus byas
18b2(khri brgyad): sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
18b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das
18b4(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol dam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes
18b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
18b6(khri brgyad): chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas na/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
18b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang don dam par chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i don gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
19a1(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir de bzhin
19a2(khri brgyad): nyid kyang chud/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang chud/ chos kyi dbyings kyang chud pas/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
19a3(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni chos gang dang yang ldan pa ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bstan du yod pa'am/ bstan du med pa'am/ thogs pa dang bcas pa'am/ thogs pa med pa'ang ma
19a4(khri brgyad): yin no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan
19a5(khri brgyad): nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad la spyod par byed cing / spobs pa thams cad dang / snang ba thams cad sbyin par
19a6(khri brgyad): byed pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / nyan thos
19a7(khri brgyad): dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis mi chod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhan mu stegs can phyir rgol ba'i bar dag gis kyang chod par
19b1(khri brgyad): mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gcod par byed pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis gcad pa dang / bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
19b2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
19b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi don la spyad par bya'o/ /
19b4(khri brgyad): bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal shes pa'i don dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don dang / 'gog pa shes pa'i don dang / lam shes pa'i don dang / zad pa shes
19b5(khri brgyad): pa'i don dang / mi skye ba shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o/ /chos shes pa'i don dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i don dang / kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang / yongs su 'dris pa shes pa'i
19b6(khri brgyad): don dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i don dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa'i don la spyad par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes
19b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la don dang tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
20a1(khri brgyad): gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la don dang / don ma lags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
20a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
20a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don la spyod pas 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/ 'dod chags bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par
20a4(khri brgyad): mi bya'o| |zhe sdang bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/ /gti mug bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/ /'dod
20a5(khri brgyad): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/ /log par lta ba bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar
20a6(khri brgyad): spyad par mi bya'o/ /lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi bar du bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
20a7(khri brgyad): dang | gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang don kyang mi byed la/ gnod pa'ang mi byed pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang don kyang mi byed la/ gnod pa'ang
20b1(khri brgyad): mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/ /gzugs bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/ /
20b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o/ /byang chub bdag la gnod pa zhes spyad par mi
20b3(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang don tam/ gnod pa 'ga'
20b4(khri brgyad): yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /
20b5(khri brgyad): chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa 'di ni gang la'ang don tam/ gnod pa ci'ang mi byed de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20b6(khri brgyad): chen pos de ltar don dang / gnod pa rnam par spangs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
20b7(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don kyang mi bgyid/ gnod pa'ang mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
21a1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang mi byed pas/ rab 'byor/ de'i phyir
21a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la'ang don dang gnod pa mi byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma bgyis ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos
21a3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa rnams kyi don yin
21a4(khri brgyad): mod kyi/ gang la'ang phan ba'am/ gnod par nye bar gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang phan pa'am/ gnod
21a5(khri brgyad): par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang la'ang phan pa'am/ gnod par
21a6(khri brgyad): nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/
21a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
21b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dus ma byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin
21b2(khri brgyad): no| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
21b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na
21b4(khri brgyad): gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na gnyis su ma mchis
21b5(khri brgyad): pa'i chos kyis gnyis su mchis pa'i chos 'thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur lags/
21b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir gnyis kyi chos sam/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs na/ de ltar dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
21b7(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos gnyis kyi zhu ba mang po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //shes rab
22a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi bcu drug pa/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
22a2(khri brgyad): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
22a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni sems can yang mi dmigs la/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs par sems can rnams kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par
22a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pas dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' rten ma mchis pa la
22a5(khri brgyad): y al ga 'gel ba bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal ba lags
22a6(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
22a7(khri brgyad): 'jug cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rtogs nas kyang / sems can thams cad chags pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ dper
22b1(khri brgyad): na| mi zhig yal ga 'gel ba bskyed par 'dod la/ mi des yal ga 'gel ba des rtsa ba'ang mi shes/ yal ga'i mdog dang / lo ma dang / me tog kyang mi shes bzhin du/ des yal ga 'gel ba de'i
22b2(khri brgyad): sdong bu bskyed de/ bskyed nas kyang dus dus su srung zhing chus bran de/ rim gyis sdong bu de'i yal ga'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/ lo ma'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/ me tog kyang phun sum tshogs
22b3(khri brgyad): par gyur/ 'bras bu'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas/ de sdong bu de'i lo ma rnams la spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi
22b4(khri brgyad): ched du| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa de'ang rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lo ma dang / me
22b5(khri brgyad): tog dang / 'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i lo ma lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las yongs
22b6(khri brgyad): su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i me tog lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /
22b7(khri brgyad): khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar
23a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
23a2(khri brgyad): la 'god par byed do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par byed do/ /rang byang
23a3(khri brgyad): chub la 'god par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la brten nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
23a4(khri brgyad): nas kyang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag de la yon 'bul ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/
23a5(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
23a6(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la sems can yang mi dmigs shing sems can du gdags pa'ang med la/ sems can de dag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa las yongs
23a7(khri brgyad): su grol bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i sems can nam/
23b1(khri brgyad): sems can du gdags pa ci'ang 'di na mi dmigs so/ /zhes de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
23b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad
23b3(khri brgyad): du zhe na| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad
23b4(khri brgyad): rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dman pa'i
23b5(khri brgyad): 'gro ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i khams thams
23b6(khri brgyad): cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23b7(khri brgyad): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
24a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
24a2(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
24a3(khri brgyad): bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
24a4(khri brgyad): bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /zhes gang smras pa
24a5(khri brgyad): ni| rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin
24a6(khri brgyad): nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa gdags pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'phags pa thams cad du gdags pa dang / de
24a7(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid de nyid kyis gzugs su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus
24b1(khri brgyad): ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gdags pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ ci'i
24b2(khri brgyad): phyir| de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid 'di la gnas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin
24b3(khri brgyad): nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/
24b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin
24b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par 'gyur zhing / dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems
24b6(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba'ang shes par 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba shes na/ smon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /smon nas shes pa yongs
24b7(khri brgyad): su rdzogs na dus gsum shes pa rnam par dag par byed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum shes pa rnam par sbyangs na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed par
25a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs na rnam pa thams cad
25a2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum po
25a3(khri brgyad): dag la 'god par 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la bkod nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zla bar 'gyur te/
25a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang / phan yon thams cad mthong bas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
25a5(khri brgyad): bskyed par bya zhing / gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
25a6(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ lha
25a7(khri brgyad): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang
25b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya
25b2(khri brgyad): ba'i gnas yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par
25b3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
25b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyis la gnas par gyur tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas
25b5(khri brgyad): par gyur na/ ci sems can de dag bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dpag tu
25b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ tshad ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa
25b7(khri brgyad): pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i
26a1(khri brgyad): dngos po gang yin pa 'di gnyis la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de
26a2(khri brgyad): n i sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi
26a3(khri brgyad): 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nyan
26a4(khri brgyad): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
26a5(khri brgyad): pa pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rab
26a6(khri brgyad): 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen
26a7(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni sems
26b1(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams lta zhog
26b2(khri brgyad): gi/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni sems
26b3(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa
26b4(khri brgyad): dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du zhugs par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa
26b5(khri brgyad): de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong
26b6(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni byang
26b7(khri brgyad): chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
27a1(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la zhugs par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
27a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro zhing / rgyu dang / dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems
27a3(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci zhig yid la bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27a4(khri brgyad): chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ni ci lta bu zhig lags/ dmigs pa ni ci zhig
27a5(khri brgyad): lags/ dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/ rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/ mtshan nyid ni gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med
27a6(khri brgyad): pa| mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'byung ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ khyod kyis 'di skad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni ci
27a7(khri brgyad): zhig lags/ dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/ rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/ mtshan nyid ni gang lags zhes zer ba la/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos
27b1(khri brgyad): po med pa'o/ /dbang byed pa ni dran pa'o/ /rnam pa ni zhi ba'o/ /mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni de yin no/ /dbang byed pa ni de yin
27b2(khri brgyad): no| |rnam pa ni de yin no/ /mtshan nyid ni de yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ 'on te gzugs kyang dngos
27b3(khri brgyad): po ma mchis shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang dngos po ma
27b4(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
27b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
27b6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
27b7(khri brgyad): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
28a1(khri brgyad): dang | btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa dang po dang / mngon par shes pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / 'dus
28a2(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos
28a3(khri brgyad): po med do/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar
28a4(khri brgyad): du'ang dngos po med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la ni ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
28a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la 'dus pa las byung
28a6(khri brgyad): ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa de dngos po med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ yang chos thams cad ni stong pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams
28a7(khri brgyad): cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid do/ /chos
28b1(khri brgyad): thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
28b2(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
28b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bgyid la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs
28b4(khri brgyad): su smin par bgyid/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
28b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang / byams pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med/ 'du
28b6(khri brgyad): shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nang stong pa nyid nas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
28b7(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i bar dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
29a1(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
29a2(khri brgyad): brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bgyid la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su
29a3(khri brgyad): smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams la yongs su 'dris par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs
29a4(khri brgyad): su dag par byed la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
29a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi
29a6(khri brgyad): lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi
29a7(khri brgyad): lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub
29b1(khri brgyad): kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la
29b2(khri brgyad): spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed la/ byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
29b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa de ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
29b4(khri brgyad): dang | byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid du byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/
29b5(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni byang chub kyi lam yin te/ de byang chub kyi lam 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ skad
29b6(khri brgyad): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad ni mi skye ba'i spong
29b7(khri brgyad): bas spong bar 'gyur ro/ /des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par bltas nas dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na/ dngos por lta ci
30a1(khri brgyad): smos| rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
30a2(khri brgyad): spyad par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po'ang mi dmigs na/ dngos po med pa lta ci smos te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
30a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/
30a4(khri brgyad): dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do/ /len pa por yang rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do/ /sbyin
30a5(khri brgyad): pa por yang rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs shing mtshan mar mi byed la/ dmigs
30a6(khri brgyad): par mi byed de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed do/ /rnam pa
30a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed cing / rnam par mi rtog la yid la mi byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
30b1(khri brgyad): bar du'ang dmigs par mi byed cing mtshan mar mi byed do/ /gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
30b2(khri brgyad): de'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ dngos po med pa de'ang sangs rgyas rnams
30b3(khri brgyad): dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas shing / chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/ byed pa po dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos rnams chos
30b4(khri brgyad): rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos rnams ni chos rnams dang bral ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
30b5(khri brgyad): 'das/ gal te chos rnams kho na chos rnams dang bral ba lags na/ bral ba'i chos kyis bral ba'i chos dngos po mchis pa'am/ dngos po ma mchis par ji ltar 'tshal bar rung ste/ dngos po
30b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang / dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang / dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung / dngos po ma mchis
30b7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos kyis kyang / dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang / dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung lags na/ de ltar ma 'tshal ba'i
31a1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston par lta ga la 'gyur/ bcom
31a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/ dngos po yod pa zhes bya ba'am/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston gyi/ don dam par
31a3(khri brgyad): ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig lags la/ don dam pa'ang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten gyi
31a4(khri brgyad): kun rdzob kyang gzhan ma yin la/ don dam pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/ de bzhin nyid de sems
31a5(khri brgyad): can de dag gis mi shes shing ma mthong bas/ de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis dngos po yod pa'am/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston to/ /rab 'byor/ yang
31a6(khri brgyad): sems can 'di dag ni phung po lnga po 'di dag la dngos por 'du shes shing dngos po med par mi shes te/ ji ltar byas na dngos po med pa rtogs par 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/ de dag gi don
31a7(khri brgyad): du chos rnams rab tu dbye ba'i phyir de ltar ston par byed de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /shes rab
31b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
31b2(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de
31b3(khri brgyad): gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol
31b4(khri brgyad): ba| bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi spyod pa de gang la spyod lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / tshor
31b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i chos rnams stong ngo zhes spyod
31b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
31b7(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
32a1(khri brgyad): stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi
32a2(khri brgyad): pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang
