32a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong ngo zhes
32a4(khri brgyad): spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / dbang po lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / stobs lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /
32a5(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin
32a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong ngo zhes
32a7(khri brgyad): spyod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / spobs pa rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / yi ge sgrub pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / yi ge rnams la 'jug pa stong ngo
32b1(khri brgyad): zhes spyod pa dang / yi ge rnams med pa la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes
32b2(khri brgyad): spyod pa ste/ ci nas byang chub la gnyis su mi 'byed pa de ltar rjes su spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ byang chub
32b3(khri brgyad): kyi phyir spyod pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/
32b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
32b5(khri brgyad): yang des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang des yang dag pa'i don rtogs pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /
32b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ yang chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub byang chub ces
32b7(khri brgyad): bgyi na/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags
33a1(khri brgyad): so| |de ni yang dag pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub ces bya ba
33a2(khri brgyad): de ni ming tsam gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub kyi don ni yang dag pa'i don to/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
33a3(khri brgyad): pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/ de'i
33a4(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
33a5(khri brgyad): rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
33a6(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod
33a7(khri brgyad): pa lags na/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa'am/ 'grib pa'am/ nyams pa'am/ 'phel ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar
33b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub
33b2(khri brgyad): 'di la spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de ni chos gang yang bsags pa'i phyir ram/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nyams par bya ba'i
33b3(khri brgyad): phyir ram/ 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/ bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/ dgag pa'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
33b4(khri brgyad): na| rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni bsags pa'i phyir ram/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nyams par bya ba'i phyir
33b5(khri brgyad): ram/ 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/ bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/ dgag pa'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye
33b6(khri brgyad): bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang la'ang
33b7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
34a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
34a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
34a3(khri brgyad): la spyod pa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / de bzhin
34a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i bar la spyod pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po dag la spyod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
34a5(khri brgyad): kyis las shin tu 'da' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
34a6(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /
34a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la mi spyod do/ /gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ de
34b1(khri brgyad): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su
34b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod la/ de
34b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa
34b4(khri brgyad): ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi sa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
34b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gang dag gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
34b6(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gnyis la brten pa ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad de/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis su
34b7(khri brgyad): mi spyod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel
35a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pas 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /mi dge ba gang dag gis zil
35a2(khri brgyad): gyis non par gyur pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur zhing / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dag gis kyang 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis 'phrogs pas sbyin
35a3(khri brgyad): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam
35a4(khri brgyad): par 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang
35a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor/
35a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin la/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol
35a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas sam/ dge ba'i
35b1(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
35b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
35b3(khri brgyad): yongs su zin pas ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
35b4(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
35b5(khri brgyad): mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
35b6(khri brgyad): de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams
35b7(khri brgyad): cad yongs su 'dzin te/ bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su 'dris par byas nas/ yid kyi rjes su rtog par byed la/ lta bas shin tu rtogs par byed cing gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ /
36a1(khri brgyad): gzungs thob nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed nas de tshe brdas nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du
36a2(khri brgyad): nam yang chos de dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed par byed de/ dge ba'i
36a3(khri brgyad): rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su zin pas gzhan yang ngan song rnams dang / mi khom pa rnams su mi skye zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang bsam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
36a4(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bzung bas kyang dge ba'i bshes
36a5(khri brgyad): gnyen rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos gang dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i bsngags ba brjod
36a6(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang nam du'ang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
36a7(khri brgyad): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang yongs su bzung bar bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang bsten par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
36b1(khri brgyad): las| dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa dang bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i thabs kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
36b2(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur mi bgyid cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
36b3(khri brgyad): dag kyang mi bskyed la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags sam/
36b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
36b5(khri brgyad): ma bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
36b6(khri brgyad): la'ang bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang bsten du zin kyang / da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus na/ sangs
36b7(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la ma bsten par rnam pa thams cad
37a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob pa lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
37a2(khri brgyad): bsnyen bkur bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37a3(khri brgyad): chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
37a4(khri brgyad): nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir te/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de ma thos la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
37a5(khri brgyad): ma bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang ma bsten pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs la mkhas pa
37a6(khri brgyad): gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
37a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sbyin
37b1(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang /
37b2(khri brgyad): mir gyur ba rnams dang / mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas de sbyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i 'du
37b3(khri brgyad): shes su mi 'gyur/ len pa po la'ang len pa po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/ sbyin pa po la'ang sbyin pa po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi
37b4(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid kyis stong pa dang / yongs su ma grub pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la'ang 'jug ste/ chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing /
37b5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par
37b6(khri brgyad): 'phel na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed
37b7(khri brgyad): la| 'khor ba na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su longs spyod pa gang yin pa'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i
38a1(khri brgyad): phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
38a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis tshul khrims de srung ste de 'dod chags kyi sems dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / byang chub la
38a3(khri brgyad): bgegs byed pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos gang yang rung ba/ 'di lta ste/ ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / dman pa'i sems
38a4(khri brgyad): dang | 'khrul pa'i sems dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems dang / nga rgyal dang / brnyas pa dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal lam/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
38a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sems kyis bsgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad ma byung ba dang / yongs
38a6(khri brgyad): su ma grub pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/ chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan
38b1(khri brgyad): nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
38b2(khri brgyad): kyis rnam par 'phel na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs
38b3(khri brgyad): su dag par byed la/ 'khor ba na tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/ gzhan du na sems can rjes su bzung ba dang sems
38b4(khri brgyad): can la mi gnod pa dang / sems can la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ tshul khrims kyi le'u zhes
38b5(khri brgyad): bya ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / //de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang
38b6(khri brgyad): sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ rnam pa thams
38b7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis shes rab sgom par byed de/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi sems kyis bsgrib par
39a1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing chos thams cad ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma
39a2(khri brgyad): grub pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/ chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
39a3(khri brgyad): la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par 'phel na/ shes rab kyi pha
39a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la 'khor ba na
39a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su dgrol
39a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ rnam par 'phel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med
39b1(khri brgyad): pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/ rnam par smin pa'ang yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs la mkhas
39b2(khri brgyad): pa gang dang ldan na/ bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes pa nas/ mngon par ma grub pa'i bar du
39b3(khri brgyad): shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sems dang po bskyed pa nas
39b4(khri brgyad): bzung ste/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang bsgom pas spong ba'i lam la spyod kyang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi byed do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
39b5(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de
39b6(khri brgyad): dag la'ang spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las kyang 'da' ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa
39b7(khri brgyad): yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing / mthar gyis
40a1(khri brgyad): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mi 'gyur zhing / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob
40a2(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes pa nas chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i bar du shes pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
40a3(khri brgyad): 'byor| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
40a4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / snying rje chen po la'ang 'dres par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par ma byas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas kyi
40a5(khri brgyad): bar du'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// //
40a6(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
40a7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing rnam par smin pa'ang len par mi bgyid pa ni/ blo'i mchog
40b1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang
40b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa'ang len par mi byed pa ni/ blo'i mchog dang ldan pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
40b3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dngos po
40b4(khri brgyad): med pa las mi g.yo ba'o/ /rab 'byor| khyod 'di skad du/ ngo bo nyid gang las mi g.yo ba lags zhes zer ba ni/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
40b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
40b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
40b7(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
41a1(khri brgyad): dang | mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje chen po'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
41a2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /gsol
41a3(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol
41a4(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci dngos pos dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam/ bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma
41a5(khri brgyad): yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam/ bka' stsal
41a6(khri brgyad): pa| rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das/ dngos pos dngos po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar rngo thogs lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
41a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po mngon par mi rtogs shing / dngos pos kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon
41b1(khri brgyad): par mi rtogs la/ dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs shing / dngos pos kyang dngos po mngon par rtogs pa ma lags na/ 'o na ni thob pa'ang ma mchis/ mngon
41b2(khri brgyad): par rtog pa'ang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mngon par rtogs pa ni yod mod kyi/ mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bzhis ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
41b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'o na mngon par rtogs pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar dngos po'ang ma yin zhing dngos po med pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba ni mngon par
41b4(khri brgyad): rtogs pa ste/ spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ gang la spros pa de dag med pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
41b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba
41b6(khri brgyad): dang / mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems
41b7(khri brgyad): dpa'i spros pa'i/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes
42a1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o//
42a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma
42a3(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
42a4(khri brgyad): spros pa'o/ /gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
42a5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
42a6(khri brgyad): bden pa yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /
42a7(khri brgyad): lam bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /
42b1(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
42b2(khri brgyad): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
42b3(khri brgyad): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom par bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni
42b4(khri brgyad): spros pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya
42b5(khri brgyad): ba ni spros pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi
42b6(khri brgyad): zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o//
42b7(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
43a1(khri brgyad): par bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa'o/ /de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
43a2(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed de/ gzugs rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa zhes spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do/ /tshor
43a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa zhes spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
43a4(khri brgyad): par bya'o snyam pa'i bar du spros par bya ba ma yin pa spros par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid kyis ni ngo bo nyid spros par mi byed cing / dngos po med pas kyang dngos po spros par
43a5(khri brgyad): mi byed la/ ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po med pa ma gtogs par yang gang gis spros par byed pa dang / gang spros par bya ba dang / cis spros par bya ba dang / gang la spros par bya ba gzhan
43a6(khri brgyad): ci'ang mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ de bas na gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du spros pa med cing / byang chub kyi bar du spros pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
43a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
43b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad spros pa ma mchis par ji ltar lta bar bgyid lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
43b2(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid med do/ /gang la ngo bo nyid
43b3(khri brgyad): med pa de la spros pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de'i phyir na gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du spros pa med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du spros pa
43b4(khri brgyad): med do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/ de skad ces bka'
43b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos gang la'ang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na/ ci byang
43b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ lam gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la
43b7(khri brgyad): 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
44a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug mod kyi/ 'on kyang
44a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad la bslabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dgra
44a3(khri brgyad): bcom pas lam thams cad la bslabs nas yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug mod kyi/ ji srid du lam gyi 'bras bu ma bskyed pa de srid du lam gyi skad cig la dgra bcom pa'i 'bras
44a4(khri brgyad): bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug mod kyi/ rdo
44a5(khri brgyad): rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur te/ de skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
44a6(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'
44a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags na ni brgyad pa'i lam
44b1(khri brgyad): yang gzhan kho nar 'gyur la/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i lam yang gzhan/ phyir mi 'ong ba
44b2(khri brgyad): la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam yang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa la zhugs pa'i lam yang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa'i lam yang gzhan/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam
44b3(khri brgyad): yang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam yang gzhan du mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te lam de dag phan
44b4(khri brgyad): t shun tha dad par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug
44b5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi 'tshal bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
44b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed pas brgyad par mi 'gyur lags grang / mthong ba'i lam bskyed pas rgyun du zhugs par mi 'gyur lags
44b7(khri brgyad): grang / bsgom pa'i lam bskyed pas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur lags grang / dgra bcom pa'i bar du'ang mi 'gyur lags grang /
45a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bskyed pas rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa'i lam
45a2(khri brgyad): bskyed pas brgyad par 'gyur ba'am/ brgyad par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa de ni gnas ma mchis shing skabs ma lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis
45a3(khri brgyad): lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du rgyun
45a4(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'am/ rang byang chub kyi bar du thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug ces bgyi ba de ni gnas ma
45a5(khri brgyad): mchis lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags na/ bcom
45a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ji ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub
45a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob cing / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ de skad ces
45b1(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
45b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po brgyad par gyur la/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas lam thams cad bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug ces bya ba ni gnas med do/ /skabs ma yin zhing de
45b3(khri brgyad): ni gnas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba de ni gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
45b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/ shes pa dang / mthong bas sa brgyad po dag la rnam par bltas nas 'da' bar byed de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di
45b5(khri brgyad): lta ste/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang /
45b6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ 'di ni sar bstan pa yin no/ /des shes pa dang / mthong bas sa brgyad po de dag las 'das par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/ byang chub sems
45b7(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ngo / /rab 'byor/ de la brgyad pa'i
46a1(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/ /lan gcig
46a2(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/ /dgra
46a3(khri brgyad): bcom pa'i shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'o/ /byang
46a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpas ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i
46a5(khri brgyad): skyon med pa la 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa
46a6(khri brgyad): thams cad spong ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
46a7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tshor bar 'gyur
46b1(khri brgyad): ro| |de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang / sangs rgyas
46b2(khri brgyad): kyi lam bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i lam gang lags pa 'di dag las bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi lam gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang
46b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bskyed par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni 'di yin te/ rnam pa
46b4(khri brgyad): gang dang gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dang gang dag dang / rtags gang dang gang dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de dag dang / mtshan ma de dang de dag dang /
46b5(khri brgyad): rtags de dang de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par rtogs nas kyang gzhan gdul ba'i phyir ci nas pha rol gyi
46b6(khri brgyad): khong du chud par gzhan dag la brjod par bya/ bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ gdags par bya/ dgod par bya'o/ /de la skad dang / brda dang / sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
46b7(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar 'gyur ba'i skad dang / brda dang / sgra thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsgrub par bya ste/ brag ca lta bur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
47a1(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
47a2(khri brgyad): bya'o| |lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes par bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam yang shes
47a3(khri brgyad): par bya/ rgyu'ang shes par bya/ 'bras bu'ang shes par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i lam de las bzlog par bya/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya/ 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /de
47a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam las kyang bzlog par bya/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya/ 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / klu
47a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/ rgyu'ang shes par bya/ 'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o/ /lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/ rgyu'ang shes
47a6(khri brgyad): par bya/ 'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i lam yang shes par bya/ rgyu'ang shes par bya/ 'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o/ /'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang /
47a7(khri brgyad): 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / 'du shes med pa rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/ rgyu'ang shes par bya/ 'bras
47b1(khri brgyad): bu'ang shes par bya'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/ rgyu'ang shes par bya/ 'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o/ /'du shes med/ 'du
47b2(khri brgyad): shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams kyi lam yang shes par bya/ rgyu'ang shes par bya/ 'bras bu'ang shes par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi shes par bya/ yang
47b3(khri brgyad): dag par spong ba bzhi shes par bya/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes par bya/ dbang po lnga shes par bya/ stobs lnga shes par bya/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes par bya/ 'phags pa'i lam
47b4(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid shes par bya/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa shes par bya/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa shes par bya/
47b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes par bya/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes par bya/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par
47b6(khri brgyad): bya| snying rje chen po shes par bya'o/ /lam de dag gis kyang sems can rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do/ /dgra
47b7(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do/ /rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni rang byang chub la 'god do/ /byang chub
48a1(khri brgyad): la dgod par bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub la 'god de/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yin te/
48a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la bslabs nas sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug go/ sems can gyi bsam pa la zhugs nas ci nas de'i chos bstan pa chud mi za zhing don
48a3(khri brgyad): yod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni pha rol gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa shin tu bye brag phyed cing / shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i
48a4(khri brgyad): phyir te/ des ni sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang dag la byang chub
48a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i lam thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48a6(khri brgyad): pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe
48a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams gang lags pa dang / byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag ldan
48b1(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la/ gzugs can yang ma lags/ bstan du'ang ma mchis/ thogs par yang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig
48b2(khri brgyad): pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ji ltar byang chub sgrub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs
48b3(khri brgyad): can yang ma lags/ bstan du'ang ma mchis/ thogs pa'ang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos ni gang la'ang sgrub pa'am/ 'jig par bgyid pa ma
48b4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du chos thams cad rang
48b5(khri brgyad): gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos gang yang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab
48b6(khri brgyad): 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni chos gang yang sgrub pa'am 'jig par byed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ sems can gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa
48b7(khri brgyad): de dag gi phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag ni byang chub bsgrub pa yin no zhes bstan to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang
49a1(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
49a2(khri brgyad): pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa
49a3(khri brgyad): dang | 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
49a4(khri brgyad): bar gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
49a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar du gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang
49a6(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi
49a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
49b1(khri brgyad): pas sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni
49b2(khri brgyad): thams cad la'ang shes pa dang / mthong bas bslab par bya'o/ /de la shes pa dang mthong bas ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas/ chos kha cig ni rtogs par bya/ chos kha cig ni rtogs par mi bya'o/ /
49b3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs nas rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/ rtogs par mi bgyi
49b4(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams ni gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ni shes pa dang mthong bas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
49b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes rab
49b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags
49b7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba
50a1(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la nyan thos dang / rang
50a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dod chags dang ldan
50a3(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'jig tshogs la
50a4(khri brgyad): lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /the tshom dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /tshul khrims dang brtul bzhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'ang
50a5(khri brgyad): ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i
50a6(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
50a7(khri brgyad): no| |bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /byams pa dang ldan
50b1(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /snying rje dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'ang ma
50b2(khri brgyad): yin| mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po'i
50b3(khri brgyad): bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
50b4(khri brgyad): chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs can ma yin zhing / bstan du med la/ thogs pa med cing / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs can ma yin pa de dag ni
50b5(khri brgyad): gzugs can ma yin pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /bstan du med pa rnams ni bstan du med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /
50b6(khri brgyad): thogs pa med pa rnams ni thogs pa med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin/
50b7(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /mtshan nyid med pa rnams ni mtshan nyid med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems
51a1(khri brgyad): d pa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol
51a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med cing / bstan du med la thogs pa med pa ste/ de la des bslabs na chos gang gis mtshan nyid kyang mi dmigs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
51a3(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
51a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
51a5(khri brgyad): reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams
51a6(khri brgyad): kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
51a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
51b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la
51b2(khri brgyad): bslab par mi bgyi/ byams pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan
51b3(khri brgyad): nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'phags
51b4(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab
51b5(khri brgyad): par mi bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa
51b6(khri brgyad): bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
51b7(khri brgyad): snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i
52a1(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'dus byas kyi
52a2(khri brgyad): khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi
52a3(khri brgyad): bgyi zhing / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid lam
52a4(khri brgyad): bslabs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis
52a5(khri brgyad): pa la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang ji ltar 'gyur lags/ rnam pa thams
52a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/ chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg
52a7(khri brgyad): pa chen po'i sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
52b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig gi mtshan nyid yod par gyur na ni mtshan nyid de la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya ba zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan
52b2(khri brgyad): nyid med pa/ gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid
52b3(khri brgyad): de dag la'ang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ snga na mtshan nyid yod la phyis mtshan nyid med par gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
52b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de dag ni snga nas kyang mtshan nyid med la/ da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya/
52b5(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid
52b6(khri brgyad): kyi khams de ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos
52b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji
53a1(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
53a2(khri brgyad): chen pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
53a3(khri brgyad): chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par rngo mi thogs la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par rngo
53a4(khri brgyad): mi thogs lags so/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par yang mngon par shes pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa ma bskyed
53a5(khri brgyad): par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi bgyi la sems
53a6(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par rngo mi thogs la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar rngo
53a7(khri brgyad): mi thogs lags so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par rngo mi thogs la/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang
53b1(khri brgyad): dgod par rngo mi thogs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/ dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang dgod par yang rngo mi thogs/ rang byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/ bla na med pa
53b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang sems can rnams dgod par rngo mi thogs/ /tshul khrims
53b3(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /de skad ces gsol
53b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med de/ mtshan
53b5(khri brgyad): nyid tha dad pa ma yin la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa la bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
53b6(khri brgyad): pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams
53b7(khri brgyad): cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
54a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/ bka' stsal ba/ gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
54a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /mig la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rna ba dang / sna
54a3(khri brgyad): dang | lce dang / lus dang / yid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
54a4(khri brgyad): pa'o| |sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /blang ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /dor ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /byams pa la bsgom pa rnam
54a7(khri brgyad): par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//
54b1(khri brgyad): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha
54b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched la bsgom pa rnam
54b3(khri brgyad): par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
54b4(khri brgyad): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang / dbyung ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi
54b5(khri brgyad): ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes
54b6(khri brgyad): dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
54b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /bdag tu 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / skye ba
55a1(khri brgyad): por 'du shes pa dang / shed las skyes par 'du shes pa dang / shed bur 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por
55a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes pa dang / byed du 'jug pa por 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /
55a3(khri brgyad): bde ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes
55a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
55a5(khri brgyad): brgyad pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
55a6(khri brgyad): bsgom pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
55a7(khri brgyad): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
55b1(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa
55b2(khri brgyad): dang / dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab
55b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sdug
55b4(khri brgyad): bsngal shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /kun 'byung ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
55b5(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /'gog pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /lam shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
55b6(khri brgyad): bsgom pa'o/ /zad pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /mi skye ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /chos shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rjes su rtogs pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes
56a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /kun rdzob shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /'dris pa shes pa la
56a2(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sgra ji bzhin shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sbyin
56a3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
56a4(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /
56a5(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i
56a6(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes
56a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgom pa
56b1(khri brgyad): rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /snying
56b2(khri brgyad): rje chen po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
56b3(khri brgyad): pa'o| |lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rang byang
56b4(khri brgyad): chub la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
56b5(khri brgyad): pa'o| |bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
56b6(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs la rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/ de bzhin du bag
56b7(khri brgyad): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
57a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
57a2(khri brgyad): pa na/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
57a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing / de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab
57a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ /bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dngos po yod ces
57a5(khri brgyad): bya bar mi sgom mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos por 'du shes pa la ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
57a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
57a7(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'di ltar de dngos po la chags kyi/ de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la ni chags par mi byed pa'i phyir ro//
57b1(khri brgyad): gang dngos po la 'di ni nga'o zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags pa de la ni thar pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ dngos por 'du shes pa la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
57b2(khri brgyad): sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa dang / dbang po sgom pa dang / stobs sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa dang / lam sgom pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma
57b3(khri brgyad): med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de dngos po la chags pa'i
57b4(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ni gang lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa
57b5(khri brgyad): ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gnyis ni dngos po'o/ /gnyis med pa ni dngos po med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis gang lags/
57b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs su 'du shes pa ni gnyis so/ /tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du shes su 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par
57b7(khri brgyad): shes par 'du shes pa dang / mig tu 'du shes pa nas yid du 'du shes pa'i bar dang / gzugs su 'du shes pa nas chos su 'du shes pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs
58a1(khri brgyad): rgyas su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub tu 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang / rab
58a2(khri brgyad): 'byor/ 'du shes ji snyed pa thams cad dang / 'du shes med pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis so/ /ji tsam du gnyis yod pa de tsam du dngos po yin no/ /ji tsam du dngos po yod
58a3(khri brgyad): pa de tsam du 'du byed do/ /ji tsam du 'du byed yod pa de tsam du sems can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chib dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
58a4(khri brgyad): dang | yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'grol lo/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis gnyis kyi 'du shes can la ni sbyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims med
58a5(khri brgyad): do| |bzod pa med do/ /brtson 'grus med do/ /bsam gtan med do/ /shes rab med do/ /lam med do/ /mngon par rtogs pa med do/ /tha na mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang med na/
58a6(khri brgyad): gzugs yongs su shes pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yongs su shes pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar rig par bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin
58a7(khri brgyad): du sbyar ro/ /gang la lam bsgom pa med pa de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang byang chub dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad
58b1(khri brgyad): spong ba'i bar du'ang ga la yod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lam bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de skad ces bka' stsal
58b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dngos po'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang ma mchis na/ thob ba lta
58b3(khri brgyad): ga la mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa lta ga la mchis te/ ma mchis na ci dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa mchis lags sam/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa
58b4(khri brgyad): dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
58b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / lam bsgom pa mchis lags sam/ lam bsgom pa la brten nas nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang spong
58b6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur lags sam/ nyon mongs pa de dag gis bsgribs na ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par yang mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la
58b7(khri brgyad): ma zhugs par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
59a1(khri brgyad): spong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos 'ga' tsam gyis gnas pa dang / skye ba'ang ma mchis na ni/ chos ma bskyed pa de dag gis rnam pa
59a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor
59a3(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la ni mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor pa thams cad spod
59a4(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ dngos po'i 'du shes sam/ dngos po ma
59a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i 'du shes sam/ gzugs kyi 'du shes nas rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes kyi bar ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes sam/ 'dod chags kyi 'du shes
59a6(khri brgyad): sam| 'dod chags spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ zhe sdang gi 'du shes sam/ zhe sdang spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ gti mug gi 'du shes sam/ gti mug spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ ma rig
59a7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes sam/ ma rig pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ 'du byed kyi 'du shes sam/ 'du byed spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes sam/ rnam par shes pa spong
59b1(khri brgyad): ba'i 'du shes sam/ ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes sam/ ming dang gzugs spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ skye mched drug gi 'du shes sam/ skye mched drug spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ reg pa'i
59b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes sam/ reg pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ sred pa'i 'du shes sam/ sred pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ len pa'i 'du shes
59b3(khri brgyad): sam/ len pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ srid pa'i 'du shes sam/ srid pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ skye ba'i 'du shes sam/ skye ba spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ rga shi'i 'du shes sam/ rga shi
59b4(khri brgyad): spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'du shes sam/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
59b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug bsngal spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ kun 'byung ba'i 'du shes sam/ kun 'byung ba
59b6(khri brgyad): spong ba'i 'du shes sam/ 'gog pa'i 'du shes sam/ 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyid pa'i 'du shes sam/ lam gyi 'du shes sam/ lam bsgom pa'i 'du shes sam/ de bzhin du rnam pa
59b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes sam/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i 'du shes mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
60a1(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni chos gang la'ang dngos po'i 'du shes
60a2(khri brgyad): sam| dngos po med pa'i 'du shes med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
60a3(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i bzod pa yin no/ /gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni de'i lam bsgom pa yin no/ /gang la dngos po'i 'du shes med pa dang /
60a4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang med pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa'o/ /mngon par rtogs pa ni dngos
