118a1(khri brgyad): gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ des tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma'i bar dag kyang rnam pa dang bcas
118a2(khri brgyad): yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs te/ sems
118a3(khri brgyad): can gang dag gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dag rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig ste/
118a4(khri brgyad): shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu skye ba dang / sems can gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yang dag par lta ba/ 'phags
118a5(khri brgyad): pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa dag rgyu des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba dag kyang gzigs la/ des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das
118a6(khri brgyad): pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang ba dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro dag tu lus ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang / yang
118a7(khri brgyad): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang / zag pa rnams zad pa dang / zag pa med cing sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta
118b1(khri brgyad): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ nga yang dag par rdzogs
118b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas
118b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu de yang dag
118b4(khri brgyad): par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang
118b5(khri brgyad): dag par bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor mi nus pa bdag
118b6(khri brgyad): gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba med
118b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / ngas gang dag bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba med pa dang / ngas gang sdug
119a1(khri brgyad): bsngal yang dag par zad par byed pa/ nges par 'byin pa'i lam du gsungs pa de bsten kyang sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha
119a2(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs ba dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun pa 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo
119a3(khri brgyad): snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog
119a4(khri brgyad): rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/
119a5(khri brgyad): su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
119a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag bar rig pa dang /
119a7(khri brgyad): spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs
119b1(khri brgyad): pa dag go/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa
119b2(khri brgyad): yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan dag gis ma shes na ci ma rung zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/ /de
119b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan dag gis ma shes na ci ma rung zhes
119b4(khri brgyad): gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs
119b5(khri brgyad): pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan dag gis ma shes na ci ma rung zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa
119b6(khri brgyad): gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe kha cig rna blags te gus par nyan cing bka' nyan par
119b7(khri brgyad): sems nye bar 'jog la/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yeng yeng por mi
120a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang po'o/ /kha cig rna mi blag /gus par mi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar mi 'jog la/ chos kyi rjes
120a2(khri brgyad): su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan mi byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mnar sems su mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni
120a3(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gnyis pa'o/ /kha cig rna blags te gus par nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar 'jog la/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan du byed/ kha
120a4(khri brgyad): cig ni rna mi blag / gus par mi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar mi 'jog la/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan mi byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
120a5(khri brgyad): pa'am/ kun nas mnar sems gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum pa'o//
120a6(khri brgyad): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad
120a7(khri brgyad): kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi yol ba ste/ 'di ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan
120b1(khri brgyad): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba dag 'byung gi /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de dag mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags
120b2(khri brgyad): kyi sgrib pa spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/
120b3(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum 'jig rten la rtog pa mdzad pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen
120b4(khri brgyad): po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa/ rtag tu 'byung ba 'di ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
120b5(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bar der de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel
120b6(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /
120b7(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus kyi
121a1(khri brgyad): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
121a2(khri brgyad): 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags/ ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /
121a3(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags/ ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags/ ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ste/ de dag
121a4(khri brgyad): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang gi dmigs pa ni dngos po med
121a5(khri brgyad): pa| dbang byed pa ni dran pa/ rnam pa ni zhi ba/ mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la de bzhin gshegs
121a6(khri brgyad): pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas
121a7(khri brgyad): 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs la
121b1(khri brgyad): 'bar 'bur med pa dang / sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang / byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang / phyag sbom zhing ring ba dang / 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / mdog gser
121b2(khri brgyad): 'dra ba dang / pags pa srab pa dang / spu re re nas skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' ba dang / ro stod seng+ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo legs par
121b3(khri brgyad): grub pa dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba mkhyen pa dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / ljags ring zhing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i
121b4(khri brgyad): dbyangs dang / 'gram pa seng+ge'i lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / spyan mthon
121b5(khri brgyad): mthing dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams
121b6(khri brgyad): cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rus pa'am/ ba so la gzugs su brkos pa lta bu dag mnga' bas na phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/ /zhabs
121b7(khri brgyad): kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas na zhabs shin tu gnas pa yin no/ /dang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel bas na phyag
122a1(khri brgyad): dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba yin no/ /shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags la snying bas na phyag dang zhabs gzhon sha
122a2(khri brgyad): chags pa yin no/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi bol gnyis dang / dpung mgo gnyis dang / ltag pa'i phyogs mtho bas na bdun mtho ba yin no/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas na sor
122a3(khri brgyad): mo ring ba yin no/ /zhabs kyi rting pa che bas na rting pa yangs pa yin no/ /khru bdun du 'phags par mtho zhing sku mi yo bas na sku che zhing drang ba yin no/ /pus mo'i lha nga dang / long
122a4(khri brgyad): bu shin tu mi mngon pas na zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa yin no/ /spu g.yas phyogs su zlum por 'khyil cing gyen du phyogs pas na sku'i su gyen du phyogs pa yin no/ /byin pa ri
122a5(khri brgyad): dwags e na ya'i byin pa dang / mda' rgyu'i snying po ltar byin gyis zlum pas na byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu yin no/ /phyag sbom zhing ring ba'i phyir ma btud kyang phyag gis pus
122a6(khri brgyad): mo slebs pas na phyag sbom zhing ring ba yin no/ /glang po che dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i mtshan shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas na 'doms kyi spa ba sbubs su nub pa yin
122a7(khri brgyad): no| |gser shin tu sbyangs pa'i mdog 'dra bas na mdog gser 'dra ba yin no/ /pags pa gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas na pags
122b1(khri brgyad): pa srab pa yin no/ /spu shin tu 'byes shing gcig tu gnyis ma yin pas na spu re re nas skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba yin no/ /me tog kund dang / zla ba dang / ba'i 'o ma dang / ba mo'i
122b2(khri brgyad): mdog ltar dkar zhing / nyi ma dang zla ba brgya bas kyang shin tu 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams legs par brgyan pas na zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga'
122b3(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /sku'i stod 'phel ka che bas na ro stod seng+ge'i 'dra ba yin no/ /dpung mgo zlum zhing phya ler 'dug pas na dpung mgo legs par grub pa yin no/ /gser gyi glegs ma shin
122b4(khri brgyad): tu rnam par phyis pa lta bus mthong ka shin tu rgyas pas na thal gong rgyas pa yin no/ /ljags rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis nyams pa mi mnga' zhing / ro thams cad so
122b5(khri brgyad): sor rnam par rig pa dang mthun par rnam par shes pas na re bro ba mkhyen pa yin no/ /sku'i khrun dang / 'dom gyi tshad du mnyam pas na shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no/ /dbu'i
122b6(khri brgyad): gtsug tor zlum zhing lham la g.yas su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing / dbu legs par grub cing lta na sdug pas na dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa yin no/ /ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog
122b7(khri brgyad): 'dra zhing yangs pas na ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no/ /dbyig gi snying po dang / bya ka la ping+ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas na tshangs pa'i dbyangs yin no/ /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar
123a1(khri brgyad): shin tu legs par grub cing zlum la rgyas shing lta na sdug la mkhrang bas na 'gram pa seng+ge'i lta bu yin no/ /me tog kund dang / zla ba dang / dung gi bcag
123a2(khri brgyad): 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas na tshems shin tu dkar ba yin no/ /tshems mtho dman med pas na tshems mnyam pa yin no/ /tshems mtshams ma dod pas na tshems
123a3(khri brgyad): thags bzang ba yin no/ /tshems bla 'og lhag chad med cing mnyam pas na tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yin no/ /dkar gang gi phyogs ma 'dres shing shin tu rnam par dag la/ dmar
123a4(khri brgyad): po'i rgyun dang ma 'brel bas na spyan mthon mthing yin no/ /spyan gyi rdzi ma bla 'og legs par gzhol zhing ma 'dzings pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi rdzi ma ni ba'i rdzi ma lta bu
123a5(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de la bla ma rnams la bsu bskyal dang / chos nyan pa dang / me tog phreng 'bul ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa'i gan du 'gro ba dang / g.yog
123a6(khri brgyad): 'khor gyi sbyin pa byas pas na phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/ de ni g.yog 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas yin no/ /yi dam la brtan pas na
123a7(khri brgyad): zhabs shin tu gnas par gyur te/ de ni mi g.yo ba'i snga ltas yin no/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa dag kun tu
123b1(khri brgyad): bsten pas na phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel bar gyur te/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas yin no/ /bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / bca' ba bsod pa dag gi sbyin pa byas
123b2(khri brgyad): pas na phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang / bdun mtho bar gyur te/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / bca' ba bsod pa dag 'thob pa'i snga
123b3(khri brgyad): ltas yin no/ /gsad pa las thar bar byas pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byin pas srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pa kun tu bsten pas na sor mo
123b4(khri brgyad): ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang bar gyur te/ de dag ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas yin no/ /dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba rnams mngon par spel
123b5(khri brgyad): cing yongs su 'grib par ma byas pas na zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa dang / sku'i spu gyen du phyogs par gyur te/ de gnyis ni chos yongs su mi nyams pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /bzo'i las
123b6(khri brgyad): dang / rig pa'i gnas rnams gus par byas shing byin pa dang / blangs pas na byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bur gyur te/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /bdog cing yod pa'i
123b7(khri brgyad): nor bslangs na med ces mi zer zhing byin pas na phyag sbom zhing ring bar gyur te/ de ni dbang sbyin zhing 'dul bar byed pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /mdza' bshes dang / gnyen 'dab dang /
124a1(khri brgyad): gnyen pa phan tshun 'brel ba dag gi dbyen ma byas shing / bye bar gyur ba dag bsdums pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs pa dang /
124a2(khri brgyad): gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs pas na 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub par gyur te/ de ni sras mang ba'i snga ltas yin no/ /stan dang / gos dang / bgo ba rnams dang / khang bzang
124a3(khri brgyad): dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po dag gi sbyin pa byas pas na mdog gser 'dra ba dang / pags pa srab par gyur te/ de gnyis ni stan dang / gos dang / bgo ba rnams
124a4(khri brgyad): dang / khang bzang dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po dag 'thob pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu
124a5(khri brgyad): nul sogs pa bla ma rnams ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su bkod cing rim gro byas pa dang / sbyin pa byin pa dang / mgu bar byas pas na spu re re nas skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /
124a6(khri brgyad): zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' bar gyur te/ de gnyis ni zla med pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /mu cor mi smra zhing gzhan la mi smod pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / legs par smras
124a7(khri brgyad): pa la rjes su mthun par byed pa dang / seng+ge'i sgra dang mthun par smra bas na ro stod seng+ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo legs par grub par gyur te/ de gnyis ni mi choms pa'i snga
124b1(khri brgyad): ltas yin no/ /nad pa rnams la rtsi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sman dang mthun pa'i kha zas sbyin zhing rim gro byas pas na thal gong rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba mkhyen par gyur te/ de gnyis
124b2(khri brgyad): ni gnod pa mi mnga' ba'i snga ltas yin no/ /kun dga' ra ba dang / 'dun sa dang / bsil khang dang / khron pa dang / bgrod dka' bar zam pa gdags pa dang / kha zas dang /
124b3(khri brgyad): me tog phreng dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'dug gnas la sogs pa bya ba la thog mar 'gro zhing / gzhan dag kyang spro ba bskyed pa dang / gzhan dag la lhag par byin pas na shing
124b4(khri brgyad): n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan par gyur te/ de gnyis ni mnga' dbang chen po brnyes pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /yun ring po nas 'jam zhing snyan pa dang / mnyen
124b5(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig brjod pas na ljags ring zhing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ de gnyis ni gsung gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs brnyes pa'i snga ltas
124b6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /gsung gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs ni/ kun tu shes par bya zhing rnam par rig par bya ba dang / mnyan par 'os shing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs
124b7(khri brgyad): rjes su 'byung ba dang / mi tshugs shing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/ /yun ring po nas tshig bkyal pa spangs shing dus su smra bas na 'gram pa seng+ge'i lta bur gyur
125a1(khri brgyad): te| de ni tshig btsun pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /rim gro byed pa dang / brnyas pa med pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /
125a2(khri brgyad): tshems mnyam par gyur te/ de gnyis ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma mad par spyad pas na/ tshems thags bzang ba dang /
125a3(khri brgyad): tshems bzhi bcu mnga' bar gyur te/ de gnyis ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyud pa dang smod par byed pa la'ang chags pa dang sdang ba med cing / rmongs pa med pa'i
125a4(khri brgyad): mig gis nges par rtogs pas na spyan mthon mthing dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bur gyur te/ de gnyis ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
125a5(khri brgyad): pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de dag gis rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams
125a6(khri brgyad): grangs med pa dag kyang snang bas khyab par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ gal te
125a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang bar byin gyis ma brlabs su zin na/ rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis zil gyis gnon par gyur pas nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang mngon par mi 'gyur
125b1(khri brgyad): la| zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo khyud khor dag kyang yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon
125b2(khri brgyad): par go bar mdzad do/ /bzhed na gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang ji snyed du snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de snyed du dbyangs kyis mngon par go bar yang mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ de la de
125b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i thugs mnga'
125b4(khri brgyad): bas na sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen 'dab la byams pa bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang / bde bar dgongs pa'i thugs
125b5(khri brgyad): mnga' bas na sen mo mdog snum pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs mtho ba'i rgyud du skyes pas na sen mo mtho ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
125b6(khri brgyad): rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba med pas na sor mo rnams zlum pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen por bsags pas na sor mo rnams rgyas pa
125b7(khri brgyad): yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rim gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pas na sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
126a1(khri brgyad): rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dag shin tu dben pas na rtsa mi mngon pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
126a2(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol bar mdzad pas na rtsa mdud pa med pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dgongs pa shin tu dben pas na long tshigs
126a3(khri brgyad): bu mi mngon pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las 'grol bar mdzad pas na zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
126a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge yin pas na seng+ge'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po che yin pas na glang po che'i stabs su
126a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pas na ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
126a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni skyes bu'i khyu mchog yin pas na khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' bas na
126a7(khri brgyad): g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta na mdzes pas na mdzes par gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
126b1(khri brgyad): rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' bas na ma yo bar gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pas na sku khri la bag
126b2(khri brgyad): chags pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na sku byi dor byas pa lta bu yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
126b3(khri brgyad): ni chos rim gyis ston pas na sku rim par 'tsham pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang bas na sku gtsang pa yin no/ /sangs
126b4(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pas na sku 'jam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs rnam par
126b5(khri brgyad): dag pas na sku rnam par dag pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba shin tu yongs su rdzogs pas na mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /sangs
126b6(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan gsung bas na sku kho lag yangs shing bzang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems
126b7(khri brgyad): can thams cad la thugs mnyam pas na gom pa snyoms pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pas na sku shin tu gzhon mdog can
127a1(khri brgyad): yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
127a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams byang bas na sku rgyas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba'i srid par mtshams sbyor ba zad pas na sku shin
127a3(khri brgyad): tu grims pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams shin tu legs par ston pas na yan lag dang nying
127a4(khri brgyad): lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pas na gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin no/ /
127a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na sku zlum pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i skyon rnams rab tu sbyangs
127a6(khri brgyad): pas na sku skabs phyin pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi rtse mo bcom pas na sku ma rnyongs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
127a7(khri brgyad): zad par byed pa rnam par zlog pas na phyal phyang nge ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos shin tu zab mo rnams thugs su chud pas na lte ba zab pa yin no/ /
127b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin par zhugs pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
127b2(khri brgyad): rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' bas na kun nas mdzes pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang bas na kun spyod
127b3(khri brgyad): pa gtsang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba nag po ston pa dang bral bas na sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
127b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba'i lus thob par 'gyur ba'i chos ston pas na phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
127b5(khri brgyad): ni gnyen 'dab dang / skye bo phal po che la snyoms par byams pas dge sbyong chen po yin pas na phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
127b6(khri brgyad): shin tu zab cing brtan par gnas pas na phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa rgya chen po'i chos ston pas na phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin
127b7(khri brgyad): no| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ha cang phal che ba ma yin pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bas na zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
128a1(khri brgyad): ni 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur ston pas na zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
128a2(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul bas na ljags gnyen pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan cha phra ba'i chogs dang ldan pas na ljags
128a3(khri brgyad): srab pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo chags pa rnams la gting dpag dka' ba'i chos kyis 'dul bar mdzad pas na ljags dmar ba yin
128a4(khri brgyad): no| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bas na glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa yin no/ /
128a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing mnyes la 'jam par smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas na gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
128a6(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni srid pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las log pas na mche ba zlum pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rnon po 'dul ba la mkhas pas na mche ba
128a7(khri brgyad): rno ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba mchog tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni cha mnyam pa'i
128b1(khri brgyad): sa la bzhugs pas na mche ba mnyam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par rtogs par rim gyis ston pas na mche ba byin gyis phra ba yin no/ /sangs
128b2(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri mthon po la bzhugs pas na shangs mtho ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma
128b3(khri brgyad): mnga' bas na shangs gtsang ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa rnam par dag pas na spyan rnam par dag pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
128b4(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas na spyan yangs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags
128b5(khri brgyad): pas na rdzi ma stug pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang mi'i na chung mig dkar gnag 'byes shing / pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu dang
128b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa mchog rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas shing bstod pas na spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
128b7(khri brgyad): rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa ston pas na smin tshugs ring ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas na smin ma 'jam pa yin no/ /sangs
129a1(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun nas skyon mkhyen pas na smin ma'i sbu mnyam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i
129a2(khri brgyad): rtsa ba'i snum gyis skye bo rgyud snum pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na smin ma snum pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs pa ston pas na
129a3(khri brgyad): snyan shal stug cing ring ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las rgyal bas na snyan mnyam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
129a4(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni sems kyi rgyud mnyam pa'i sems can 'dul bar mdzad pas na snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta bar
129a5(khri brgyad): gyur pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na dpral ba legs par 'byes pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams
129a6(khri brgyad): rab tu bcom pas na dpral ba dbyes che ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pas na dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no/ /sangs
129a7(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul la bong ba ltar dga' ba rnam par bzlog pas na dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom
129b1(khri brgyad): pas srang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal rnams spangs pas na dbu skra stug pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pas na
129b2(khri brgyad): dbu skra 'jam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs mnga' bas na dbu skra mi 'dzing ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
129b3(khri brgyad): rtag tu mi brlang ba'i gsung mnga' bas na dbu skra mi bshor ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi spos kyi me tog gis skye bo rnams la mthun par
129b4(khri brgyad): sgrub pas na dbu skra dri zhim pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste/ rab
129b5(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mnga' ba'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de ltar sbyin pa gnyis po
129b6(khri brgyad): zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du
129b7(khri brgyad): byung ba'i chos yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyan par smra bas sems can rnams yang dag par sdud ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang
130a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
130a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
130a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
130a4(khri brgyad): na| pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don spyod pas sems
130a5(khri brgyad): can rnams sdud ce na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag nyid kyis/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas sems can rnams yun
130a6(khri brgyad): ring po nas bsdus pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
130a7(khri brgyad): chen po rnams la 'di skad du 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog /khyed cag yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gcig la mkhas
130b1(khri brgyad): par gyis shig / yi ge gnyis la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gcig gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs
130b2(khri brgyad): par gyis shig / yi ge gnyis kyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig /yi ge gsum gyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig /
130b3(khri brgyad): yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig /yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par sgoms shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa
130b4(khri brgyad): lnga rnams su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig / ces 'doms par byed de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin no/ /
130b5(khri brgyad): yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag la mkhas pa yin no/ /yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rnams su yi ge gcig
130b6(khri brgyad): 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste /
130b7(khri brgyad): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge
131a1(khri brgyad): la mkhas pas chos ston te/ yi ge rnams kyis yi ge med pa'i chos ston pa bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos de ni yi ge med pa'i rnam par sprul pa'o/ /de nas
131a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa stong pa
131a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi slad du sems can yang gtan dmigs su ma mchis la/ chos kyang dmigs su ma mchis shing / chos kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/ bcom
131a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol
131a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
131a6(khri brgyad): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod
131a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / ting nge
131b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
131b2(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
131b3(khri brgyad): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la spyod pa ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid lags/ de la
131b4(khri brgyad): ni sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa'ang dmigs su ma mchis lags te/ sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas/ gzugs kyang dmigs su ma mchis
131b5(khri brgyad): la| rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang dmigs su ma mchis/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang dmigs su ma mchis la/ de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / sangs rgyas
131b6(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ /sems can dang sems can du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa de la ni gzugs kyang
131b7(khri brgyad): ma mchis la/ de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag kyang ma mchis lags so/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag kyang ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
132a1(khri brgyad): ' o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur
132a2(khri brgyad): te| bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can rnams mchis pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du stsol cing /
132a3(khri brgyad): phyin ci log la sbyor bar bgyid pa'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur lags grang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/
132a5(khri brgyad): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad
132a6(khri brgyad): smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ sems can dmigs su med pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du
132a7(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o/ /phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /khams stong pa nyid du
132b1(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o/ /skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /bdag stong pa nyid dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang /
132b2(khri brgyad): srog stong pa nyid dang / skye ba po stong pa nyid dang / shed las skyes pa stong pa nyid dang / gang zag stong pa nyid dang / gso ba stong pa nyid dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa
132b3(khri brgyad): po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te
132b4(khri brgyad): bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid du
132b5(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
132b6(khri brgyad): pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin
132b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
133a1(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
133a2(khri brgyad): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du
133a3(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o/ /byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas /
133a4(khri brgyad): phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ci nas kyang stong pa nyid de dag tu phyir mi ldog pa de ltar chos ston to/ /des chos thams cad sgrib pa med par yang
133a5(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mthong ste/ chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed cing / gnyis su mi 'byed par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
133a6(khri brgyad): ste| dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma mngon par sprul nas kha cig ni sbyin pa la bkod/ kha cig ni tshul khrims la bkod
133a7(khri brgyad): cing / de bzhin du sbyar te kha cig ni bzod pa la/ kha cig ni brtson 'grus la/ kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin la/ kha cig ni shes rab la/ kha cig ni bsam gtan rnams
133b1(khri brgyad): la| kha cig ni tshad med pa rnams la/ kha cig ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la/ kha cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la/ kha cig ni 'phags pa'i
133b2(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la/ kha cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bkod/ kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod/ kha cig ni byang
133b3(khri brgyad): chub kyi bar dag la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos gang yang rnam par 'phel ba yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma
133b4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can rnams la
133b5(khri brgyad): chos ston te/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul gyis de dag ni phyin ci log rnams las rnam par grol bar byed cing / de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba la 'god pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i
133b6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma bcings ma grol ba yin
133b7(khri brgyad): te| gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba
134a1(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
134a2(khri brgyad): yin pa de'ang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar dag
134a3(khri brgyad): dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bar gyi chos rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
134a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du dmigs pa'ang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams
134a5(khri brgyad): cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ de'ang gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar du stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i
134a6(khri brgyad): tshul dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas
134a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams ni gang du'ang gnas pa'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la gang gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pas na dngos po med pa'ang dngos po
134b1(khri brgyad): med pa la mi gnas la/ rang gi dngos po'ang dngos po med pa la mi gnas shing / gzhan gyi dngos po'ang dngos po med pa'am/ rang gi dngos po la mi gnas pa'i phyir
134b2(khri brgyad): ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la'ang gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/
134b3(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid du sgom ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
134b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
134b5(khri brgyad): dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad la nyes par byas pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang
134b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di nyid rtog ste/ rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston
134b7(khri brgyad): cing / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de las kyang mi 'da' ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyang 'da' ba med la/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir
135a1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
135a2(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
135a3(khri brgyad): gal te chos kyi dbyings la 'da' ba ma mchis shing / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ci gzugs kyang gzhan
135a4(khri brgyad): la| chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
135a5(khri brgyad): byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan pa zhig lags
135a6(khri brgyad): sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin te/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/
135a7(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ chos thams cad kyi bar yang gzhan ma yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin la/ de
135b1(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
135b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags shing / chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gzhan ma lags/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus
135b3(khri brgyad): ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par
135b4(khri brgyad): smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten lags so/ /zhes bgyi ba dang / dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa
135b5(khri brgyad): dkar po ni lha dang mi rnams lags so/ /zhes bgyi ba dang / dkar gnag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar gnag ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal 'dres ma lags so/ /zhes
135b6(khri brgyad): bgyi ba dang / mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing / dkar ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
135b7(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lags so/ /zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par ji
136a1(khri brgyad): ltar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab
136a2(khri brgyad): 'byor/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par zad kyi/ don dam pa'i bden par ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so//
136a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ chos
136a4(khri brgyad): de ni rnam par rtog pa med cing bsnyad du med pa ste/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
136a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod
136a6(khri brgyad): pa mchis kyi/ don dam par ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur lags sam/
136a7(khri brgyad): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
136b1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
136b2(khri brgyad): kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ 'o na ni de dag la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
136b3(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod par yang 'gyur te/ gal te kun
136b4(khri brgyad): rdzob kyi bden pa'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba'i grangs su'ang mi 'gro ba zhig na/ 'di ltar de dag la yongs su shes pa med de/
136b5(khri brgyad): de'i phyir de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na
136b6(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa dag kyang med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la ni lam yang med la/ lam rnam par
136b7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa'ang med/ lam bsgom pa'ang med na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta yod par 'gyur re skan/ 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni/ lam yang
137a1(khri brgyad): yod la lam rnam par bzhag pa'ang yod/ lam bsgom pa'ang yod pas na 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa'ang yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
137a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lam bsgom pas 'bras bu 'byung zhing 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
137a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgom pas 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'bras bu thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ lam ma bsgom par yang 'bras bu thob
137a4(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur te/ lam gyis kyang 'bras bu mi 'thob la/ lam ma yin pas kyang ma yin zhing lam la mi gnas par yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems
137a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can rnams la 'bras bu rnam par 'god par byed de/ chos kyi dbyings la tshar gcad pa'i tshul
137a6(khri brgyad): gyis 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la tshar bcad pas
137a7(khri brgyad): 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yin no/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i
137b1(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no/ /'di ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba rnams spangs pa'i phyir/
137b2(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid yin no/ /kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag
137b3(khri brgyad): thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can no/ /zhes bya ba ni rang byang chub yin no/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no//
137b4(khri brgyad): zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la tshar bcad pas 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa med do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
137b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
137b6(khri brgyad): 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas yin nam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas
137b7(khri brgyad): pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'dus ma bgyis lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dus ma bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
138a1(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor/ ci 'dus ma byas kyi chos la tshar gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka'
138a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan
138a3(khri brgyad): nyid gcig tu rtogs pa de'i tshe/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la'ang tshar gcod par byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags
138a4(khri brgyad): so| |bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa
138a5(khri brgyad): nyid nas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul gyis tshar bcad pa med pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul
138a6(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi
138a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ram/ byams pa'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba'am/ btang snyoms sam/ 'du shes med
138b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar ram/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
138b2(khri brgyad): bar gyi chos gang la'ang / bdag nyid kyang mngon par zhen par mi byed la/ gzhan yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la'ang chags pa
138b3(khri brgyad): med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed la/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don ma gtogs
138b4(khri brgyad): par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la'ang chags pa med cing / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
138b5(khri brgyad): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rab
138b6(khri brgyad): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang chos thams cad la'ang spyod la/ chos gang la'ang mi gnas shing
138b7(khri brgyad): chags pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
139a1(khri brgyad): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu rtsa gsum bya'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mos chos
139a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dper na/ sprul pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la kun tu
139a3(khri brgyad): spyod pa med pa dang / gzugs la kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / de bzhin du nang dang / phyi'i chos rnams la kun tu
139a4(khri brgyad): spyod pa med pa dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams la kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la kun tu spyod pa
139a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / lam la kun tu
139a6(khri brgyad): spyod pa med pa dang / 'bras bu rnams la kun tu spyod pa med pa de ltar/ rab 'byor/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul legs par rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol ba/ bcom
139b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ sprul pa'i lam bsgom pa ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur zhing / rnam
139b2(khri brgyad): par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na'ang mi snang ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
139b3(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
139b4(khri brgyad): la dngos po 'ga' zhig la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po gang yang dmigs su yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom
139b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la ni dngos po 'ga' zhig la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
139b6(khri brgyad): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' ba'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar chos rnams kyi chos
139b7(khri brgyad): kyi tshul legs par rtogs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci gzugs thams cad de
140a1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad dang / 'du shes thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad dang /
140a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ rab 'byor/ gzugs thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu
140a3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /tshor ba thams cad dang / 'du shes thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta
140a4(khri brgyad): bu yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes
140a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis/ 'du byed rnams ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis shing / gang las sems
140a6(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su thar bar bgyi ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba'ang ma mchis lags na/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i mthur
140a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon byang chub sems
140b1(khri brgyad): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mi'am lha dag las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i sems can dga'
140b2(khri brgyad): yang dmigs snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
140b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos gang khams gsum nas yongs su thar bar bya ba'i sems can 'ga' yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu
140b4(khri brgyad): dang / sprul pa lta bur shes shing mthong la rnam par rig pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams
140b5(khri brgyad): cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur 'tshal zhing mthong la rnam par rig lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
140b6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / byang chub kyi lam la
140b7(khri brgyad): spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
141a1(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gal te sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad rmi lam
141a2(khri brgyad): lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i
141a3(khri brgyad): spyad pa mi spyod pa zhig na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur mi shes te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems
141a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
141a5(khri brgyad): dag par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /
141a6(khri brgyad): mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyang ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems
141a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gang las bskyod par bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
141b1(khri brgyad): sems can rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa'i ming dang mtshan ma dag la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
141b2(khri brgyad): pas/ de dag ming dang mtshan ma las skyod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
141b3(khri brgyad): ming ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo
141b4(khri brgyad): bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba'am/ bud
141b5(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa zhes bya
141b6(khri brgyad): ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ mi zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/ rgyun
141b7(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/
142a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de dag ni bcos mar ming du btags pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
142a2(khri brgyad): ches thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni ming ste/ gzhol ba'i phyir ro/ /'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam du zad na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams de la chags pas/ de dag
142a3(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mkhas pas 'di skad du ming 'di ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bskyed
142a4(khri brgyad): pa yin pas/ rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dngos po med pa la khyed cag yod pa ma yin par yongs su rtog pas chags par ma byed cig /mkhas pa rnams ni chos stong pa
142a5(khri brgyad): dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /zhes kun nas 'bral bar byed de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
142a6(khri brgyad): spyod pa/ thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan ma gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gnyis po 'di dag ni gang la
142a7(khri brgyad): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /rab 'byor/ de
142b1(khri brgyad): la gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs gang ci'ang rung ste/ rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa dag ste/ gang skad cig pa'i chos de
142b2(khri brgyad): dag thams cad la yongs su rtog pas 'dzin par byed pa de ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang
142b3(khri brgyad): ci'ang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung zhing yongs su btags pa las nyon mongs pa skye ba de ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams chags
142b4(khri brgyad): pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag dang phral nas mtshan ma med pa'i
142b5(khri brgyad): dngos po la 'dzud cing 'god par byed de/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o/ /'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /zhes gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'dzud cing de ltar 'god par byed do//
142b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams mtshan ma dang phral nas
142b7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings la 'dzud cing 'god par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos
143a1(khri brgyad): 'di dag thams cad de tsam du bas te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ma mchis pa tsam du bas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
143a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ ji ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyis bye brag tu 'bogs par 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang dge
143a3(khri brgyad): ba'i chos rnams kyi bye brag tu 'bogs pa la 'god par bgyid pa dang / sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing sems can rnams kyang de dag nyid la sbyor bar bgyid
143a4(khri brgyad): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ gal te mtshan ma dngos po zhig yin
143a5(khri brgyad): te| dngos po med pa ma yin par gyur na ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis khyad
143a6(khri brgyad): par thob par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang khyad par 'thob pa la 'god par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni dngos po ma yin zhing / dngos po med de/
143a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143b1(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bzod
143b2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
143b3(khri brgyad): do| |tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam
143b4(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid
143b5(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa
143b6(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de
143b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ des dge ba'i chos
144a1(khri brgyad): de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor bar byed do/ /rab
144a2(khri brgyad): 'byor/ gal te chos rnams la tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi mtshan ma zhig yod par gyur na'ang / rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
144a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtshan ma med pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi
144a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur la/ sems can rnams kyang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin nyid du 'god par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni zag pa med
144a5(khri brgyad): cing / mtshan nyid med pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
144a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
144a7(khri brgyad): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis la yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
144b1(khri brgyad): 'o na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/ /'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/ /'di dag
144b2(khri brgyad): ni nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar
144b3(khri brgyad): bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma
144b4(khri brgyad): med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji
144b5(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams
144b6(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags
144b7(khri brgyad): so| |bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'o na mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa
145a1(khri brgyad): nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
145a2(khri brgyad): 'das de de lta lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ mtshan ma med pa'i
145a3(khri brgyad): chos de dag thams cad la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa
145a4(khri brgyad): drug dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
145a5(khri brgyad): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
145a6(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi bar dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
145a7(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par bslab par bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir
145b1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin no/ /mtshan ma dang bral ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
145b2(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa yin no/ /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
145b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ni phung po la la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/
145b4(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi
145b5(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
145b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
145b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
146a1(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ ji ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po
146a2(khri brgyad): lnga po dag la slob pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzugs rab tu shes
146a3(khri brgyad): te| gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /gzugs ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/
146a4(khri brgyad): dper na/ dbu ba rdos pa la snying po med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang shin tu gtse tshags dang / shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes so/ /gzugs
146a5(khri brgyad): kyi skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/ gzugs ni gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de ltar
146a6(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi skye ba rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song ba de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin
146a7(khri brgyad): nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
146b1(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa de ltar de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yin te/ de'i phyir
146b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de la log pa nyid med pas de'i phyir yang de bzhin nyid ces bya ste/ de ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/ /tshor ba ji ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i skye ba ji
146b3(khri brgyad): ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i 'jig pa ji ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur gyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa gsog tu 'dug
146b4(khri brgyad): pa de ltar tshor ba rab tu shes so/ /de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa de ltar tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab
146b5(khri brgyad): tu shes she na/ de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/ /'du shes ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu'i tshogs
146b6(khri brgyad): la chu shin tu dmigs su med pa de ltar 'du shes rab tu shes so/ /de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so/ /'du
146b7(khri brgyad): shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/ /'du byed rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/
147a1(khri brgyad): dper na/ chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po mi dmigs pa de ltar 'du byed rnams rab tu shes so/ /'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa ji ltar rab
147a2(khri brgyad): tu shes she na/ de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so/ /'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar
147a3(khri brgyad): rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
147a4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ji lta ba de ltar rnam par shes pa rab tu shes so/ /de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa de
147a5(khri brgyad): ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar rnam par
147a6(khri brgyad): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes pa yin no/ /khams rnams ji ltar shes she na/ mig gi khams ni mig gi khams kyi
147a7(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar mig gi khams rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi khams ji ltar shes she na/ gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar
147b1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams rab tu shes so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid
147b2(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes so/ /rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams
147b3(khri brgyad): dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par
147b4(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ yid kyi khams ni yid kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyi khams rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi khams ji
147b5(khri brgyad): ltar rab tu shes she na/ chos kyi khams ni chos kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar chos kyi khams rab tu shes so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ji ltar rab tu shes sha na/
147b6(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes te/ de ltar na khams bco brgyad rab
147b7(khri brgyad): tu shes pa yin no/ /skye mched rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ nang gi skye mched rnams ni nang gi skye mched rnams kyis stong la/ phyi'i skye mched rnams ni phyi'i skye mched rnams kyis
148a1(khri brgyad): stong pa de ltar skye mched rnams rab tu shes so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu
148a2(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes pa'o/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden par ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal
148a3(khri brgyad): rab tu shes pa dang / bden pa rab tu shes dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o zhes rab tu shes la/ gnyis las rnam par grol zhing / gnyis ma yin pa ni 'phags
