237a3(khri brgyad): byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/ ngo bo nyid
237a4(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
237a5(khri brgyad): las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyid na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci sngon dngos po
237a6(khri brgyad): yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor/ 'di la dngos po'ang med/ dngos po med pa'ang med/ rang gi dngos po'ang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na/ de la gang yang
237a7(khri brgyad): yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par ga la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu
237b1(khri brgyad): rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan
237b2(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas/ gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ tshor
237b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye
237b4(khri brgyad): mched dang / yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab
237b5(khri brgyad): par bgyi/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang /
237b6(khri brgyad): dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / rag bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par
237b7(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
238a1(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming
238a2(khri brgyad): dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ sdug bsngal gyi bden
238a3(khri brgyad): pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can gyi chos rnams la ji ltar
238a4(khri brgyad): bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can ma lags pa dang / bstan du mchis pa dang / bstan du ma mchis pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus
238a5(khri brgyad): bgyis dang / 'dus ma bgyis dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kha na ma thob dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / bsten par bgyi ba dang
238a6(khri brgyad): bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / dam pa dang / gya nom pa dang / nang dang / phyi dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'das pa dang /

238b1(khri brgyad): med ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma lags pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / 'dod chags pa/ khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tshom la ji ltar
238b2(khri brgyad): bslab par bgyi/ ser sna dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par
238b3(khri brgyad): g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ rnam par rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis
238b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mi sdug pa'i chos rnams dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi /
238b5(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi
238b6(khri brgyad): chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
238b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o/ /tshor ba
239a1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab

239a4(khri brgyad): po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste/ dngos po dang bcas par dmigs

239a6(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ dngos po ma mchis su lags na/ de'i ming de'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi
239a7(khri brgyad): rung lags te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
239b1(khri brgyad): pa zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
239b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa'o//

239b5(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'i ming ma mchis par ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des ming de rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming des ni 'du byed kyi mtshan
239b6(khri brgyad): ma'i dngos po de rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar

240a1(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang /

240a6(khri brgyad): de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de
240a7(khri brgyad): dang / de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming de la ma brten/ ma gnas/ gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la 'di ni gzugs yin no zhes bya bar ci
240b1(khri brgyad): ga de snyam sems sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /byams pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes

240b7(khri brgyad): bur du ming btags pa yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ming dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
241a1(khri brgyad): dngos po de la nye bar 'dogs pa'am/ tha snyad dam/ 'dogs pa'am/ mngon par zhen pa yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs

241a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags na ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba
241b1(khri brgyad): dang | 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
241b2(khri brgyad): po gang nye bar bzung nas/ ming dang / 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de
241b3(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya
241b4(khri brgyad): bar ming dang / 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa byed pa la/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam/ btags pa tsam du
241b5(khri brgyad): zad| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ btags pa tsam du bas lags so/ /byams pa/ 'o na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
241b6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar byams pa khyod ji ltar de snyam du
241b7(khri brgyad): sems/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags
242a1(khri brgyad): pa tsam du zad dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ btags pa tsam du bas lags so/ /byams pa/ 'o na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
242a2(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems sam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
242a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gzugs ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags
242a4(khri brgyad): shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang /
242a5(khri brgyad): tha snyad tsam kho na lags na/ de lta na 'di lta ste/ ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi
242a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags sam/ de lta na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur
242a7(khri brgyad): lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs
242b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci ga skye ba'am/ 'jig pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod
242b2(khri brgyad): dam| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/
242b3(khri brgyad): byams pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda
242b4(khri brgyad): dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci ga skye ba'am/ 'jig pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma
242b5(khri brgyad): mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi
242b6(khri brgyad): ches rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
242b7(khri brgyad): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis/ gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid
243a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ de skad
243a2(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi
243a3(khri brgyad): smra'o/ /byams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med
243a4(khri brgyad): do zhes nga mi smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gzugs mchis
243a5(khri brgyad): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis pa lags/ de skad
243a6(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/ don dam par
243a7(khri brgyad): ni ma yin no/ /byams pa/ 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du
243b1(khri brgyad): yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
243b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ dbyings 'di ni don dam par na brjod du ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings don dam
243b3(khri brgyad): par mchis su lags na/ 'o na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ don dam par mchis na/ 'du byed kyi mtshan
243b4(khri brgyad): ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar
243b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni/ 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su'ang ji ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes
243b6(khri brgyad): bgyir mi rung lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ ji ltar bzod
243b7(khri brgyad): pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
244a1(khri brgyad): dngos po gang la 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes
244a2(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi dmigs so/ /bka' stsal pa/
244a3(khri brgyad): byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i
244a4(khri brgyad): dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam
244a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de gal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings
244a6(khri brgyad): yin du zin na/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
244a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/ 'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs
244b1(khri brgyad): na| 'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin la/ 'di
244b2(khri brgyad): lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i
244b3(khri brgyad): bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
244b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la
244b5(khri brgyad): gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang / tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs
244b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar dag gang la glo bur du ming btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags
244b7(khri brgyad): sam| 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'du byed kyi
245a1(khri brgyad): mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni rang dbang nyid dam/ yod pa nyid gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
245a2(khri brgyad): po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes
245a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi spyod pa la gnas te/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtog pas gzung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /byams pa/ de lta yin na/ 'di lta ste/
245a4(khri brgyad): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes
245a5(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad dam/ rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/ /de de ltar rnam
245a6(khri brgyad): par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
245a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de la yod pa gang yin /
245b1(khri brgyad): gang yod pa ni/ dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
245b2(khri brgyad): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
245b3(khri brgyad): dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
245b4(khri brgyad): dang | bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas
245b5(khri brgyad): pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
245b6(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun btags pa'i gzugs so/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so/ /
245b7(khri brgyad): 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun
246a1(khri brgyad): btags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun btags pa'i 'du
246a2(khri brgyad): byed rnams so/ /'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so/ /'di dag ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so/ /'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di
246a3(khri brgyad): ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ 'di
246a4(khri brgyad): dag ni rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
246a5(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ kun btags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/
246a6(khri brgyad): chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun btags pa'i
246a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni gang lags/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags /
246b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas
246b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun btags pa'i gzugs so/ /byams pa/ gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
246b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas tshor ba'i
246b4(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du
246b5(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa
246b6(khri brgyad): tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas/ mngon par brjod de/ gang la 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang /
246b7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin
247a1(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i
247a2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
247a3(khri brgyad): byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang kun btags pa'i gzugs des rnam
247a4(khri brgyad): par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos la bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
247a5(khri brgyad): 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so/ /'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
247a6(khri brgyad): bar dag go/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs gsum po 'di dag
247a7(khri brgyad): las rdzas su ma mchis par blta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rjes su mchis pa ni gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing /
247b1(khri brgyad): don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang /
247b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni gang lags/ rdzas su mchis pa dag ni gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su mchis
247b3(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma lags shing / don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gang kun
247b4(khri brgyad): btags pa'i gzugs de ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/ /rnam par btags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir/ rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i
247b5(khri brgyad): phyir ni ma yin no/ /gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/ /kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang /
247b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o/ /gang rnam par btags
247b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod
248a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /byams pa/ gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
248a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / byams pa/ gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin la/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab
248a3(khri brgyad): tu phye bar blta bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzugs
248a4(khri brgyad): rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang ma mchis la/ de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye
248a5(khri brgyad): ba'i btags pa'ang ma mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
248a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan
248a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ tshor
248b1(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med ba'i grangs su
248b2(khri brgyad): byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kun btags
248b3(khri brgyad): ba'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming dang / 'du
248b4(khri brgyad): shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam nyid gang yin pa de cig gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis gang
248b5(khri brgyad): kun btags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med
248b6(khri brgyad): pa ste/ ngas 'di la dgongs nas/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems
248b7(khri brgyad): gang la brten nas gzugs zhes pa'i mi dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur pa rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de cig gzugs ma yin pa yin
249a1(khri brgyad): nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun btags pa'i gzugs
249a2(khri brgyad): des/ de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing / de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang /
249a3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin
249a4(khri brgyad): pa de gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/
249a5(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas/ rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de cig gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /chos
249a6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi gzugs de nyid gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /byams pa/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang /
249a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa
249b1(khri brgyad): de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
249b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
249b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis
249b4(khri brgyad): pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa
249b5(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan
249b6(khri brgyad): nyid ni ji lta bu/ bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/
249b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtha' gnyis spangs nas/ 'di ltar dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su
250a1(khri brgyad): mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/ /gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
250a2(khri brgyad): kyi bar du yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o/ /gang gzugs spong ba'ang ma yin/ mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong
250a3(khri brgyad): ba'o| |gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba'ang ma yin/ mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong
250a4(khri brgyad): ba'o| |gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/ mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /gang gzugs spong ba'i phyir lam bsgom pa'ang ma
250a5(khri brgyad): yin| bsgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
250a6(khri brgyad): dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
250a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das
250b1(khri brgyad): pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab
250b2(khri brgyad): bo| |mchog tu zab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems
250b3(khri brgyad): dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das
250b4(khri brgyad): pa ni| 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ de'i phyir zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
250b5(khri brgyad): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'ang
250b6(khri brgyad): ma lags/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gzhan gyi don las brtsams te/ 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan
250b7(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
251a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las
251a2(khri brgyad): brtsams te/ 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/ de 'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang
251a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na/ 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
251a4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'khor ba la'ang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las
251a5(khri brgyad): 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
251a6(khri brgyad): de 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas/ mya
251a7(khri brgyad): ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du 'khor ba na'ang mi nyams so/ /de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang
251b1(khri brgyad): yongs su mi gtong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
251b2(khri brgyad): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas/ 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs
251b3(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te blangs pa ma mchis na ji ltar ma btang ba
251b4(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ nga ni 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhe'am/ mi len to zhes mi smra'o/ /byams pa/ 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
251b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig
251b6(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
251b7(khri brgyad): dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
252a1(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ gzugs gang
252a2(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin
252a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag dang stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ spros pa med pa gang yin pa de
252a4(khri brgyad): ni| byams pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
252a5(khri brgyad): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ci nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de
252a6(khri brgyad): ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'jig rten 'di ni khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma ste/ khams sna tshogs pa/ khams du ma'i 'jig rten de na sems can gyi rigs
252a7(khri brgyad): dang | rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/ byams pa/ gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi rigs kyi rnam
252b1(khri brgyad): pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman pa nyid thob la de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid dman
252b2(khri brgyad): pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman pa nyid thob la dman par shes nas de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi/ de'i gong du bzang po'i bye brag 'tshol zhing bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi
252b3(khri brgyad): bye brag de lta bu yod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi rigs
252b4(khri brgyad): kyi rnam pa gsum pa gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang skye ba ma mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ bsgrub pa
252b5(khri brgyad): nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur bar
252b6(khri brgyad): ni nga mi 'dogs kyi/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang yongs su bsngos pa'o zhes nga 'dogs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
252b7(khri brgyad): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
253a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs
253a2(khri brgyad): po che ni gang lags/ che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid
253a3(khri brgyad): dang | 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa
253a4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di lta ste/ 'du byed yongs su mi gtong bas/ de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang
253a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed
253a6(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
253a7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so/ /
253b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
253b2(khri brgyad): bskyed par bgyi lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //shes rab
253b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol
253b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ston cing / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer bzhag ste/ /sgrib pa nyon mongs bsal nas dri ma las 'das pa/ /'gro don
253b5(khri brgyad): mngon zhugs des pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gang la dpal rnams spyod pa de ni mnyan par gyis/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed cig 'bab cing / /me tog 'bras ldan sman dang nags tshal
253b6(khri brgyad): skyed byed pa/ /ma dros gnas pa'i klu dbang klu bdag brten gnas te/ /de ni klu yi bdag po de yi mthu dpal yin/ /rgyal ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji snyed chos ston dang / /'chad dang rigs pa dag
253b7(khri brgyad): dang ldan par brjod pa dang / /mchog 'phags bde ba byed dang de yi 'bras thob pa/ /de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu/ /ci phyir zhen rgyal bas chos tshul gang bstan pa/ /
254a1(khri brgyad): de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslabs shing / /mngon sum byas nas bslabs pa ji bzhin ston byed de/ /sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi stobs kyi mthus ma
254a2(khri brgyad): yin/ /gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigs shing / /byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs byang chub sems mi dmigs/ /de skad thos nas rmongs pa med cing skrag med pa/ /byang
254a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' de ni bde gshegs shes rab spyod/ /gzugs med tshor ba med cing 'du shes sems pa med/ /de la rnam shes gnas ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /de chos kun la mi
254a4(khri brgyad): gnas gnas pa med par spyod/ /yongs su gzung med bde gshegs rnams kyis byang chub 'thob/ /ji ltar kun tu rgyu ba bzo sbyangs shes pa yis/ /dmigs med phung po rnam par 'jig
254a5(khri brgyad): pa 'byung ba ltar/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar chos shes pa/ /mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas/ /yang 'di shes rab 'di ni gang yin su yi yin/ /gang las
254a6(khri brgyad): yin zhes chos 'di thams cad stong bar rtog / nye bar brtags nas zhum pa med cing skrag med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub nye ba yin/ /gal te mi shes bzhin du gzugs
254a7(khri brgyad): su 'du shes shing / /tshor ba sems pa rnam shes phung por spyod byed cing / /phung 'di stong zhes rtog na'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /mtshan ma la spyod skye med gnas la dad ma yin/ /
254b1(khri brgyad): gang zhig gzugs min tshor min 'du shes sems pa yin/ /rnam par shes la mi spyod gnas pa med par spyod/ /de ni spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs shes rab brtan/ /skye med blo ldan ting 'dzin
254b2(khri brgyad): zhi ba mchog la reg/ byang chub sems gang de ltar 'dir bdag zhir gnas pa/ /de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan yin/ /bdag ni mnyam par bzhag ce'am langs zhes
254b3(khri brgyad): rlom sems med/ /ci phyir zhe na chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes phyir/ de ltar spyod na bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod/ /des ni spyod med spyod pa yin par rab shes phyir/ /chos
254b4(khri brgyad): gang spyod pa de'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya/ /byis pa rnams kyis de brtags yod dang
254b5(khri brgyad): med par byed/ /yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di shes nges par 'byung / /gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'drar shes shing / /
254b6(khri brgyad): sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed la/ /sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar zhi spyod pa/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /dge ba'i bshes dang ldan zhing
254b7(khri brgyad): lhag mthong ldan gyur ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi yum thos skrag par yong mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa/ /de ni snod so ma btang chu reg zhig pa bzhin
255a1(khri brgyad): ci phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na/ /chags pa gcod byed kun la chags pa zad par 'dod/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg /
255a2(khri brgyad): des na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob bo/ /ci phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes bya zhe na/ /sems can tshogs rnams mang po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang / /sems can khams kyi lta
255a3(khri brgyad): rnams chen po gcod pa ste/ /de phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes ni rab brjod do/ /gtong ba che dang blo che ba dang mthu che dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi theg chen mchog la zhugs pa dang / /go cha
255a4(khri brgyad): chen po bgos shing bdud kyi sgyu 'dul ba/ /de yi phyir na sems dpa' che zhes rab tu brjod/ /dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te/ /skye bo phal chen mgo mang bye ba
255a5(khri brgyad): gcod byed pa'i/ /gsang bya de dag ci 'dra de ltar byang chub sems/ /'gro kun sprul 'drar rab shes de la 'jigs pa med/ /gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba dang ni sems dpa' dang / /
255a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol yod pa min/ /de ltar byang chub la 'jug zhum pa'i sems med pa/ /'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog/ ci phyir 'di ni byang chub
255a7(khri brgyad): theg chen bya zhe na/ /de gang zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo/ /theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra gzhal med khang chen te/ /dga' skyid bde ba mngon par 'thob byed theg pa'i mchog
255b1(khri brgyad): gang zhig zhon nas phyogs su 'gro ba dmigs su med/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs pa 'gro mi dmigs/ /dper na mi shi de yis 'gro rgyu med pa bzhin/ /rgyu des de ni mya ngan 'das zhes rab
255b2(khri brgyad): tu brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / /da ltar byung bar mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste/ /gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yin spros med de/ /'di ni shes rab pha
255b3(khri brgyad): rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig gang gi dus kyi tshe/ /skye med rnam par bsams te 'di ltar spyod byed cing / /snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes
255b4(khri brgyad): med| |'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyed/ /'gro ba rnams kyi don bya sdug bsngal spang snyam ste/ /bdag dang sems
255b5(khri brgyad): can yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /bdag ci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams cad shes/ /sems can thams cad ci 'drar
255b6(khri brgyad): de 'drar chos kun shes/ /skye ba med dang skye ba gnyi gar mi rtog pa/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed yongs brjod pa/ /kun la skye
255b7(khri brgyad): ba dang ni yang dag 'das spangs nas/ /ye shes 'chi med dam pa de las gzhan med 'thob/ /de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs med de
256a1(khri brgyad): ltar spyod/ /shes rab ldan te mnyam nyid gnas par shes par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin
256a2(khri brgyad): mchog spyod pa yin/ /gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor bar mi gnas shing / /gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la/ /rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyid
256a3(khri brgyad): gnas pa ste/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong / /'bras
256a4(khri brgyad): bu thob dang dgra bcom sa la mi gnas shing / /rang rgyal sa dang de bzhin sangs rgyas sar mi gnas/ /ji ltar 'dren pa 'dus ma byas khams mi gnas shing / /de bzhin 'dus byas
256a5(khri brgyad): la'ang mi gnas gnas med spyod/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas/ /gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs/ /gang bdag bde
256a6(khri brgyad): gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa/ /bzod pa 'di la ma brten 'thob par mi nus te/ /dper na tshu rol pha rol
256a7(khri brgyad): 'gro ngogs mi mthong bzhin/ /chos 'chad pa dang nyan dang bshad bya gang yin dang / /'bras bu thob dang rkyen rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon/ /mkhas pa gsal bas thob pa'i
256b1(khri brgyad): mya ngan 'das gang yin/ /de kun sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ /gang zag bzhi po 'di dag de la mi skrag ste/ /rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang / /dgra
256b2(khri brgyad): bcom dri ma bsal zhing som nyi spangs pa dang / /bzhi pa dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su zin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig de ltar spyod pa ni/ /dgra bcom sa la mi slob rkyen rtog
256b3(khri brgyad): sa la min/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos rjes slob/ /gang zhig slob mi slob la mi slob de slob yin/ /gzugs 'phel yongs su nyams dang yongs su gzung phyir min/ /
256b4(khri brgyad): chos rnams sna tshogs yongs su gzung phyir mi slob par/ /slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs 'dzin la/ /nges 'byung gang yin 'di ni yon tan dga' ba'i slob/ /gzugs
256b5(khri brgyad): ni shes rab ma yin gzugs la shes rab med/ /rnam shes 'du shes tshor dang sems pa 'di dag ni/ /shes rab ma yin 'di dag la'ang shes rab med/ /'di ni nam mkha'i
256b6(khri brgyad): khams dang mtshungs te tha dad med/ /dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de ni pha mtha' med/ /sems can rang bzhin gang yin de'ang pha mtha' med/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang
256b7(khri brgyad): bzhin de yang pha mtha' med/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i shes rab de yang pha mtha' med/ /'du shes tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags/ /'du shes rnam par
257a1(khri brgyad): bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro/ gang dag 'du shes bral ba 'di ni rjes thob pa/ /de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas/ /gal te ston pas
257a2(khri brgyad): kyang ni gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /bskal par bzhugs te sems can zhes sgra yongs bsgrags kyang / /gzod nas dag pas sems can skye bar ga la 'gyur/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin
257a3(khri brgyad): mchog spyod pa yin/ /gang tshe nga ni pha rol phyin pa mchog 'di dang / /mthun par smra gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes/ /nga lung
257a4(khri brgyad): bstan par gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsung / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la mgon spyod pa/ /'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa/ /de la dug dang mtshon dang me
257a5(khri brgyad): dang chus mi tshugs/ /bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas
257a6(khri brgyad): shing mchod byed la/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang+gA yi/ /bye ma snyed kyis bye ba phrag stong zhing bkang ste/ /yongs su rtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas
257a7(khri brgyad): na| |sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ /las gzhan mi byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang / /byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag mchod la/ /gang
257b1(khri brgyad): zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bde bar gshegs kyi yum 'di glegs bam la bris te/ /'chang zhing me tog byug pas bsti stang byed gyur na/ /mchod rten byas
257b2(khri brgyad): mchod bsod nams de ni char mi phod/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che/ /sems can khams med mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed/ /gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs
257b3(khri brgyad): bcu'i 'jig rten mgon/ /rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med 'gyur/ /gang dag phan dang snying rjer bcas pa spyad spyod pa/ /rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang
257b4(khri brgyad): chub reg / 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa/ /bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya/ /sa bon btab nas sa la gnas te 'byung 'gyur ba/ /tshogs la rkyen nas
257b5(khri brgyad): rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par skye/ /pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa/ /de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro
257b6(khri brgyad): ba| |lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun/ /gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro/ /de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas
257b7(khri brgyad): brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol pa/ /gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la/ /de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur gtams gyur kyang / /bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyi
258a1(khri brgyad): pa 'di nyid len/ /ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags/ /'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod par bgyid/ /dper na rgyal po rten mi
258a2(khri brgyad): rim gro thob pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten/ /nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang med/ /gab tse gang du stsal pa de ni phyag bgyi 'os/ /de
258a3(khri brgyad): phyung gyur kyang gab tse la ni dga' bgyid de/ /yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lags/ /de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das kyang
258a4(khri brgyad): ring bsrel mchod pa brnyes/ /de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des/ /shes rab pha rol phyin blang 'di ni thar pa lags/ /sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba
258a5(khri brgyad): shes rab ste/ /tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no/ /dge chos chud mi gzan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin/ /'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul
258a6(khri brgyad): gcig ston par byed/ /dper na dzam+bu'i gling na shing rnams bye ba stong / /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba/ /grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs
258a7(khri brgyad): par| |grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ming nyid thob par 'gyur/ /thams cad
258b1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsngos byas na/ /byang chub ces byar drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin/ /gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang
258b2(khri brgyad): sems pa rnam par shes/ /mi rtag yongs su ston pa bcos la spyod pa ste/ /mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do/ /gang la gzugs min tshor min 'du shes mi dmigs shing /
258b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi dmigs la/ /chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /la las gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed zhing
258b4(khri brgyad): rnams na/ /sems can ji snyed 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas/ /gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te/ /sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par
258b5(khri brgyad): 'phags/ /ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas/ /chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed/ /de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal
258b6(khri brgyad): byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg/ myu gu med par 'jig rten sdong 'byung yod med na/ /de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung / /byang chub sems med rgyal
258b7(khri brgyad): 'byung 'jig rten yod med na/ /'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed/ /de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de
259a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du/ /mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na/ /ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan/ /dper na ma dros mtsho la klu bdag
259a2(khri brgyad): med gyur na/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la 'gyur/ /chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
259a3(khri brgyad): 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi/ /ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung / /ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub ldan/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i
259a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di na snang byed srog chags ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams byung ba bas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig
259a5(khri brgyad): phyung chos mchog ste/ /snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char me phod/ /nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / /bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams
259a6(khri brgyad): tshogs skyed pa'ang / /byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang sems gcig la/ /nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phod/ /'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bya ba
259a7(khri brgyad): khrag khrig gang / /zhing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang / /gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ /sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston
259b1(khri brgyad): pa| |dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas/ /rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus/ /de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa/ /pha rol phyin dang ldan dang
259b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas chos gang dang / /gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang / /slob dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa/ /bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang zhing / /
259b3(khri brgyad): 'gro ba'i don rgyu byang chub phyir ni thams cad bsngo/ /yongs bsngo gal te sems su 'du shes 'byung 'gyur zhing / /byang chub 'du shes yongs bsngo sems can 'du shes na/ /'du shes phyir
259b4(khri brgyad): na lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags/ /dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngo bar chud ma yin/ /gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang / /gang du yongs su bsngo ba de
259b5(khri brgyad): yang zad pa dang / /chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na/ /de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin/ /gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin/ /ji ste mtshan
259b6(khri brgyad): ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin/ /ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba/ /dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs/ /de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba
259b7(khri brgyad): bslab bya ste/ /ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa'i/ /rnam pa gang yin 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la/ /rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo/ /de ltar bsod nams
260a1(khri brgyad): byang chub yongs su bsngo byed na/ /dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra/ /de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bos 'jig rten dmigs can gyi/ /byang
260a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams/ /lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur/ /shes rab
260a3(khri brgyad): med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di/ /dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin/ /gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gyur na/ /de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yi ming
260a4(khri brgyad): thob bo/ /dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa/ /ji srid mig ma bris pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin/ /gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos/ /shes rab
260a5(khri brgyad): rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe/ /'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro /nam mkha' gang la'ang cung zad mi gnas de ngang 'dra/ /gal te bdag
260a6(khri brgyad): ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyad bya zhing / /sems can sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang dgrol sems/ /sems can 'du shes yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /'di ni
260a7(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe/ /pha rol phyin 'dir spyod pa mkhas pa som nyi med/ /thos ma thag tu
260b1(khri brgyad): des ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed/ /des ni byang chub zhi ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur/ /sngon spyod tshe na sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang / /rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin la ma dad na/ /
260b2(khri brgyad): thos nas blo chung de yis 'di ni spong byed de/ /spangs nas skyabs med gyur pa de ni mnar med 'gro/ de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog /reg par 'dod na rgyal ba'i yum
260b3(khri brgyad): 'dir dad par gyis/ /dper na tshong pa rin chen gling du song nas ni/ /zong zad slar log lta bur gyur na mi rung ngo / /gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu dag par rig par bya/ /'bras bu
260b4(khri brgyad): gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du med/ /dpa' bo
260b5(khri brgyad): gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis/ /khams gsum yang dag 'das la rnam par grol ba'ang min/ /nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed/ /rga dang na dang
260b6(khri brgyad): 'chi ba med kyang 'chi 'pho ston/ /'gro ba'i 'di dag ming dang gzugs kyi 'dam la chags/ /rlung gi 'khor lo lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam/ /'gro ba 'khrul pa ri dwags
260b7(khri brgyad): rgyar chud 'drar shes nas/ /shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu/ /spyod pa yongs dag gang zhig gzugs la mi spyod cing / /rnam shes 'du shes tshor ba sems
261a1(khri brgyad): par mi spyod na/ /de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs spong zhing / /chags las rnam grol bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod/ /de ltar
261a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba/ /chags pa bcad nas 'gro la chags pa med par 'gro/ /nyi ma sgra gcan gza' bral lhang nger 'dug pa dang / /me btang
261a3(khri brgyad): rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal bsreg pa bzhin/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yongs dag par/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin lta na/ /byed pa
261a4(khri brgyad): po'ang mig sogs chos kun mi dmigs te/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /rgyal ba la ni lha rgyal brgya byin gyis zhus pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes
261a5(khri brgyad): rab spyod pa ji ltar brtson/ /phung po khams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed cing / /phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson/ /gang zhig chos 'di sprul dang sgyu ma 'drar
261a6(khri brgyad): thos nas/ /som nyi med cing slob la phyir zhing spyod byed pa/ /sems can de ni ring nas theg chen zhugs rig bya/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yin/ /dgon
261a7(khri brgyad): pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por zhugs pa'i mis/ /gnag rdzi mtshams kyi nags tshal phun sum tshogs mthong nas/ /'di dag grong dang grong khyer nye bar brtags snyam ste//
261b1(khri brgyad): dbugs phyin rnyed par 'gyur zhing tshom rkun 'jigs pa med/ /de bzhin byang chub yongs su 'tshol tshe rgyal rnams kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin 'di mnyan pa gang thob pa/ /de ni dbugs
261b2(khri brgyad): byin thob par gyur cing 'jigs med de/ /dgra bcom sa la ma yin rkyen rtogs sa la min/ /mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis/ /gal ba shing dang nags tshal ri mthong da
261b3(khri brgyad): dung ring / /ci ste rtags ma mthong na rgya mtsho chen po ni/ /nye bar gyur to snyam ste de la som nyi med/ /de bar byang chub dam par rab zhugs rgyal ba yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin 'di
261b4(khri brgyad): mnyan par rig par bya/ /rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum lung bstan ma byung kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub ring por mi thogs bdag reg 'gyur/ /dpyid dus bzang la sdong po
261b5(khri brgyad): lo ma lhags gyur na/ /yal gas rin por ma thogs lo 'bras me tog bskrun/ /shes rab pha rol phyin 'di su yi lag thob pa/ /ring por mi thogs 'dren pa rnams kyi byang
261b6(khri brgyad): chub thob/ /dper na bud med sbrum gang sdug bsngal nyen gyur na/ /de ni de yi btsa' ba'i dus la bab ces bya/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab nyan/ /
261b7(khri brgyad): dga' dang 'dun pa skyed pa myur du byang chub las/ shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod tshe rnal 'byor pa/ /gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang ni yongs su 'grib mi mthong / /gang
262a1(khri brgyad): zhig chos dang chos min chos dbyings mi mthong zhing / /mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas/ /gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas chos rnams
262a2(khri brgyad): mi rtog ste/ /stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa byang chub zhi mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin/ /smra
262a3(khri brgyad): ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byor zhus/ /yon tan dga' ba rnams kyi bar du gcod gang lags/ /ston pas bka' stsal bar du gcod par 'gyur mang ste/ /de las re zhig
262a4(khri brgyad): cung zad tsam zhig yongs su brjod/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig 'dri tshe/ /spobs pa tha dad rnam pa du ma 'byung 'gyur zhing / /'gro ba'i don ma byas par glog
262a5(khri brgyad): bzhin myur du yang / /yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud kyi las/ /'di bshad tshe na kha cig som nyi za 'gyur te/ /'dren pas 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang yongs
262a6(khri brgyad): ma brjod/ /rigs dang sa dang rus kyang yongs su ma brjod ces/ /'di ni nyan par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur bdud kyi las/ /de ltar mi shes de dag rtsa ba bor nas ni/ /rmongs
262a7(khri brgyad): pas yal ga dag dang 'dab ma 'tshol bar 'gyur/ /glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes ni 'tshol ba ltar/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thos mdo 'tshol de bzhin no/ /dper na la las ro
262b1(khri brgyad): brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la/ /zas mchog rnyed nas zas ngan 'tshol bar byed pa ltar/ /byang chub sems dpa' pha rol phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ /dgra bcom sa yis byang chub 'tshol byed de
262b2(khri brgyad): bzhin no/ /bsti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing rnyed pa 'dod 'gyur dang / /lta dang bcas pa'i sems kyis khyim 'dris byed ldan zhing / /chos btang nas ni chos min bya ba spyod 'gyur ba/ /
262b3(khri brgyad): lam bor la ma gol 'gro ba 'di ni bdud kyi las/ /gang dag de yi tshe na 'dun cing dad gyur nas/ /chos kyi dam pa'i 'di ni nyan du song ba las/ /de dag gis ni chos smra bya ba ldan rig
262b4(khri brgyad): nas/ /dga' ba med cing yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'gro /de yi tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe gang dag gis ni dge slong mang dkrugs nas/ /shes rab pha
262b5(khri brgyad): rol phyin 'di 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /bar du gcod pa rnam mang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rin chen rin thang med pa rnyed 'gyur gang dag yin/ /de dag dkon la
262b6(khri brgyad): dus rnams rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /rin chen chos kyang dkon la rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang / /theg pa gsar du zhugs pa'i
262b7(khri brgyad): sems can blo chung ba/ /gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni ma rnyed pa/ /de la bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su 'dzin la
263a1(khri brgyad): sbyor| / ma zhig na bar gyur la bu ni mang yod pa/ /de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim gro byed/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs
263a2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyang / /yum gyur shes rab dam pa 'di la dgongs pa mdzad/ /gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dgon gang dang / /ma 'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur de dag
263a3(khri brgyad): 'di las 'byung / /'jig rten tshon pa rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum/ /sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed/ /'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom
263a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid/ /rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal sras de bzhin nyid/ /gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid/ /shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs
263a5(khri brgyad): pas mkhyen/ /mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung / /chos nyid skyon med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te/ /byang chub sems dpas de bzhin nyid
263a6(khri brgyad): 'di rjes su rtogs/ /de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal la brten pa/ /stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi
263a7(khri brgyad): spyod yul 'di yin te/ /sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'don kyang / /de dag nam yang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med/ /dper na seng ge ri sul
263b1(khri brgyad): brten nas 'jigs med par/ /ri dwags phra mo mang skrag byed cing sgra sgrog ltar/ /mi yi seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas/ /mu stegs can yang skrag byed 'jig rten sgra'ang sgrog /
263b2(khri brgyad): dper na nam mkhar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ni/ /sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa/ /srid pa'i chu klung skems
263b3(khri brgyad): shing chos kyang rab tu ston/ /gzugs rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing / /'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing / /gang la rnam par shes dang sems yid
263b4(khri brgyad): mthong med pa/ /'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ /nam mkha'i mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod la/ /nam mkha' ji ltar mthong ste don 'di
263b5(khri brgyad): brtag par gyis/ /de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ /mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin/ /gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun
263b6(khri brgyad): mthong / /rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar/ /sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed/ /rgyal
263b7(khri brgyad): po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la/ /rang gi yul nas 'du ba thams cad sdud pa ltar/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi 'gro la/ /sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan
264a1(khri brgyad): gang yin thams cad sdud/ /gang la bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dad brtan yod/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba/ /nyan
264a2(khri brgyad): thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin tu 'das byas nas/ /zil gyis mi non rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob/ /dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru ni chag gyur la/ /mi gang ro 'am rtsa
264a3(khri brgyad): 'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa/ /chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te dogs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /de ltar dad ldan dang ba thob pa
264a4(khri brgyad): gang zhig ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin yum rjes su mi 'jug min/ /de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs zin na/ /mchog tu rmad byung bde gshegs byang chub myur du
264a5(khri brgyad): reg / dper na la las rdza som btang chu skyed na/ /nyam chung phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya/ /so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi/ /'jigs pa med
264a6(khri brgyad): cing bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang / /shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du ma rung 'gyur/ /dad pas shes rab kyis
264a7(khri brgyad): ni yongs su zin gyur na/ /sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang / /nor dang bcas shing tshor par bcas
264b1(khri brgyad): te 'jig par 'gyur/ /gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na/ /mi 'jig nor dang bcas par dogs su phyin par gyur/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad
264b2(khri brgyad): pas yongs bsgos kyang / /shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur/ /de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na/ /ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg
264b3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur/ /lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi/ /langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te/ /de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi yis brten byas na/ /'gyel
264b4(khri brgyad): ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba/ /rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /de nyid
264b5(khri brgyad): thabs mkhas shing rab mchog gis yongs zin na/ /mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang / /lhag
264b6(khri brgyad): pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis/ /bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu bsten par bya/ /ci phyir zhe na mkhas
264b7(khri brgyad): pa'i yon tan de las 'byung / /de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la brten to zhes/ /yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal
265a1(khri brgyad): ba de skad gsung / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis/ /byang chub
265a2(khri brgyad): phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed ces/ /dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya/ /de ltar spyod pa legs 'tsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams/ /'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen
265a3(khri brgyad): dang ni gnas yin te/ /rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dren pa/ /gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs yin/ /grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha
265a4(khri brgyad): gyon byed de/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min/ /theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba med/ /mi ldog g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can
265a5(khri brgyad): yin| / de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med/ /the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba/ /gzhan
265a6(khri brgyad): gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya/ /'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'/ /sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par 'gyur med pa/ /de phyir phan mdzad
265a7(khri brgyad): brtser ldan byang chub brnyes nas ni/ sems can tshogs sus shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad/ /sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod/ /
265b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin/ /thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de/ /des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin/ /nam mkha'i khams
265b2(khri brgyad): ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang / /de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pha mtha' yas/ /steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod/ /tha dad gyur pa med
265b3(khri brgyad): cing bye brag gyur pa med/ /'dras pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma byon de bzhin nyid/ /da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid/ /chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal ba'i
265b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med/ /bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob
265b5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa/ /thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor/ /'dren pa'i shes rab med na thob par 'gyur ma yin/ /bya zhig lus tshe dpag med brgya rtsa lnga bcu par/ /gyur
265b6(khri brgyad): la 'dab gshog zad de nyam rtsal yod min na/ /de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir/ /bdag nyid mchongs na der ni nyam nyes gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba
265b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang / /bskal pa phye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing / /smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang / /thabs med shes
266a1(khri brgyad): rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung / /sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang / /'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang / /phan pa'i
266a2(khri brgyad): sems dang byams pa'i yid kyis brtul bya zhing / /tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya/ /'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa/ /yon tan rgya
266a3(khri brgyad): mtsho'i nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol/ /mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol/ /tha dad 'du
266a4(khri brgyad): shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra/ /dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la brten mi byed/ /mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs/ /de dag dge bcu'i
266a5(khri brgyad): las kyi lam la mngon par brtson/ /zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rjes su ston/ /chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan/ /'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug
266a6(khri brgyad): par shes bzhin rab tu ldan/ /gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med/ /gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben shing dag/ rnyed 'dod
266a7(khri brgyad): ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa/ /bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan der mi gnas//
266b1(khri brgyad): grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med/ /khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags/ /'tsho ba'i phyir ni ya ngas longs spyod 'tshol mi byed/ /drag shul spyod sngags
266b2(khri brgyad): mi byed bu mo sbyor sngags min/ /'dod pa'i las can phro mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed/ /rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson/ /'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing
266b3(khri brgyad): byams pa'i sems kyang brtan/ /kun mkhyen 'dod cing brten la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan/ /mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par spangs/ /rang gi sa
266b4(khri brgyad): la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra/ /chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson/ /mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya/ /gzugs dang
266b5(khri brgyad): tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams/ /zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing rab zhi ba/ /dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug 'tshol ba ltar/ /shes
266b6(khri brgyad): rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting mi rnyed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing / /theg pa don dam chags med gang la phung po dang / /khams
266b7(khri brgyad): dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i/ /bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod/ /dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bud med dus
267a1(khri brgyad): btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni/ /nyin gcig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas tho ba par 'gyur/ byang chub
267a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du/ /dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang / /gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos/ /brjod
267a3(khri brgyad): pa'i legs la sbyin dang tshul khrims char mi phod/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te/ /de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing //
267a4(khri brgyad): de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo na/ /dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med/ /bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang / /gsob dang
267a5(khri brgyad): ya ma brla dang snying po med par shes/ /de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod na/ /spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kyis
267a6(khri brgyad): bshad rab tu sbyar cing rab bstan pa'i/ /chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes nas/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings
267a7(khri brgyad): la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang / /chos de rnams kyang ming tsam du ni yongs su bsgrags/ /yongs bsngo rlom sems
267b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur/ /'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis/ /snying po tshig min de med
267b2(khri brgyad): par yang de mi tshig / me lce phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la/ /me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar/ /dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog rig ma yin la/ /de med
267b3(khri brgyad): par yang de la reg par nus ma yin/ /tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi ba thob min la/ /de med par yang de thob nus pa ma yin no/ /sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung //
267b4(khri brgyad): de yang 'gags la shing yang med pa der min ltar/ /de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te/ /de yang 'gags la byang chub med pa de ma yin/ /chu yi thigs pas
267b5(khri brgyad): bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar/ /rim gyis nyung du nyung dus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar/ /de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste/ /rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs
