295b4(khri brgyad): smras pa/ brgya byin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur ba ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs
295b5(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi/ dam pa gzhan slongs shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
295b6(khri brgyad): gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /lha'i dbang po/ bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ bden pa gang gis bdag bla na
295b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/
296a1(khri brgyad): bden pa de dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag gi lus sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig ces byas
296a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / skad cig/ thang cig/ yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i
296a3(khri brgyad): lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan
296a4(khri brgyad): glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
296a5(khri brgyad): smras so/ /rigs kyi bu tshur shog /kho mo'i khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba
296a6(khri brgyad): dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la 'ang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
296a7(khri brgyad): tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab
296b1(khri brgyad): yum| gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
296b2(khri brgyad): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig /bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems
296b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de'ang bdag
296b4(khri brgyad): cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig/ bu mo/
296b5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par
296b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas/
296b7(khri brgyad): de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
297a1(khri brgyad): 'phags la'ang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su'ang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/ mi dga' bar sems shing
297a2(khri brgyad): mchis te/ des nga ni lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi
297a3(khri brgyad): bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
297a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur sti bya'o/ /nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang /
297a5(khri brgyad): brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus
297a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi
297a7(khri brgyad): lag pa phug nas khrag gzags/ brla'i sha btogs te/ rus pa gcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas de khrag gzags
297b1(khri brgyad): pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/ /mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad
297b2(khri brgyad): du mchis nas/ 'di skad bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchis
297b3(khri brgyad): te| bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis khyod
297b4(khri brgyad): la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
297b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o zhes mchis nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu/ des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam
297b6(khri brgyad): pa'am khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston
297b7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga'
298a1(khri brgyad): ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas/ 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu dka' ba
298a2(khri brgyad): bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir
298a3(khri brgyad): chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
298a4(khri brgyad): bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor
298a5(khri brgyad): mang po de dag khyod la sbyin no/ /bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o/ /bdag gis kyang
298a6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o/ /gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis
298a7(khri brgyad): shing mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems
298b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po drug cu pa ste tha ma/ de nas bu mo de'i pha mas
298b2(khri brgyad): bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams
298b3(khri brgyad): cad la bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod nged
298b4(khri brgyad): kyis gnang gi/ bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro/ nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig /
298b5(khri brgyad): de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni dge
298b6(khri brgyad): ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /rgyan gyis
298b7(khri brgyad): brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
299a1(khri brgyad): ba dan dag thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba
299a2(khri brgyad): dang | myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs
299a3(khri brgyad): pa| de dag gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas/ pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song ba dang /
299a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin
299a5(khri brgyad): po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur
299a6(khri brgyad): dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam
299a7(khri brgyad): zhing mtshungs pa/ lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ legs par byas pa mthong
299b1(khri brgyad): ngo| |de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du
299b2(khri brgyad): mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang
299b3(khri brgyad): po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
299b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du
299b5(khri brgyad): shing rta de las babs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing / mdun du
299b6(khri brgyad): bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
299b7(khri brgyad): chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig
300a1(khri brgyad): byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir/ nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bdug spos kyi snod
300a2(khri brgyad): dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug
300a3(khri brgyad): par byed do/ /khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
300a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad du 'phyang bas brgyan to/ /de nas byang
300a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de/ bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan
300a6(khri brgyad): pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog mnad ra dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i dngul sil ma
300a7(khri brgyad): dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor ba mthong ngo / /lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so/ /mthong zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems
300b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di la
300b2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir me tog mnad ra dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang las ci'i phyir
300b3(khri brgyad): brdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni shes rab
300b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300b5(khri brgyad): chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/ khyod mi shes
300b6(khri brgyad): sam| de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha
300b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i
301a1(khri brgyad): nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya bdun gyis
301a2(khri brgyad): btab nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya
301a3(khri brgyad): dag dang tshogs nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
301a4(khri brgyad): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa
301a5(khri brgyad): byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
301a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas/
301a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi
301b1(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang /
301b2(khri brgyad): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas me
301b3(khri brgyad): tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul gyi me tog
301b4(khri brgyad): dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar
301b5(khri brgyad): 'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
301b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ngo mtshar to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
301b7(khri brgyad): 'phags 'di/ 'di lta bur rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 'di ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam
302a1(khri brgyad): par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam
302a2(khri brgyad): mo| |de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/ de dag thams
302a3(khri brgyad): cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs
302a4(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
302a5(khri brgyad): 'phags kyis/ chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig /bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / 'di lta bu'i chos
302a6(khri brgyad): rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin
302a7(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye
302b1(khri brgyad): bo mang po la ston par gyur cig / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs
302b2(khri brgyad): su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub
302b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems
302b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas zhe sa byed
302b5(khri brgyad): cing thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
302b6(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar
302b7(khri brgyad): phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su mchis nas/ 'di snyam du bsams
303a1(khri brgyad): te| bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ des
303a2(khri brgyad): bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung ba'i zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi /gzhan du na shes
303a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris
303a4(khri brgyad): so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song
303a5(khri brgyad): dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
303a6(khri brgyad): te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas/ ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la bde logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring
303a7(khri brgyad): mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag
303b1(khri brgyad): dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so/ /de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po
303b2(khri brgyad): skyes par gyur to/ /bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so//
303b3(khri brgyad): legs so/ /khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas
303b4(khri brgyad): so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar
303b5(khri brgyad): mdzad nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de
303b6(khri brgyad): dag gang du bzhud snyam mo/ /de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba
303b7(khri brgyad): bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /
304a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas
304a2(khri brgyad): byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal zhing / de bzhin gshegs
304a3(khri brgyad): pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
304a4(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub
304a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las
304a6(khri brgyad): ma g.yos so/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
304a7(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong pa nyid la 'ong
304b1(khri brgyad): ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de
304b2(khri brgyad): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs
304b3(khri brgyad): kyi bu/ 'gog pa la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i
304b4(khri brgyad): khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin
304b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid
304b6(khri brgyad): gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/
304b7(khri brgyad): nyin gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song /
305a1(khri brgyad): chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/
305a2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu/ smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu/ mi nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin
305a3(khri brgyad): can gyis/ smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /
305a4(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am /
305a5(khri brgyad): bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/
305a6(khri brgyad): dper na/ mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o//
305a7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid ni 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am/ bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
305b1(khri brgyad): dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta pa'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
305b2(khri brgyad): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa'am/ bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam /
305b3(khri brgyad): gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
305b4(khri brgyad): pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam la chos
305b5(khri brgyad): gang yang grub pa mi gda'o/ /rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lags pa'o/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
305b6(khri brgyad): pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de
305b7(khri brgyad): dag ni ming mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go/ gang
306a1(khri brgyad): dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong bar 'dod
306a2(khri brgyad): pas 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /
306a3(khri brgyad): yang rigs kyi bu/ gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de
306a4(khri brgyad): dag ni chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go/ gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de
306a5(khri brgyad): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par mi
306a6(khri brgyad): rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi
306a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so/ /
306b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang /
306b2(khri brgyad): steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung
306b3(khri brgyad): ste| de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas byung ngo / /rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang
306b4(khri brgyad): du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do/ /rkyen de dag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de
306b5(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu
306b6(khri brgyad): med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas 'di rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/ /de dag kyang
306b7(khri brgyad): rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na/ sku mngon par 'grub pa'ang mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang
307a1(khri brgyad): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa na'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/ brten nas 'byung ba rgyu la rag las/ rkyen la rag las pa'o/ /'di
307a2(khri brgyad): lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi wang de las sgra
307a3(khri brgyad): 'byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba
307a4(khri brgyad): las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
307a5(khri brgyad): 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis
307a6(khri brgyad): ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang
307a7(khri brgyad): ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
307b1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyis chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig / rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
307b2(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod
307b3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams
307b4(khri brgyad): cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs
307b5(khri brgyad): shing spa bkong bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
307b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang
307b7(khri brgyad): bab bo/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis
308a1(khri brgyad): 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ches/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang / don dam pa las
308a2(khri brgyad): byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
308a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di rgyu
308a4(khri brgyad): gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas
308a5(khri brgyad): srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa
308a6(khri brgyad): dang | srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
308a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /
308b1(khri brgyad): bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs pa rnyed do/ /'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
308b2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o/ /bdag ni the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa
308b3(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang / rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la
308b4(khri brgyad): bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
308b5(khri brgyad): brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la me tog mnad ra ba dag byin te/
308b6(khri brgyad): 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig /'di ni ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/
308b7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal pa grangs
309a1(khri brgyad): med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
309a2(khri brgyad): ngus| lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas
309a3(khri brgyad): bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ deng slan chad khyod kyi
309a4(khri brgyad): rim gro dang / zhabs 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo/ /des bdag gis lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
309a5(khri brgyad): kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
309a6(khri brgyad): so| |rigs kyi bu/ bdag cag kyang khyod la lus dbul gyi/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams
309a7(khri brgyad): dang | byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur bar bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo
309b1(khri brgyad): la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo dag /khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyod kho
309b2(khri brgyad): bos blang ngo / /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyis rjes su mthun par 'jug go/ khyod la lha pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul
309b3(khri brgyad): lo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas/
309b4(khri brgyad): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad
309b5(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
309b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
309b7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
310a1(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas
310a2(khri brgyad): nas| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub
310a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
310a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
310a5(khri brgyad): po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nub par gyur nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du
310a6(khri brgyad): sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha la/ 'di ni ma legs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
310a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du/ bdag 'greng ba'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas
310b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
310b2(khri brgyad): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
310b3(khri brgyad): du'ang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / bro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub
310b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs
310b5(khri brgyad): kyi bu de 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ legs par byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa
310b6(khri brgyad): p hyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byugs
310b7(khri brgyad): par bya'o snyam mo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis
311a1(khri brgyad): dus 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra thos te/
311a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'jug ste/ chos ston par 'gyur ro
311a3(khri brgyad): zhes grag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
311a4(khri brgyad): te| tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis rang
311a5(khri brgyad): rang gi bla gos phud de/ stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo / /de nas byang chub sems
311a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa'
311a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing / sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod
311b1(khri brgyad): pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du
311b2(khri brgyad): sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub
311b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig
311b4(khri brgyad): pa ni bla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khod pa dag na/ bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo//
311b5(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug
311b6(khri brgyad): tu chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang
311b7(khri brgyad): mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad
312a1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i glags rnyed par ma gyur par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do/ /de nas
312a2(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha
312a3(khri brgyad): chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na med
312a4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa
312a5(khri brgyad): la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu de'i dri
312a6(khri brgyad): dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
312a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang /
312b1(khri brgyad): chos yongs su 'tshol ba bla na med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang
312b2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
312b3(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas /
312b4(khri brgyad): chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la
312b5(khri brgyad): gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di
312b6(khri brgyad): skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
312b7(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig ces des de la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba khal stong byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
313a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so/ /me tog kha cig gis ni byang
313a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge
313a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin las langs te/ chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas
313a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong
313a5(khri brgyad): ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo/ /de nas byang chub
313a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313a7(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas
313b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes
313b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas
313b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /ri rab sna tshogs nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa
313b6(khri brgyad): med pa nyid do/ /gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa
313b7(khri brgyad): nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
314a1(khri brgyad): khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid
314a2(khri brgyad): do| |rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do/ /chos thams
314a3(khri brgyad): cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
314a4(khri brgyad): par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes
314a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe/ chos thams cad
314a6(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to/ /chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
314a7(khri brgyad): thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
314b1(khri brgyad): dang | chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin
314b2(khri brgyad): dang | nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa
314b3(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya
314b4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i
314b5(khri brgyad): khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
314b6(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
314b7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de la sogs pa ting
315a1(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu
315a2(khri brgyad): rtsa drug pa'o/ / //rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho
315a3(khri brgyad): phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
315a4(khri brgyad): na| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/
315a5(khri brgyad): tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen
315a6(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang /
315a7(khri brgyad): ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ /de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par
315b1(khri brgyad): gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur
315b2(khri brgyad): ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ dal ba phun sum tshogs
315b3(khri brgyad): pa ni bsgrubs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub
315b4(khri brgyad): pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi
315b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par
315b6(khri brgyad): yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun
315b7(khri brgyad): dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/
316a1(khri brgyad): gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing / rab
316a2(khri brgyad): tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra yug tu
316a3(khri brgyad): mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni nga'i gdams
316a4(khri brgyad): ngag go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de
316a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag gi ston pa
316a6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs
316a7(khri brgyad): pa la/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas
316b1(khri brgyad): so| |kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs pa dang / dad pa dang / gus par byas pa de bzhin du/ nga 'das nas shes rab
316b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byos shig / kun dga' bo/ ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la
316b3(khri brgyad): lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do/ /rjes su yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de
316b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol
316b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du
316b6(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
316b7(khri brgyad): dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol
317a1(khri brgyad): bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed
317a2(khri brgyad): pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
317a3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan
317a4(khri brgyad): pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /shes
317a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya da sha sa ha sri ka
317a6(khri brgyad): pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
317a7(khri brgyad): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong phrag du ma'i dge slong gi dge
317b1(khri brgyad): 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam
317b2(khri brgyad): par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob
317b3(khri brgyad): pa| srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa
317b4(khri brgyad): sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya tsam dang / dge
317b5(khri brgyad): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang bden pa mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzungs
317b6(khri brgyad): thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba/ ma brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod
317b7(khri brgyad): pa thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/ thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ shes
318a1(khri brgyad): kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i sems dang bral ba/ zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu
318a2(khri brgyad): son pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ bstan pa'i chos ston pas

318a5(khri brgyad): rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / brag ca dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bur mos
318a6(khri brgyad): pa| mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / phra ba mkhyen pa/ khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas
318a7(khri brgyad): pa| sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas
318b1(khri brgyad): kyi zhing mtha' yas par smon pa yongs su bzung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur

318b4(khri brgyad): dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon dang / nA las byin dang / gzas byin dang / chu lhas byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / blo gros rgya chen dang /

318b6(khri brgyad): brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na phyag rgya
318b7(khri brgyad): rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong
319a1(khri brgyad): phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /

319a5(khri brgyad): dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo

319b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
319b2(khri brgyad): pa la zhu ba'i phyir rtag tu skabs phye zin gyi/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs

319b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa de gang lags/ chos gang gi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa lags shing / myur du
319b6(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang

320a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /

320b1(khri brgyad): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

320b6(khri brgyad): bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du shes

321a6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i chos thams cad ni de dag yin no/ /mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

321b2(khri brgyad): ba bzhi gang lags/ zhes bya ba nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang lags/ zhes bya ba nas/

321b4(khri brgyad): bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/

321b6(khri brgyad): gnyis gang zhe na/ nang gi drug dang / phyi'i drug ste/ de dag ni skye mched bcu gnyis zhes bya'o/ /de la nang gi skye mched drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i

322a1(khri brgyad): skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched de/ de dag ni phyi'i skye mched

322b7(khri brgyad): 'gag par gyur te/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o/ /de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
323a1(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / sems la

323a3(khri brgyad): spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom

323a6(khri brgyad): rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / mi brjed pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing

323b1(khri brgyad): ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems

323b7(khri brgyad): lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/ /de la 'phags

324a2(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes

324b1(khri brgyad): rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa
324b2(khri brgyad): dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te
324b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de la
324b4(khri brgyad): dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba'ang spangs
324b5(khri brgyad): te| snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa /
324b6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhin bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
324b7(khri brgyad): btang snyoms te/ de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam
325a1(khri brgyad): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de/ de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
325a2(khri brgyad): pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi
325a3(khri brgyad): rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las
325a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
325a5(khri brgyad): mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchad las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/
325a6(khri brgyad): snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
325a7(khri brgyad): ci'ang med do snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
325b1(khri brgyad): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par
325b2(khri brgyad): 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
325b3(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
325b4(khri brgyad): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang po'o/ /de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/
325b5(khri brgyad): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur bas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
325b6(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags
325b7(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi gang dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par
326a1(khri brgyad): 'jug pa gsum pa'o/ /de bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba nub pas sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde
326a2(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
326a3(khri brgyad): shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas
326a4(khri brgyad): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
326a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
326a6(khri brgyad): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang
326a7(khri brgyad): med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
326b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas
326b2(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la 'du shes dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i
326b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes
326b4(khri brgyad): dang | rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/ de dag ni 'du shes dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la rjes su dran pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
326b5(khri brgyad): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran
326b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa ste/ de dag ni rjes su dran pa bcu zhes bya'o/ /de la 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du
326b7(khri brgyad): shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i
327a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes te/ de dag ni 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug ces bya'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po rnams yongs su sbyang ba/ bya ba la yongs su gcod pa'i
327a2(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni chos shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs par shes pa gang zhe na/ mig mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce
327a3(khri brgyad): dang | lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni rjes su rtogs par shes pa zhes bya'o//
327a4(khri brgyad): de la pha rol gyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/ sems nyid kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la the tshom
327a5(khri brgyad): med par shes pa ste/ de ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun rdzob shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la sdug
327a6(khri brgyad): bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal skye ba dang gnas pa shes pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spong ba
327a7(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa
327b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang /
327b2(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams zad par shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams su mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni mi skye ba
327b3(khri brgyad): shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang yin pa ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mi shes
327b4(khri brgyad): pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
327b5(khri brgyad): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par
327b6(khri brgyad): rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la
327b7(khri brgyad): kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slob pa/ 'di lta ste/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang /
328a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
328a2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ 'dod pa
328a3(khri brgyad): dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/ de ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge
328a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi
328a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po nas bzung ste/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa
328a6(khri brgyad): ste| de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha
328a7(khri brgyad): dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/ zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/ de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon
328b1(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/
328b2(khri brgyad): zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/ de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta
328b3(khri brgyad): bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na zar ma'i me tog gam/ yul wA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po
328b4(khri brgyad): 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
328b5(khri brgyad): mched gsum pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od zer po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na dong ka'i me
328b6(khri brgyad): tog gam/ yul wA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
328b7(khri brgyad): ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi
329a1(khri brgyad): gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na ban+d+hu dzi ba'i me tog gam/ yul wA ra NA si'i ras
329a2(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar
329a3(khri brgyad): po| dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/
329a4(khri brgyad): kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skar ma ba ba sangs kyi mdog dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/
329a5(khri brgyad): 'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba
329a6(khri brgyad): 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
329a7(khri brgyad): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon
329b1(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
329b2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
329b3(khri brgyad): ste| zad par sa dang / zad par chu dang / zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par nam mkha' dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar
329b4(khri brgyad): po dang / zad par rnam par shes pa ste/ de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/ khams thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang sa'i khams kho nar khams
