329b5(khri brgyad): gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad chu'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang chu'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad me'i khams su mos par
329b6(khri brgyad): byed de/ thams cad kyang me'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad rlung gi khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang rlung gi khams kho nar khams gcig
329b7(khri brgyad): tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad sngon por mos
330a1(khri brgyad): par byed de/ thams cad kyang sngon po nyid du 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad ser por mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang ser po kho nar 'gyur ro/ /khams thams
330a2(khri brgyad): cad dmar por mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang dmar po kho nar 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad dkar por mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang dkar po kho nar 'gyur ro/ /khams thams
330a3(khri brgyad): cad rnam par shes par mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / sngon po dang /
330a4(khri brgyad): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang gcig kho nar 'gyur te/ de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/ /zad par du skye ba rgyas par byed
330a5(khri brgyad): pas de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/ /re re'ang skye mched thams cad du 'gyur te de'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la stong pa nyid bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di
330a6(khri brgyad): lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
330a7(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
330b1(khri brgyad): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /
330b2(khri brgyad): de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa
330b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sna dang / lce
330b4(khri brgyad): dang / lus dang / yid ni yid kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi'i chos rnams zhes bya
330b5(khri brgyad): ba ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs rnams ni gzugs rnams
330b6(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
330b7(khri brgyad): rnams ni chos rnams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes
331a1(khri brgyad): bya ba ni nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams
331a2(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i
331a3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos
331a4(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des kyang chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces
331a5(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin
331a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams bzhi ste/ phyogs de brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /steng gi
331a7(khri brgyad): phyogs ni steng gi phyogs kyis stong ngo / /'og gi phyogs kyang 'og gi phyogs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la
331b1(khri brgyad): don rnam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba la/ don dam pa zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med
331b2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid
331b3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i
331b4(khri brgyad): khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo / /de
331b5(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni chos gang la skye ba
331b6(khri brgyad): med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ni 'dus ma byas
331b7(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa
332a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ chos gang la skye ba shin tu mi dmigs pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni mtha'
332a2(khri brgyad): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos gang la 'ong ba mi dmigs
332a3(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa
332a4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir gang la chos gang yang dor du med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rang
332a5(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan
332a6(khri brgyad): thos rnams kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mdzad pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
332a7(khri brgyad): na| de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba la/ gzugs kyi
332b1(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni kun tu shes par byed pa/ 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa/ rnam par shes
332b2(khri brgyad): pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes par byed pa ste/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar
332b3(khri brgyad): te| ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid de dag thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de
332b4(khri brgyad): ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad
332b5(khri brgyad): dang / chos gzugs can rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /
332b6(khri brgyad): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la mi
332b7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ de'ang ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de
333a1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dngos po 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/ de ni
333a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yang med pa ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dngos
333a3(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid 'ga' yang med pa ste/ de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu /
333a4(khri brgyad): gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo / /dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo / /de la
333a5(khri brgyad): dngos po gang zhe na/ dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga po rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ste/ de la
333a6(khri brgyad): dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo / /ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de la 'dus ma byas pa ni 'dus ma byas
333a7(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo / /ji ltar na ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas kyang
333b1(khri brgyad): ma byas/ mthong bas kyang ma byas/ gang gis kyang ma byas pa ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar na gzhan gyi dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong zhe na/ gang de bzhin
333b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin
333b3(khri brgyad): nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa nyid de/ chos 'di dag gi gzhan gyi stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan
333b4(khri brgyad): gyi dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par zhen par mi bya ba'i chos thams cad ni de dag yin
333b5(khri brgyad): no| |mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
333b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan
333b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas la'ang
334a1(khri brgyad): gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'das pa
334a2(khri brgyad): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang / las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi sgo dang / rgyu'i sgo nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
334a3(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams du ma pa/ khams sna tshogs pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / des sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams
334a4(khri brgyad): kyi mos pa sna tshogs nyid dang / mos pa du ma nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / des sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /
334a5(khri brgyad): mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
334a6(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes pa yang dag
334a7(khri brgyad): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /
334b1(khri brgyad): zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med par sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba'i tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag
334b2(khri brgyad): gi skye ba ni zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bdag gi bya ba ni byas so/ /srid pa ni 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
334b3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ 'dir chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/ /
334b4(khri brgyad): zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
334b5(khri brgyad): ste| ngas rgyud de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste/ gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thib ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /
334b6(khri brgyad): 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang chos dang mthun par ma bskor
334b7(khri brgyad): ba rab tu bskor ro zhes bya ba dang / nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na 'dir zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang
335a1(khri brgyad): rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ nges rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas
335a2(khri brgyad): bde ba thob ste/ gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par
335a3(khri brgyad): bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par ma bskor bar bskor ro zhes bya ba
335a4(khri brgyad): dang / ngas bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud
335a5(khri brgyad): dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
335a6(khri brgyad): bas bde ba thob ste/ gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par
335a7(khri brgyad): bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba bskor ro zhes bya ba
335b1(khri brgyad): dang / ngas nyan thos rnams la 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa nges par 'byed pa de byed pa sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gang bshad pa de bsgrubs na/ nges par 'byin nas
335b2(khri brgyad): ma yin zhing sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig
335b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob ste gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs
335b4(khri brgyad): pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/
335b5(khri brgyad): bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ro zhes bya ba ste/ de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la so so yang dag par rig
335b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par
335b7(khri brgyad): rig pa ste/ de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la byams pa chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la dgra bo dang / mdza' bshes la
336a1(khri brgyad): 'dra bar mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ sems can yod pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la byams
336a2(khri brgyad): pa mi gtong ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca
336a3(khri brgyad): co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa
336a4(khri brgyad): nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba
336a5(khri brgyad): nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las
336a6(khri brgyad): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags
336a7(khri brgyad): ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i
336b1(khri brgyad): ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la thams cad shes pa nyid gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams skye mched bcu
336b2(khri brgyad): gnyis po de dag la gang zag la bdag med par phyogs gcig shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang zhe na/ byang chub
336b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' thig pa gsum gyi lam shes kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pas dga' bar mi sems kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba gang yin
336b4(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum po dag tu rnam pa thams cad du chos thams
336b5(khri brgyad): cad la the tshom med par mkhyen pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
336b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
336b7(khri brgyad): ste| de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o/ /de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i
337a1(khri brgyad): mig shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems
337a2(khri brgyad): shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa
337a3(khri brgyad): mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug ces bya'o/ /de la mig lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes
337a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig ste/ de dag ni mig lnga zhes bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
337a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa ni 'di yin te/ zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg pa ste/
337a6(khri brgyad): dper na/ za ma tog gi zhabs mnyam zhing zhabs phyang nge bas gzhi shin tu mnyam pa la bzhag na/ 'og gi zhabs thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
337a7(khri brgyad): 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa ni 'di yin te/ zhabs kyi 'og
337b1(khri brgyad): gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lta ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mdzes par skyes pa gang dag yin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
337b2(khri brgyad): 'das ni phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa yin no/ /de la phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid ni 'di yin te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi
337b3(khri brgyad): 'da' ba lta bu ste/ ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni sor mo ring ba yin no/ /de la sor mo ring ba nyid ni 'di yin te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dag
337b4(khri brgyad): lhag par ring ba yin te/ ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs dra ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs la dra ba lhag pa dag skyes te/ ji
337b5(khri brgyad): ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la rting pa yangs pa ni 'di yin te/ de'i zhabs kyi rting pa gnyis kyi mthil ni yangs
337b6(khri brgyad): pa ste/ ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa yin no/ /de la zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa nyid ni 'di yin te/
337b7(khri brgyad): rting pa yangs pa la yang dag par sbyor la/ rting pa yangs pa'ang zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa la sbyor ba ste/ ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
338a1(khri brgyad): byin pa ri dwags e n+ya ya'i lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la byin pa ri dwags e n+ya ya'i lta bu ni 'di yin te/ de'i byin pa byin gyis phra bar skyes shing / byin gyis phra
338a2(khri brgyad): bar yang dag par byung ba ste/ dper na/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po e n+ya ya'i lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo sleb pa yin no/ /de la bzhengs
338a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo sleb pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs na sku ma btud par phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la yang dag par reg par mdzad
338a4(khri brgyad): cing kun tu nyug par mdzad pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no/ /de la 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid ni 'di yin te/ dper na rigs btsun
338a5(khri brgyad): pa'i glang po che cang shes sam/ rta cang shes kyi lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spu re re nas mdzes par skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil ba yin no/ /de la spu re re nas mdzes par skye zhing
338a6(khri brgyad): g.yas su 'khyil ba nyid ni 'di yin te/ de'i spu'i khung bu re re nas spu re re mthon mthing la lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil cing mdzes par skyes pa yin no/ /
338a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ni sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid ni 'di yin te/ de'i sku dang dbu las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang / spu rnams ni kha gyen du
338b1(khri brgyad): ltas shing mthon mthing la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil ba mdzes par skyes pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa yin no//
338b2(khri brgyad): de la pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa ni 'di yin te/ de'i sku la chu'am rdul kun tu mi 'chags shing mi gnas pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mdog gser lta bu dang ldan te/ dper na/
338b3(khri brgyad): dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mchod sdong la rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa ltar gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa yin te/ des na gser gyi mdog lta bu zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
338b4(khri brgyad): ni bdun mtho ba yin no/ /de la bdun mtho ba nyid ni 'di yin te/ de'i zhabs gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su
338b5(khri brgyad): rgyas par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du phyag gnyis kyi mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang / thal gong gnyis su
338b6(khri brgyad): gnyis mtho bar gyur pa dang / gnya' gong du mtho ba gcig gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dpung
338b7(khri brgyad): mgo shin tu zlum pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni sku shin tu drang por 'khrungs pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
339a1(khri brgyad): sku n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no/ /de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/ chur ji srid pa zheng du'ang de srid la/ zheng du ji srid pa chur yang
339a2(khri brgyad): de srid de/ de ni n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni 'gram pa seng+ge'i dang 'dra ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yin no/ /bcom ldan
339a3(khri brgyad): 'das ni tshems thags bzang ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni tshems rtse mo mtho zhing rno la dkar ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni mgur drang
339a4(khri brgyad): por mid pa drang zhing ma yo la thogs pa med par mid du rung bar gyur pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no/ /de la ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/
339a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhengs na zhal nas ljags phyung ste/ shangs kyi bu ga gnyis dang / spyan gyi khung bu gnyis dang / snyan gyi bu ga gnyis su reg par mdzad cing yongs su
339a6(khri brgyad): nyug par mdzad la/ dbu'i mtshams su thug pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang 'gebs par mdzad pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa
339a7(khri brgyad): yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan yangs shing ba'i rdzi ma lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan mthon mthing lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan gyi
339b1(khri brgyad): tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni 'od 'dom gang ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mdzod spu smin mtshams su 'khrungs
339b2(khri brgyad): la shing bal ltar 'jam zhing me tog kund dang / zla ba dang / dung dang / pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang / ba'i 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dbu gtsug tor
339b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o/ /de la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo
339b4(khri brgyad): zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /sred med kyi bu ltar sku grims pa yin no/ /pus mo'i lha nga dag mdzes par grub pa yin no/ /sku gtsang ba dag yin no/ /sku 'jam pa dag yin no//
339b5(khri brgyad): sku gnyen pa dag yin no/ /sku snum bag can dag yin no/ /sku ma btud pa dag yin no/ /sor mo rnams ring ba dang byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
339b6(khri brgyad): ni sor mo rnams zlum pa dag yin no/ /sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/ /rtsa rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no/ /long bu rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no/ /sku dbyibs legs
339b7(khri brgyad): pa dag yin no/ /sku shin tu legs par 'brel ba dag yin no/ /skye mched rnams shin tu yongs su dag pa dag yin no/ /mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa dag yin no/ /spyod lam
340a1(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dpal dang blo gros dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /lta bar 'os pa dag yin no/ /zhal
340a2(khri brgyad): ha cang mi ring ba dag yin no/ /zhal kang kong med pa dag yin no/ /sgros bim+pa ltar dmar ba dag yin no/ /zhal yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no/ /dbyangs zab pa dag yin no/ /
340a3(khri brgyad): lte ba zab pa dag yin no/ /lte ba shin tu zlum pa dag yin no/ /lte ba g.yas su 'khyil ba dag yin no/ /phyag dang zhabs yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
340a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /phyag gi mthil mnyam pa dag yin no/ /phyag gi ri mo bar ma chad pa dag yin no/ /
340a5(khri brgyad): phyag gi ri mo mtho ba dag yin no/ /sku la dri ma med cing dri mi zhim pa med pa dag yin no/ /mdog gsal ba dag yin no/ /skye mched kyi sgo bzang ba dag yin no/ /zhal zla ba lta
340a6(khri brgyad): bu dag yin no/ /gsong por gsung ba dag yin no/ /zhal la khro gnyer gyi rim pa med pa dag yin no/ /spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dag yin no/ /
340a7(khri brgyad): de dag gi zhal dri zhim pa dag yin no/ /seng+ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no/ /glang po che'i dbang po'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no/ /ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs
340b1(khri brgyad): pa dag yin no/ /dbu gdugs 'dra ba dag yin no/ /gsung snyan cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag yin no/ /tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /shangs mtho ba dag
340b2(khri brgyad): yin no/ /ljags dmar ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ljags srab cing che ba dag yin no/ /spu mthon mthing can dag yin no/ /spu gtsang ba dag yin no/ /spyan
340b3(khri brgyad): yangs pa dag yin no/ /bu ga'i sgo rnams yongs su ma nyams pa dag yin no/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dmar ba dag yin no/ /lte ba ma bye ba dag yin no/ /sku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no/ /phyal phyang
340b4(khri brgyad): nge ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku la gnyer ma med pa dag yin no/ /tshigs mdzes pa dag yin no/ /tshigs ring ba dag yin no/ /phyag dang zhabs yongs su dag pa dag
340b5(khri brgyad): yin no/ /'od 'dom gang mnyam pa dag yin no/ /'od kyis gsal bar mdzad cing gshegs pa dag yin no/ /lha dang mi gang dag de dag gi sku mthong ba de dang tshim par 'gyur ro/ /srog chags thams
340b6(khri brgyad): cad kyis mthong yang brnyas par mi byed do/ /sems can rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad do/ /de dag gi gsung ni 'khor dang mthun par khyab par mdzad kyi 'khor gyi phyi rol tu gsung mi 'gro'o/ /
340b7(khri brgyad): ro stod seng+ge'i lta bu dag yin no/ /sku'i tshigs legs par 'brel pa dag yin no/ /spyi gtsug bltar mi mngon pa dag yin no/ /dbu skra mthon mthing la 'jam zhing ring ba dag yin no/ /dbu skra ma
341a1(khri brgyad): 'khrugs pa dag yin no/ /dbu skra gyen du phyogs shing bzang la lcang lor 'khyil ba dag yin no/ /dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no/ /thugs kar dpal gyi be'us
341a2(khri brgyad): legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mtshan dpal gyis 'bar ba dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshal dang / ldong
341a3(khri brgyad): ros dang / tsi na piSh+Ta dang / mthing shun dang / zangs g.ya'i kha dog gis bris pa lta bu'i mtshan rnams dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu zhes bya'o/ /de nas
341a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos
341a5(khri brgyad): thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi bgyi na/ des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di dag
341a6(khri brgyad): ni dge ba'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni
341a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos
341b1(khri brgyad): rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni thun mong ma lags pa'i chos rnams so zhes
341b2(khri brgyad): bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub kyi lam ji ltar bsgrub par bgyid lags/ ma bsgrubs na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur lags/ de skad
341b3(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par
341b4(khri brgyad): mthong mod kyi/ de ni kun rdzob tu yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na kun rdzob tu lags kyi/ don dam par ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
341b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du de la 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba rnams gang yin snyam du sems pa las de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ phar
341b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
341b7(khri brgyad): dang | tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang
342a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i bsod nams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du
342a2(khri brgyad): shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i
342a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
342a4(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su
342a5(khri brgyad): dran pa dang / nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa ste/ de dag ni
342a6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so/ /de la mi dge ba'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par
342a7(khri brgyad): len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par
342b1(khri brgyad): lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ de dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams yin no snyam
342b2(khri brgyad): du sems so/ /de la lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las lung du ma bstan pa dang / ngag gi las lung du ma bstan pa dang /
342b3(khri brgyad): yid kyi las lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi lung du ma bstan pa dang / dbang po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang / phung po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang / skye mched bcu
342b4(khri brgyad): gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / rnam par smin pa ste/ de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang
342b5(khri brgyad): yin snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
342b6(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /
342b7(khri brgyad): kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin
343a1(khri brgyad): dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
343a2(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das
343a3(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so/ /de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ khams gsum du gtogs pa/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco
343a4(khri brgyad): brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la zag pa
343a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / de bzhin du bsdus te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
343a6(khri brgyad): yin no/ /de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du phung po lnga dang / bsam
343a7(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du
343b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yin no/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig
343b2(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa dang / de bzhin du 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin du chos gnas pa dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi
343b3(khri brgyad): dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos
343b4(khri brgyad): rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la thun mong ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad mad pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
343b5(khri brgyad): shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos rnams yin no/ /de la so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
343b6(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
343b7(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na kun rdzob tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/
344a1(khri brgyad): don dam par ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /ji ltar mngon par zhen par mi byed ce na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis sgyu ma sprul ba'i
344a2(khri brgyad): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs shig mthong na/ de la dpung gi tshogs yin no/ /
344a3(khri brgyad): snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par ni
344a4(khri brgyad): mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la tsha bas gdungs pa zhig gis smig rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dpa' rlabs 'dra bar g.yo ba mthong na/ 'di ni chu yin no snyam du mngon par zhen
344a5(khri brgyad): par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa
344a6(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis rmi lam na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag mthong yang sad nas de dag gi gzugs yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
344a7(khri brgyad): bu| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la
344b1(khri brgyad): zhig gis chu'i nang na zla ba mthong na de de la zla ba yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad
344b2(khri brgyad): tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis mig g.yor mthong na de la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
344b3(khri brgyad): bu| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ chos thams cad la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
344b4(khri brgyad): bu| dper na/ mi la la zhig gis rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro'ang de la nam mkha'o snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
344b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la rnam par dpyad na/ chos de dag thams cad nyid la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis brag ca'i sgra
344b6(khri brgyad): thos na sgra yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/
344b7(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis dri za'i grong khyer mthong na/ de de la grong khyer yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
345a1(khri brgyad): bu| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa
345a2(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis me long gi nang du bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong na 'di bzhin yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du
345a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
345a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /chos rnams la mngon par ma zhen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
345a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ chos
345a6(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
345a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par zhen pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su
345b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / sems rnam par rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par zhen pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad
345b2(khri brgyad): la lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang /
345b3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
345b4(khri brgyad): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar par lta ba dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
345b5(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes su lta ba dang / rjes su dran par lta ba dang / 'du shes kyi rnam par lta ba dang / shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba
345b6(khri brgyad): dang | dbang por lta ba dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched du lta ba dang / zad par gyi skye mched du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
345b7(khri brgyad): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid
346a1(khri brgyad): dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du lta ba dang / de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ming du lta ba dang / mtshan du lta ba
346a2(khri brgyad): dang / dpe byad bzang por lta ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
346a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
346a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phung po lnga nas/ rga shi'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
346a5(khri brgyad): bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
346a6(khri brgyad): bcu nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag rtag
346a7(khri brgyad): pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal pa'am/ bdag yod pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ stong pa'am/ mi stong pa'am/ mtshan ma yod pa'am/ mtshan ma
346b1(khri brgyad): med pa'am/ smon pa yod pa'am/ smon pa med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi ba'am/ dben pa'am/ mi dben pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ skye
346b2(khri brgyad): ba'am/ mi skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ mi 'gag pa'am/ dngos po'am/ dngos po med par lta zhing dmigs la 'dzin cing mtshan mar byed pa dang / rtog pa dang yongs su dpyod
346b3(khri brgyad): par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems
346b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni lung du
346b5(khri brgyad): ma bstan pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so/ /
346b6(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so/ /'di dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams so/ /'di dag
346b7(khri brgyad): ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams so zhes bya bar lta zhing dmigs la 'dzin cing mtshan mar byed pa dang / rtog pa dang yongs su dpyod par byed na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang
347a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa'i phyir dang /
347a2(khri brgyad): sems can mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sems can skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / sems can 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de bzhin du
347a3(khri brgyad): srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed pa po nyid dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba
347a4(khri brgyad): po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dang / mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang / stong pa nyid kyis
347a5(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / stong pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gso ba dang / ya ma brla dang / bdag po med pa dang / byung ba med pa dang / ma byas
347a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / byed pa po dang bral ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs de ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming tsam mo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
347a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rga ba dang 'chi ba'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming tsam mo/ /'phags
347b1(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming tsam mo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin
347b2(khri brgyad): du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po 'di dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming tsam mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag
347b3(khri brgyad): ni| 'di lta ste/ ming tsam mo/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ming tsam po gang dag yin pa de la yang dag par yongs su grub pa 'ga' zhig yod
347b4(khri brgyad): dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te yongs su grub par lta zhing
347b5(khri brgyad): dmigs la 'dzin cing mtshan mar byed/ rtog pa dang dpyod par byed na/ de lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems rnam par rmongs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags
347b6(khri brgyad): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'di ltar lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems rnam par rmongs pa gnyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par zhen
347b7(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba 'di'i tshig bla dwags yin par rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
348a1(khri brgyad): 'das/ rnam grangs gang gis na phung po lnga nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du ming tsam du bas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
348a2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag
348a3(khri brgyad): pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ phung po'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di
348a4(khri brgyad): lta ste/ nang gi skye mched drug ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gis
348a5(khri brgyad): brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la nang gi skye mched drug gi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
348a6(khri brgyad): phyi'i skye mched drug ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha
348a7(khri brgyad): snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ phyi'i skye mched drug gi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
348b1(khri brgyad): khams bco brgyad ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa
348b2(khri brgyad): kho nar zad la/ khams kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag
348b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ 'phags pa'i
348b4(khri brgyad): bden pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba
348b5(khri brgyad): gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ rten cing
348b6(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag
348b7(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ dran pa nye
349a1(khri brgyad): bar bzhag pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong
349a2(khri brgyad): ba bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs
349a3(khri brgyad): pa kho nar zad la/ yang dag par spong ba'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
349a4(khri brgyad): pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs
349a5(khri brgyad): pa kho nar zad la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po lnga zhes
349a6(khri brgyad): bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gis brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa
349a7(khri brgyad): kho nar zad la/ dbang po lnga'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/
349b1(khri brgyad): chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ stobs kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med
349b2(khri brgyad): phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags
349b3(khri brgyad): pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med
349b4(khri brgyad): phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos
349b5(khri brgyad): su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ming
349b6(khri brgyad): de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta
349b7(khri brgyad): ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ rnam par thar pa'i ming de dag
350a1(khri brgyad): kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa
350a2(khri brgyad): de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ bsam gtan
350a3(khri brgyad): gyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/
350a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ tshad med pa'i ming de
350a5(khri brgyad): dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag
350a6(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad
350a7(khri brgyad): do| |gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam
350b1(khri brgyad): par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad
350b2(khri brgyad): du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ rnam par thar pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mthar
350b3(khri brgyad): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa
350b4(khri brgyad): med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar
350b5(khri brgyad): na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes dgu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye
350b6(khri brgyad): ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ 'du shes kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas
350b7(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su dran pa bcu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba
351a1(khri brgyad): med| 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ rjes su dran pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i
351a2(khri brgyad): bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags
351a3(khri brgyad): pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug gi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis
351a4(khri brgyad): ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ shes pa bcu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa
351a5(khri brgyad): de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ shes pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang
351a6(khri brgyad): mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la
351a7(khri brgyad): ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar
351b1(khri brgyad): na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po gsum zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba
351b2(khri brgyad): med| 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ dbang po'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
351b3(khri brgyad): bu| 'di lta ste/ zil gyi gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag
351b4(khri brgyad): pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas
351b5(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med
351b6(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ zad par gyi skye mched kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi
351b7(khri brgyad): gnas so/ / //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po gsum pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid bco brgyad ces bya ba gang dag
352a1(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs
352a2(khri brgyad): pa kho nar zad la/ stong pa nyid kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
352a3(khri brgyad): stobs bcu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha
352a4(khri brgyad): snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa
352a5(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag
352a6(khri brgyad): pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ mi 'jigs pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /
352a7(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de
352b1(khri brgyad): la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ so sor yang dag par rig pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar
352b2(khri brgyad): na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/
352b3(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ byams pa chen po'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA
352b4(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi
352b5(khri brgyad): brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ snying rje chen po'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
352b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/
352b7(khri brgyad): ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /
353a1(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba gang dag yin
353a2(khri brgyad): pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ thams
353a3(khri brgyad): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas
353a4(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/
353a5(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas
353a6(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa drug ces bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni
353a7(khri brgyad): skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ mngon par shes pa'i ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i
353b1(khri brgyad): bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mig lnga zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni
353b2(khri brgyad): skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ mig gi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas
353b3(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su
353b4(khri brgyad): btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ming de dag kyang nang na'ang
353b5(khri brgyad): med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu zhes bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/
353b6(khri brgyad): chos su btags pa tsam du zad do/ /chos su btags pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming gi brdas tha snyad du 'dogs pa kho nar zad la/ dpe byad bzang po'i ming
353b7(khri brgyad): de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
354a1(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pas ming gi brdas btags pa dang / chos su btags pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming gi brdar
354a2(khri brgyad): btags pa'i chos de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ /des ming gi brdar btags pa'i chos khong du chud pas/ gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
354a3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
354a4(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
354a5(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
354a6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug
354a7(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
354b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad btags pa tsam dang / ming tsam du bas pa lags na/ 'o na btsun
354b2(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags sam/ byang chub kyi bar
354b3(khri brgyad): yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags sam/ de lta lags na ni tshangs par spyod pa'ang dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dngos po ma mchis/ pha
354b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug kyang dngos po ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sdug bsngal las rnam par grol
354b5(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma mchis par bdag smra lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam
354b6(khri brgyad): du sems/ gzugs dngos por mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang /
354b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos por mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji
355a1(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ mig dngos por mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/

355a5(khri brgyad): khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos por mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
