357b7(khri brgyad): 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags
358a1(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom
358a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam
358a3(khri brgyad): par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi
358a4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam
358a5(khri brgyad): du sems/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom
358a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po dang dngos po med par
358a7(khri brgyad): mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i
358b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du
358b2(khri brgyad): sems/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/
358b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po dang
358b4(khri brgyad): dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
358b5(khri brgyad): dang / rga shi'i bar du dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ dran pa nye
358b6(khri brgyad): par bzhag pa bzhi dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom
358b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du
359a1(khri brgyad): dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems
359a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol
359a3(khri brgyad): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du dngos po dang dngos
359a4(khri brgyad): po med par mthong bas rnam par grol snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
359a5(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod don gyi dbang gang mthong na 'di skad du gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du dngos por mthong bas kyang rnam par mi grol la/
359a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med par mthong bas kyang ma yin zhing / dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas kyang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mig dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar dang / de bzhin
359a7(khri brgyad): du gzugs rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar dang /
359b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
359b2(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
359b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag dngos por
359b4(khri brgyad): mthong bas kyang rnam par mi grol la/ dngos po med par mthong bas kyang ma yin zhing / dngos po dang dngos po med par mthong bas kyang rnam par mi grol/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar
359b5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi phung por bstan pa bzhin du thams cad du rgyas par bya'o zhes smra/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
359b6(khri brgyad): to| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs dngos por mthong ba'am/ dngos po ma mchis par mthong ba'am/ dngos po dang
359b7(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis par mthong bas rnam par grol bar lta ga la 'gyur lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin
360a1(khri brgyad): du mig dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi
360a2(khri brgyad): khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar dang / de bzhin du
360a3(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/
360a4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / de
360a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags na/ de dag dngos por mthong ba'am/ dngos po ma
360a6(khri brgyad): mchis par mthong ba'am/ dngos po dang dngos po ma mchis par mthong bas rnam par grol bar lta ga la 'gyur lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
360a7(khri brgyad): ltar nyon mongs pa ni mtshan ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /mtshan ma gang lags she na/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags te/
360b1(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par mi grol lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis
360b2(khri brgyad): tshig de ni legs par smras so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360b3(khri brgyad): khri pa las/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
360b4(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar mngon par ma zhen par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol
360b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi
360b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par
360b7(khri brgyad): shes pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi stong pa nyid la
361a1(khri brgyad): brtson na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid la brtson
361a2(khri brgyad): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sgra dang
361a3(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na shes
361a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna
361a5(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams

361a7(khri brgyad): dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi stong
361b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'gog pa'i stong pa nyid dang / lam gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na shes

361b4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / len pa'i stong pa nyid dang / srid pa'i stong pa nyid dang / skye ba'i stong pa nyid dang / rga shi'i stong pa nyid la brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o
361b5(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing stong pa nyid de dag la brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
361b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa de ni gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de
361b7(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du
362a1(khri brgyad): mig la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la brtson
362a2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du gzugs rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong

362a4(khri brgyad): la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams

362b1(khri brgyad): bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du

362b3(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/

362b7(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs bdag ces bya
363a1(khri brgyad): ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag
363a2(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du tshor ba
363a3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/

363b7(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtag
364a1(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

364a3(khri brgyad): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
364a4(khri brgyad): ngo| |mig stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes
364a5(khri brgyad): bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang

364b1(khri brgyad): ngo| |mig zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag
364b2(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig dben zhes bya ba'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben zhes bya ba'am
364b3(khri brgyad): mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna
364b4(khri brgyad): dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig skye zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya bar yang dag
364b5(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skye zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig dngos po yod
364b6(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/ dngos po med
364b7(khri brgyad): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /gzugs rnams
365a1(khri brgyad): bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams bdag yod
365a2(khri brgyad): pa'am/ bdag med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams stong pa'am/ mi stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par
365a3(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de
365a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar
365a5(khri brgyad): la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams dben
365a6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am /
365a7(khri brgyad): rnam par byang zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams skye zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya bar yang dag par
365b1(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /gzugs rnams dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin
365b2(khri brgyad): du chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi khams dang /
365b3(khri brgyad): chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba'am/ bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ bdag ces bya ba'am/
365b4(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba'am/ stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba'am/ smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa med ces
365b5(khri brgyad): bya ba'am/ zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba'am/ dben zhes bya ba'am/ mi dben zhes bya ba'am/ kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba'am/ skye
365b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya ba'am/ dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag
365b7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sngar ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya
366a1(khri brgyad): bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du snga ma ji lta bar thams cad du ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su bstan pa bzhin
366a2(khri brgyad): du rgya cher sbyar ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
366a3(khri brgyad): stong pa la 'jug cing / zhugs nas kyang gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed do//
366a4(khri brgyad): gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
366a5(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
366a6(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des phyi ma'i mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor
366a7(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des phyi ma'i mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes
366b1(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /gzugs dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du
366b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su
366b3(khri brgyad): mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni mig dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de
366b4(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' 'di yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi
366b5(khri brgyad): 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
366b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar des phyi ma'i mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de
366b7(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des phyi ma'i mtha' nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /mig dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar
367a1(khri brgyad): byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /
367a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar nang gi skye mched la sbyar ba de bzhin du/ phyi'i skye mched rnams la'ang sbyar bar
367a3(khri brgyad): bya'o| |de bzhin du mig gi khams dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang ma yin zhing / de ltar byung ba la'ang mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
367a4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes
367a5(khri brgyad): pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
367a6(khri brgyad): lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi
367a7(khri brgyad): khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
367b1(khri brgyad): na| 'di ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang
367b2(khri brgyad): rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar dang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
367b3(khri brgyad): ltar des sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
367b4(khri brgyad): brtson pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ / //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
367b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des
367b6(khri brgyad): gzugs nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi
367b7(khri brgyad): sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des rnam par shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor
368a1(khri brgyad): mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des mig nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
368a2(khri brgyad): yid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des yid nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang
368a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gzugs rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri
368a4(khri brgyad): dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
368a5(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i
368a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang /
368a7(khri brgyad): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang
368b1(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de
368b2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par
368b3(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i
368b4(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
368b5(khri brgyad): ltar des lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
368b6(khri brgyad): pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
368b7(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyid yang dag
369a1(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
369a2(khri brgyad): ltar des kun 'byung ba'i bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de
369a3(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi
369a4(khri brgyad): sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lam gyi bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
369a5(khri brgyad): du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ma rig pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du rga shi'i bar dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi
369a6(khri brgyad): sbyor mi 'byed do/ /zhes de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des rga shi'i bar nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
369a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
369b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni/ gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba ni
369b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
369b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos gang
369b4(khri brgyad): yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du mig ni rna ba dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rna ba ni sna dang
369b5(khri brgyad): lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sna ni lce dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lce ni lus dang lhan
369b6(khri brgyad): cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lus ni yid dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
369b7(khri brgyad): ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams ni sgra dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du
370a1(khri brgyad): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sgra rnams ni dri dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /dri rnams
370a2(khri brgyad): ni ro dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /ro rnams ni reg pa dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi
370a3(khri brgyad): mthong ngo / /reg pa rnams ni chos rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
370a4(khri brgyad): kyi phyir chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su bstan pa de bzhin du khams rnams la'ang rgya
370a5(khri brgyad): cher sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /kun 'byung
370a6(khri brgyad): ba'i bden pa ni/ 'gog pa'i bden pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'gog pa'i bden pa ni/ lam gyi bden pa dang lhan cig tu
370a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par
370b1(khri brgyad): 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du rga shi'i bar du'ang sbyar ro/ /de
370b2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos gang yang chos dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa
370b3(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma
370b4(khri brgyad): yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs su mi byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor bar mi byed do/ /'du shes kyi
370b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes par mi byed do/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam
370b6(khri brgyad): par shes par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa
370b7(khri brgyad): de ni yid ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams
371a1(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
371a2(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa
371a3(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
371a4(khri brgyad): ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam
371a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam
371a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no/ /de bzhin du yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni yid
371a7(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ma yin no/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba'i
371b1(khri brgyad): bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni kun 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du 'gog pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du lam gyi bden
371b2(khri brgyad): pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lam ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang
371b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni rga shi'i bar du ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ gzugs
371b4(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan ma yin te/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid gzugs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan
371b5(khri brgyad): la| stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid rnam par shes
371b6(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de bzhin du mig kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ mig kyang gzhan ma yin te/ mig nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid mig go/
371b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ yid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ yid nyid stong
372a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid yid do/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ gzugs
372a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ gzugs rnams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid gzugs rnams so/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang
372a3(khri brgyad): gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ chos rnams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid chos rnams so/ /
372a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mig gi khams kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ mig gi khams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ mig gi khams nyid stong pa
372a5(khri brgyad): nyid do/ /stong pa nyid mig gi khams so/ /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
372a6(khri brgyad): la| yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
372a7(khri brgyad): so zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ 'phags
372b1(khri brgyad): pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa'ang gzhan la/
372b2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ ma rig pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ ma rig pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid ma rig pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga
372b3(khri brgyad): shi'i bar yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rga shi'i bar yang gzhan ma yin te/ rga shi nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid rga shi'o/ /
372b4(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de la ni 'grib pa med do/ /'phel ba med do/ /
372b5(khri brgyad): 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no/ /de la ni gzugs med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /'du shes med do/ /'du byed rnams med do/ /rnam par shes pa
372b6(khri brgyad): med do/ /de la ni mig med do/ /rna ba med do/ /sna med do/ /lce med do/ /lus med do/ /yid med do/ /gzugs rnams med do/ /sgra rnams med do/ /dri rnams med do/ /ro rnams
372b7(khri brgyad): med do/ /reg rnams med do/ /chos rnams med do/ /de la ni mig gi khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i khams
373a1(khri brgyad): med do/ /sgra'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /sna'i khams med do/ /dri'i khams med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
373a2(khri brgyad): khams med do/ /lce'i khams med do/ /ro'i khams med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi khams med do/ /reg bya'i khams med do/ /lus kyi rnam par
373a3(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams med do/ /yid kyi khams med do/ /chos kyi khams med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /de la ni sdug bsngal med do/ /kun 'byung ba med do//
373a4(khri brgyad): 'gog pa med do/ /lam med do/ /de la ni ma rig pa med do/ /ma rig pa 'gag pa med do/ /'du byed rnams med do/ /'du byed 'gag pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa med do/ /
373a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs med do/ /ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do/ /skye mched drug med do/ /skye mched drug 'gag pa med do/ /reg pa
373a6(khri brgyad): med do/ /reg pa 'gag pa med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /tshor ba 'gag pa med do/ /sred pa med do/ /sred pa 'gag pa med do/ /len pa med do/ /len pa 'gag pa med do/ /
373a7(khri brgyad): srid pa med do/ /srid pa 'gag pa med do/ /skye ba med do/ /skye ba 'gag pa med do/ /de la ni rga shi med do/ /rga shi 'gag pa med do/ /de la ni 'thob pa med do/ /mngon par
373b1(khri brgyad): rtogs pa med do/ /de la ni rgyun du zhugs pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba med do/ /
373b2(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /dgra bcom pa med do/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /rang byang chub med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /de la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
373b3(khri brgyad): rgyas med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes
373b4(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
373b5(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am/ mi
373b6(khri brgyad): brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson pa'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/
373b7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la brtson pa'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/
374a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson pa'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
374a2(khri brgyad): bar la brtson pa'am/ mi brtson par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
374a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni/ brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ni/ rnam
374a4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/ /de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang /
374a5(khri brgyad): sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag
374a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob pa de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi
374a7(khri brgyad): bskyed do/ /nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang ldan
374b1(khri brgyad): ba'i sems mi bskyed do/ /des 'dod chags kyi sems ma bskyed cing / de bzhin du lta ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i bar gyi sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye ste/ rtag tu
374b2(khri brgyad): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /
374b3(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
374b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang
374b5(khri brgyad): phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi 'dor bar rtag tu de ltar brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
374b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
374b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad zil gyis mnan nas gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
375a1(khri brgyad): po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
375a2(khri brgyad): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
375a3(khri brgyad): chen po rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni/ nam yang ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang /
375a4(khri brgyad): rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la
375a5(khri brgyad): gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong mngon
375a6(khri brgyad): par grags pa rab tu mang po dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
375a7(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
375b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog /pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa rab mchog /pha rol tu phyin pa
375b2(khri brgyad): bla na ma mchis pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa gong na ma mchis pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
375b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba dul ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa/ pha rol tu phyin
375b4(khri brgyad): pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rgyas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa mi rdzi ba nyid
375b5(khri brgyad): lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal ba/
375b6(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob pa/ mi
375b7(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thob pa rnams kyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i pha
376a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin par ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
376a2(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs dang / tshor
376a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi
376a4(khri brgyad): 'khor lo bskor ba lags so/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos
376a5(khri brgyad): brnyes par gyur lags so/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang /
376a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos brnyes par gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi
376a7(khri brgyad): 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu
376b1(khri brgyad): mchi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub
376b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shes ldan dag /rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /shes ldan dag /rigs kyi bu dag
376b3(khri brgyad): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes ldan dag /rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni
376b4(khri brgyad): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ rnal 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi
376b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no zhes de skad ces bka' stsal na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
376b6(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor de dag dang rtag tu ma bral bar gnas pa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes
377a1(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
377a2(khri brgyad): bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags
377a3(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun
377a4(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
377a5(khri brgyad): yid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams byang chub
377a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
377a7(khri brgyad): 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa'
377b1(khri brgyad): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
377b2(khri brgyad): pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i
377b3(khri brgyad): khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam
377b4(khri brgyad): du sems/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags
377b5(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol
377b6(khri brgyad): pa| btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang
377b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin
378a1(khri brgyad): snyam mam/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems
378a2(khri brgyad): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ de

380a5(khri brgyad): gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ 'di skad du gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/ gzugs las
380a6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems

380b1(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin zhes zer/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems can
380b2(khri brgyad): gtan mi dmigs na/ de byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
380b3(khri brgyad): du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi las byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la

384b1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/
384b2(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig zhi ba'i
384b3(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du
384b4(khri brgyad): sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
384b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/
384b6(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi dben pa'i
384b7(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig kun nas nyon
385a1(khri brgyad): mongs pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma
385a2(khri brgyad): lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla
385a3(khri brgyad): dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig skye ba'i tshig bla dwags
385a4(khri brgyad): sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna
385a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skye ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
385a6(khri brgyad): 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin
385a7(khri brgyad): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dngos po yod pa'i
385b1(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du
385b2(khri brgyad): sems/ gzugs rnams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
385b3(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam
385b4(khri brgyad): du sems/ gzugs rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags
385b5(khri brgyad): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa'
385b6(khri brgyad): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams bde ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i
385b7(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
386a1(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / chos rnams bde ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
386a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa'
386a3(khri brgyad): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams bdag yod
386a4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di

386b1(khri brgyad): yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di

386b3(khri brgyad): mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla
386b4(khri brgyad): dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang /

386b6(khri brgyad): so|| ||'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po lnga pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ ma
386b7(khri brgyad): zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sgra
387a1(khri brgyad): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol
387a2(khri brgyad): pa| btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub
387a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /

387b1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun
387b2(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig
387b3(khri brgyad): bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rnams dngos po

387b6(khri brgyad): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
387b7(khri brgyad): mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes
388a1(khri brgyad): pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/
388a2(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji
388a3(khri brgyad): snyam du sems| mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa'
388a4(khri brgyad): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag
388a5(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang /
388a6(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bde ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ sdug
388a7(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig
388b1(khri brgyad): gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags
388b2(khri brgyad): sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
388b3(khri brgyad): mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/
388b4(khri brgyad): mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams
388b5(khri brgyad): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dwags
388b6(khri brgyad): sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
388b7(khri brgyad): mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla
389a1(khri brgyad): dwags sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa
389a2(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
389a3(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/

389a5(khri brgyad): gyi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
389a6(khri brgyad): bu| 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
389a7(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
389b1(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par
389b2(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi skye ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi skye ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA
389b3(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
389b4(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA
389b5(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
389b6(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems
389b7(khri brgyad): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi bde
390a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /
390a2(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems
390a3(khri brgyad): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi
390a4(khri brgyad): stong pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji
390a5(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
390a6(khri brgyad): mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi smon pa yod pa'i
390a7(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags sam/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji
390b1(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa
390b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla
390b3(khri brgyad): dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i
390b4(khri brgyad): bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ rnam bar byang ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA
390b5(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi skye ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
390b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags
390b7(khri brgyad): sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
391a1(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'di skad du gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags
391a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs rtag
391a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla
391a4(khri brgyad): dwags dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ bdag yod
391a5(khri brgyad): pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ stong pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/
391a6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ ma zhi ba'i tshig bla
391a7(khri brgyad): dwags ma yin/ dben pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/
391b1(khri brgyad): skye ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa'i ma yin/ de bzhin
391b2(khri brgyad): du sbyar te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po mod pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma
391b3(khri brgyad): yin/ de bzhin du mig gi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de
391b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du mig rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags
391b5(khri brgyad): sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub
391b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
391b7(khri brgyad): gzugs rnams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs
392a1(khri brgyad): rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams
392a2(khri brgyad): rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / dngos po med
392a3(khri brgyad): pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / dngos po med pa'i
392a4(khri brgyad): tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa'
392a5(khri brgyad): ma yin/ de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par
392a6(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig
392a7(khri brgyad): bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags
392b1(khri brgyad): dang / dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / dngos po med pa'i bar
392b2(khri brgyad): gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma
392b3(khri brgyad): yin/ de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i
392b4(khri brgyad): bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du ma rig pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du
392b5(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/ mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags dang /
392b6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags kyi bar byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar du dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dwags dang / dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags
392b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/

396b3(khri brgyad): pa mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams

396b5(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par
396b6(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi khams dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi
396b7(khri brgyad): dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
397a1(khri brgyad): nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi khams kun nas nyon mongs
397a2(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi
397a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi khams skye zhes bgyi ba gtan
397a4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
397a5(khri brgyad): nas| yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi khams dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs
397a6(khri brgyad): lags na/ mig gi khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
397a7(khri brgyad): nas| yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa'i tshig bla
397b1(khri brgyad): dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs
397b2(khri brgyad): lags na/ ma rig pa mi rtag pa'i chig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma
397b3(khri brgyad): rig pa bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar
397b4(khri brgyad): bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
397b5(khri brgyad): ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags
397b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi
397b7(khri brgyad): dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa
398a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub
398a2(khri brgyad): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/
398a3(khri brgyad): ma rig pa ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig
398a4(khri brgyad): pa dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du
398a5(khri brgyad): sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dwags byang
398a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa skye zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs
398a7(khri brgyad): lags na/ ma rig pa 'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
398b1(khri brgyad): 'das/ ma rig pa dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i
398b2(khri brgyad): bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ste/ phung po'i skabs su ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ legs
398b3(khri brgyad): so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags mi dmigs/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs
398b4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags mi dmigs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa nas/ de bzhin du
398b5(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ rnam par shes pa'i dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags mi dmigs/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags mi dmigs shing / rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla
398b6(khri brgyad): dwags mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags mi dmigs par phung po'i skabs su ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
398b7(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dwags kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
399a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes de skad zer ba'ang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes
399a2(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos kyi
399a3(khri brgyad): dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
399a4(khri brgyad): ngo| |rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis kyang chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi
399a5(khri brgyad): mthong ngo / /chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
399a6(khri brgyad): ngo| |chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
399a7(khri brgyad): chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par
