428a2(khri brgyad): pa med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos rnams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du mig gi
428a3(khri brgyad): khams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la
428a4(khri brgyad): sems de chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sems de chags pa
428a5(khri brgyad): med pa nas/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la sems de chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
428a6(khri brgyad): bcu la sems de chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la sems de chags pa med pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
428a7(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang
428b1(khri brgyad): zag pa med cing khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin
428b2(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das
428b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs de'ang zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol
428b4(khri brgyad): pa| btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams sum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du tshor ba
428b5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/

428b7(khri brgyad): gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags
429a1(khri brgyad): sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
429a2(khri brgyad): kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
429a3(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de
429a4(khri brgyad): bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi khams kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa
429a5(khri brgyad): lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma
429a6(khri brgyad): gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du
429a7(khri brgyad): zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar du'ang
429b1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyi sa stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/

429b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags
429b4(khri brgyad): sam| bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi
429b5(khri brgyad): slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong
429b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi slad du zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byis pa
429b7(khri brgyad): so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
430a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyang
430a2(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
430a3(khri brgyad): pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mig kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing
430a4(khri brgyad): khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams kyang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin
430a5(khri brgyad): pa nas| yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams kyang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa
430a6(khri brgyad): nas| chos kyi khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas/ 'phags
430a7(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin pa nas
430b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khams gsum du gtogs pa ma yin no/ /de skad
430b2(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces sems ma yin pa'i phyir/
430b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems de la chags pa med do zhes bka' stsal na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ma mchis pa'ang gzugs ma mchis pa la chags
430b4(khri brgyad): pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma mchis pa'ang rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis pa lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan
430b5(khri brgyad): 'das| mig ma mchis pa'ang mig ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du ma mchis pa'ang yid ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis
430b6(khri brgyad): lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs rnams ma mchis pa gzugs rnams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du chos rnams ma mchis
430b7(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dag chos rnams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi khams ma mchis pa mig gi khams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma
431a1(khri brgyad): mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma mchis pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis
431a2(khri brgyad): pa la chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis lags
431a3(khri brgyad): sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du ma mchis pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis
431a4(khri brgyad): lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis pa la chags pa ma mchis
431a5(khri brgyad): lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma mchis pa rnams la chags pa ma
431a6(khri brgyad): mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs med pa la chags pa med do/ /rnam par
431a7(khri brgyad): shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ba nas/ de bzhin du mig nas/ yid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams nas/ chos rnams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin
431b1(khri brgyad): du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams nas chos kyi khams kyi bar du'ang
431b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
431b3(khri brgyad): bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med pa'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med pa la chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar
431b4(khri brgyad): te| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang chags pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
431b5(khri brgyad): pa la spyad pa ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su
431b6(khri brgyad): mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ mi dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
431b7(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas nyan thos
432a1(khri brgyad): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la mi 'jug pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni
432a2(khri brgyad): gang lags/ skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa
432a3(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngar nges par ltung bar gyur la/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung zhing byang chub sems
432a4(khri brgyad): dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di
432a5(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngar nges par ltung ba'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
432a6(khri brgyad): pa| shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/ thabs la mi mkhas pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
432a7(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la brten nas/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
432b1(khri brgyad): skyon med pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngar nges par ltung ba'i skyon yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang
432b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skyon zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos la sred pa ste skyon yin
432b3(khri brgyad): no| |gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ chos la sred pa'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
432b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
432b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
432b6(khri brgyad): chen po'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/
432b7(khri brgyad): gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing / kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag
433a1(khri brgyad): med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bya bar
433a2(khri brgyad): gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la
433a3(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs
433a4(khri brgyad): nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bya bar
433a5(khri brgyad): gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la rnam par byang zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon
433a6(khri brgyad): par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam
433a7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun
433b1(khri brgyad): tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub
433b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas
433b3(khri brgyad): pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang mi 'jug pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
433b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ thabs la mi mkhas pas mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par byed cing
433b5(khri brgyad): kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du
433b6(khri brgyad): mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la bdag med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la stong zhes bya bar gnas
433b7(khri brgyad): par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la mtshan ma med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de
434a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la smon pa med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos
434a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar la zhi zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la dben zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun
434a3(khri brgyad): tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la rnam par byang zhes bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin
434a4(khri brgyad): du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la skye ba med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig nas chos rnams kyi bar la 'gag pa med ces
434a5(khri brgyad): bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / de bzhin du mig la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa dang / chos
434a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar la dngos po med ces bya bar gnas par byed cing kun tu shes la mngon par zhen pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su
434a7(khri brgyad): mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing /
434b1(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
434b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mi mkhas pas khams rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
434b3(khri brgyad): bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar phung po dag gi skabs su sbyar ba bzhin
434b4(khri brgyad): thams cad du rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas sngar nges par ltung ba yin zhing / nyan thos dang / rang
434b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar rab tu ltung ba la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang mi 'jug pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon
434b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa gang lags zhes gang smras pa'ang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar bslab par
434b7(khri brgyad): bya ste| ci nas gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi bya/ mig gis rlom sems su mi bya/ de
435a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ gzugs rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri
435a2(khri brgyad): dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ mig gi khams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ gzugs kyi khams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ mig gi rnam par shes
435a3(khri brgyad): pa'i khams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis rlom sems su mi bya/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis rlom sems su
435a4(khri brgyad): mi bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
435a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
435a6(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
435a7(khri brgyad): pa'i bar gyis rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlom sems su mi bya/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
435b1(khri brgyad): gyis rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ byang chub kyi sems/ mi mnyam pa dang
435b2(khri brgyad): mnyam pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ rgya chen po'i sems de nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid
435b3(khri brgyad): kyi phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems kyi rang bzhin
435b4(khri brgyad): 'od gsal ba nyid gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems gang
435b5(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
435b6(khri brgyad): zhing / de bzhin du kun nas ldang ba rnams dang / kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang / bag la nyal rnams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa dang / de bzhin du lta ba'i kun tu
435b7(khri brgyad): sbyor ba thams cad dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pa 'di ni/
436a1(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe
436a2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci sems ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa de mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
436a3(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems kyi sems nyid gang yin pa de la ci yod pa nyid dam/ med pa nyid dam/ bdog pa'am/ mi bdog pa'am/ dmigs pa nyid dmigs su yod
436a4(khri brgyad): dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te sems kyi sems nyid gang la yod pa nyid dam/ med
436a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid med cing mi dmigs na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus gang 'di skad ces smras te/ sems ma lags pa'i sems de mchis lags sam zhes brgal zhing brtag pa 'di cig rigs
436a6(khri brgyad): sam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems kyi sems nyid de
436a7(khri brgyad): gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi sems nyid ces bya'o/ /de skad ces
436b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems de kho na 'gyur ba ma mchis shing rnam par
436b2(khri brgyad): rtog pa ma mchis la/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de kho na 'gyur ba ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa lags sam/
436b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'du byed thams cad kyi bar dag kyang 'gyur ba ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa lags sam/ de ltar gyur na ni byang chub kyi bar du'ang 'gyur ba ma mchis
436b4(khri brgyad): shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ gang gi sems de ltar 'gyur ba med cing rnam par
436b5(khri brgyad): rtog pa med pa nas/ 'du byed thams cad kyi bar dag dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang de la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad
436b6(khri brgyad): la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa
436b7(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yin no/ /bzhi gang
437a1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la
437a2(khri brgyad): brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'ang mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin du
437a3(khri brgyad): rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes
437a4(khri brgyad): su lta zhing gnas la/ lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'ang mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten
437a5(khri brgyad): la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ lus la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'ang mi bskyed pa dang /
437a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi tshor ba rnams
437a7(khri brgyad): dang / phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ tshor ba la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'ang mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin du rtun pa
437b1(khri brgyad): shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi sems rnams dang / phyi'i sems rnams
437b2(khri brgyad): dang / phyi nang gi sems rnams la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ sems la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'ang mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan
437b3(khri brgyad): pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos
437b4(khri brgyad): kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas la/ chos la brten pa'i rnam par rig pa'ang mi bskyed pa'o// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i
437b5(khri brgyad): bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod na'ang spyod par
437b6(khri brgyad): rab tu shes so/ /'greng na'ang bdag 'greng bar rab tu shes so/ /'dug na'ang bdag 'dug par rab tu shes so/ /nyal na'ang bdag nyal bar rab tu shes so/ /de'i lus ji lta ji
437b7(khri brgyad): lta bur gnas par gyur pa de lta de lta bur rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la
438a1(khri brgyad): brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
438a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro'am/ ldog kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ kun tu lta'am/ rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang /
438a3(khri brgyad): snam sbyar dang / ras yug chen dang / lhung bzed thogs pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / 'cha' ba dang / myang ba dang / gnyid bsad pa dang / ngal bso ba dang / 'ong ba dang /
438a4(khri brgyad): 'gro ba'am/ 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / mi nyal ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang ldang na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa
438a5(khri brgyad): yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de'ang
438a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na drin bzhin du dbugs rngub cing / dran bzhin du dbugs
438a7(khri brgyad): 'byin te/ des dbugs ring du brngubs na'ang dbugs ring du brngubs pa dang / dbugs ring du phyung na'ang dbugs ring du phyung bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung du brngubs
438b1(khri brgyad): na'ang dbugs thung du brngubs par rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung du phyung na'ang dbugs thung du phyung bar rab tu shes so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ rdza mkhan nam/ rdza mkhan gyi
438b2(khri brgyad): slob ma mkhas pas 'phang lo bskor ba ni/ ring du srub na'ang ring du srub par rab tu shes so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dran bzhin
438b3(khri brgyad): du dbugs rngub cing / dran bzhin du dbugs 'byin te/ des dbugs ring du brngubs na'ang dbugs ring du brngubs par rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du phyung na'ang dbugs ring du
438b4(khri brgyad): phyung bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung du brngubs na'ang dbugs thung du brngubs par rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung du phyung na'ang dbugs thung du phyung bar rab tu shes so/ /shA ra dwa
438b5(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba
438b6(khri brgyad): rnam par bsal nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus 'di nyid la khams kyis so
438b7(khri brgyad): sor rtog par byed de/ lus 'di la ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams yod do snyam du rtog go /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ba lang gsod pa la
439a1(khri brgyad): mkhas pa'am/ ba lang gsod pa'i slob ma mkhas pas mtshon rnon pos ba lang bsad nas/ bag bzhir bshags te gzug bzhir phye nas 'greng ngam
439a2(khri brgyad): 'dug ste/ so sor rtog pa de bzhin du/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang lus 'di nyid la khams kyis
439a3(khri brgyad): so sor rtog par byed de/ lus 'di la ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams yod do snyam du rtog ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems
439a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa yin te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /shA
439a5(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang mgo bo man chad mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang
439a6(khri brgyad): ste| lus 'di la ni skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / pags shun dang / sha dang / rgyus pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mtsher ba
439a7(khri brgyad): dang / glo ba dang / mchin pa dang / sul mangs dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / gzhang dang / lgang pa dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rngul dang / tshil dang / mchil ma dang / snabs
439b1(khri brgyad): dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / dri ma dang / gcin dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dag yod do snyam du so sor rtog ste/
439b2(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ khyim bdag zhing pa'i sbyang 'bru'i rnam pa sna tshogs/ 'di lta ste/ til dang / 'bras thug po che dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran na gu dang / nas dang /
439b3(khri brgyad): gro dang / sran chung dang / 'bras sA lu dang / 'bru dang / yungs 'bru dag gis gang ba sgo drung gnyis su bzhag pa la skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di dag ni til yin no/ /
439b4(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni 'bras thug po che yin no/ /'di dag ni mon sran sde'u yin no/ /'di dag ni mon sran na gu yin no/ /'di dag ni nas yin no/ /'di dag ni gro yin no/ /'di dag
439b5(khri brgyad): ni sran chung yin no/ /'di dag ni 'bras sA lu yin no/ /'di dag ni 'bru yin no/ /'di dag ni yungs kar yin no snyam du shes so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
439b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang mgo man chad mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/ lus 'di la ni skra dang / spu dang / de bzhin du
439b7(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ klad pa dang / klad rgyas kyi bar dag yod do snyam du so sor rtog go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan
440a1(khri brgyad): pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du
440a2(khri brgyad): ste| shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon med pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
440a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub
440a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dag ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag
440a5(khri brgyad): par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu
440a6(khri brgyad): 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /
440a7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / mi brjed pa dang / rgyas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus
440b1(khri brgyad): rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog la/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon
440b2(khri brgyad): med pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ra dwa
440b3(khri brgyad): ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral
440b4(khri brgyad): ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang / de bzhin du sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
440b5(khri brgyad): rkang pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
440b6(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas par rnam pa spong bas/ yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom ste de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
440b7(khri brgyad): tshul du ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
441a1(khri brgyad): skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang
441a2(khri brgyad): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon
441a3(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
441a4(khri brgyad): dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so/ /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/ shA
441a5(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med
441a6(khri brgyad): pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no/ /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi
441a7(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting
441b1(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag de'ang dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod
441b2(khri brgyad): chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spang bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang / de bzhin du chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
441b3(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bden pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba
441b4(khri brgyad): la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems
441b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam
441b6(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag
441b7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyid ni brgyad pa yin te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni
442a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
442a2(khri brgyad): po'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par shes pa la 'jug pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam
442a3(khri brgyad): par mi rtog cing bsam gtan gyi bde ba la ro myang ba med par bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye bar bzod pa la 'jug pas tshad med pa bzhi
442a4(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khams gsum dmigs su med par shes pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems dang / yid
442a5(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par thar ba brgyad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su med par mthong bas mthar
442a6(khri brgyad): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dran pa
442a7(khri brgyad): med cing yid pa byed pa med par rjes su dran pa bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes drug la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
442b1(khri brgyad): shes pa dang mi shes pa'i chos mnyam pas shes pa bcu la 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag par rtogs nas gsum la snyoms par
442b2(khri brgyad): 'jug pa dang / dus gsum dang bral ba'i shes pas dbang po gsum bsgom pa dang / tshul gcig cing tha dad par mi byed pa'i shes pa la 'jug pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
442b3(khri brgyad): mched rnams bsgom pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa la 'jug pas zad par gyi skye mched rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par 'jug
442b4(khri brgyad): pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
442b5(khri brgyad): skyon med pa ni gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid mi mthong / nang stong pa nyid dang
442b6(khri brgyad): phyi stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la nang dang phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid mi mthong / chen po
442b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi mthong / 'dus
443a1(khri brgyad): ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi mthong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi
443a2(khri brgyad): mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid mi mthong / rang bzhin gyis stong pa
443a3(khri brgyad): nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa
443a4(khri brgyad): nyid mi mthong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
443a5(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang
443a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan gyi
443a7(khri brgyad): dring la mi 'jog cing gzhan la bstan pa shes pa la 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o//
443b1(khri brgyad): bdag dang gzhan la rlom sems med pa la lhag par 'jug pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /nyan thos
443b2(khri brgyad): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i shes pas de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
443b3(khri brgyad): tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /sems can dang sems can med pas byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /bdag med pas snying rje
443b4(khri brgyad): chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /rig pa gnyis kyi bsam pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs
443b5(khri brgyad): par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la 'jug pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
443b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / khro ba dang /
443b7(khri brgyad): le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems rnams dngos po med par mthong bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi
444a1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med ces bya bar mos nas mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
444a2(khri brgyad): byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
444a3(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med ces bya bar mthong nas/ mig lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /chos
444a4(khri brgyad): thams cad mi gnas pa'o zhes bya bar mos nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o/ /de skad
444a5(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
444a6(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar na byang chub kyi lam du mchi zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la'ang 'jug la/ sus kyang thul bar rngo mi
444a7(khri brgyad): thogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
444b1(khri brgyad): pa| gzugs kyi phung por rlom sems su mi byed cing / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed cing /
444b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du yid kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/ chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin
444b3(khri brgyad): du mig gi khams su rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/ de bzhin du
444b4(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ yid kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed/ chos kyi khams kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/ 'phags
444b5(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems
444b6(khri brgyad): su mi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
444b7(khri brgyad): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/ dgra
445a1(khri brgyad): bcom pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du rang byang chub tu rlom sems su mi byed/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
445a2(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel ba na/ byang chub kyi lam du
445a3(khri brgyad): 'gro zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang 'jug la/ sus kyang thul bar mi nus pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
445a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ shes pa gang dang ldan na nam yang ngan song rnams su rab tu mi ltung
445a5(khri brgyad): zhing mi rnams kyi nang du nyams par mi 'gyur la/ dbul por ma yin pa dang / lus gang dang ldan na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis smad par 'gyur ba'i lus de lta
445a6(khri brgyad): bu yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
445a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang ldan na/ nam yang ngan song rnams su mi ltung ba dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis smad par mi
445b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i shes pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang ldan na/ shar phyogs kyi
445b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong zhing de dag
445b3(khri brgyad): las chos kyang nyan la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
445b4(khri brgyad): tan bkod pa dag kyang mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas su 'du shes mi 'jug /byang chub sems dpar
445b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes mi 'jug / nyan thos su 'du shes mi 'jug /rang sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa ma yin/ bdag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/ bdag med par 'du shes pa ma yin/
445b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du shes pa ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa gang dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod la/ sbyin
445b7(khri brgyad): pa de'ang mi dmigs pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa dang / shes pa gang dang ldan na/ dran pa nye bar
446a1(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs
446a2(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa gang dang ldan na/ chos thams
446a3(khri brgyad): cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ chos de dag tu'ang rlom sems su mi byed pa'i shes pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
446a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pas lus
446a5(khri brgyad): kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dag gi skabs dbye bar mi bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
446a6(khri brgyad): la che dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang
446a7(khri brgyad): bcas pa gang lags/ ngag gi las gang lags/ yid kyi las gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
446b1(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di snyam du sems te/ lus gang gis bdag lus la dmigs par
446b2(khri brgyad): bya'o snyam pa'i lus de 'di yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin du ngag de 'di yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin du yid de 'di yin no snyam pa dang / yid gang gis bdag yid la dmigs
446b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o snyam pa'i yid de 'di yin no snyam pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
446b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ lus kyang mi dmigs pa yin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
446b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ lus dmigs la lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid gang gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par byed cing / 'chal ba'i tshul
446b6(khri brgyad): khrims kyi sems sam/ 'khrug pa'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam/ rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems sam/ 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems bskyed na/ shA ra dwa ti'i
446b7(khri brgyad): bu| de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
447a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed na/
447a2(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
447a3(khri brgyad): la yang dag par 'jug pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom
447a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ de bzhin du ji ltar na ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len
447a5(khri brgyad): sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ ngag dang yid mi
447a6(khri brgyad): dmigs shing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag
447a7(khri brgyad): par blangs nas gnas la/ nam yang nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed cing / sems can thams cad la'ang rtag pa kho nar snying rje chen po skyed
447b1(khri brgyad): par byed pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag par nga smra'o/ /de bzhin du ngag dang yid
447b2(khri brgyad): kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag par nga smra'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi
447b3(khri brgyad): lam sbyong bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la'ang 'jug pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ skyon med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la gnas na byang chub
447b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug cing / nyi tshe ba'i theg pas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa de gang lags/ de
447b5(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
447b6(khri brgyad): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nyi tshe ba'i sems
448a1(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims mi srung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
448a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab mi bsgom gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
448a3(khri brgyad): spyod pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa nas/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi
448a4(khri brgyad): ched du shes rab sgom par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
448a5(khri brgyad): su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
448a6(khri brgyad): la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o snyam du sems can ris su chad pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /go cha chen po gyon par mi byed kyi/ sems can
448a7(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi ched du go cha chen po gyon par byed cing / de 'di snyam du'ang sems te/ bdag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems
448b1(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin du
448b2(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag nyid kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
448b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyar bar bya'o snyam pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tsam gyis
448b4(khri brgyad): na go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sbyin pa gang sbyin pa de thams
448b5(khri brgyad): cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin zhing / de'ang sems can thams cad dang lhan cig thun mong du byas nas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa
448b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
448b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa
449a1(khri brgyad): sbyin zhing / de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yid la mi byed par sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang
449a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
449a3(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin zhing / sems can thams cad dang thun
449a4(khri brgyad): mong du byed la/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang / yid ches pa 'di dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de
449a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bar gyi brtson 'grus kyi brtson pa mi gtong zhing mi 'dor la/ rab tu 'dzin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa
449a6(khri brgyad): gang sbyin pa na/ sems can thams cad yid la byas nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go skabs mi 'byed par 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems
449a7(khri brgyad): rtse gcig pa nyid 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i
449b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / des sbyin par byed par yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'ang ma yin/ len par byed pa'ang ma yin la/ sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub
449b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
449b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing dmigs par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/
449b4(khri brgyad): /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
449b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang
449b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
449b7(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dod pa
450a1(khri brgyad): med pa nyid yin na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
450a2(khri brgyad): pa'o| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang / mngon
450a3(khri brgyad): par yid ches pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
450a4(khri brgyad): bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la brtson pa mi gtong zhing mi 'dor ba dang / rab tu 'dzin pa
450a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
450a6(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis snying rje chen po sngon
450a7(khri brgyad): du 'gro ba'i sems dang ma bral bar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi go skabs kyang mi 'byed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sems dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos
450b1(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
450b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang chos thams cad la sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / rang bzhin gyis
450b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
450b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/
450b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su zin pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
450b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
450b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang
451a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ bsam
451a2(khri brgyad): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing mi 'phrogs pa 'di ni/ byang chub
451a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
451a4(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
451a5(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing dben par mthong ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong bas nyan thos kyis 'am
451a6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang 'jug la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon pa 'di'ang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi pha
451a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go
451b1(khri brgyad): cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la ni/ shar phyogs nas phyogs mtshams kyi
451b2(khri brgyad): bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig
451b3(khri brgyad): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di go cha chen po bgos te/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ rdzu
451b4(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyis kyang rnam par 'phrul lo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par mdzad cing / snyan pa sgrogs la dbyangs brjod par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
451b5(khri brgyad): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang gis de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhon
451b6(khri brgyad): pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang
451b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
452a1(khri brgyad): pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang /
452a2(khri brgyad): dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyun gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam
452a3(khri brgyad): gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de btang snyoms pa dran pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes brjod
452a4(khri brgyad): pa dag ste/ dga' ba med pa bde ba la gnas pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bde ba'ang spangs te snga nas yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub
452a5(khri brgyad): pas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du byams pa dang
452a6(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ kho na med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
452a7(khri brgyad): pas phyogs gcig khyab par byas te/ mos nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du phyogs bzhi pa dang / de
452b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du 'og dang / steng dang / thad kar thams cad kyi thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te/ mos nas
452b2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du thams cad
452b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la khyab par byas te/ mos pa'i bar du bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ tshad med pa bzhi bsam gtan dang ldan pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
452b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po rab mchog yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan de dag nyid tshad med pa'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang /
452b5(khri brgyad): mtshan ma dag gis snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba de dag snyoms par 'jig cing ldang ba na/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
452b6(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di'ang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
452b7(khri brgyad): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
453a1(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan dag la tshul bzhin du brjod cing ston te/ rab tu 'chad la/ rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed cing de dag gi
453a2(khri brgyad): ro myang pa'i nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba'ang ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad
453a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis bsam gtan dang po de dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du gnon cing bsgom ste/ bsam gtan de dag la gnas shing
453a4(khri brgyad): sems bskyed pa gzhan 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
453a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
453a6(khri brgyad): byed pa de dag dang ma bral bar 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la chos
453a7(khri brgyad): bstan par bya'o snyam nas/ de yid la byed pa de dag la bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
453b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
453b2(khri brgyad): p a'i yid la byed pa dag gis rang gis byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rtag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
453b3(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo la/ de brtson pa mi gtong zhing mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
453b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis bsam gtan dang / ting nge
453b5(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub
453b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
453b7(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa na/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /
454a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog kyang
454a2(khri brgyad): snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pas nyan thos kyi skyon med pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la'ang mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
454a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
454a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar
454a5(khri brgyad): du'ang de bzhin no/ /rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang / rnam pa
454a6(khri brgyad): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
454a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis
454b1(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de dag la phan pa'i sems nyid du gtod par byed do/ /snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag la snying brtse ba'i sems
454b2(khri brgyad): nyid du gtod par byed do/ /dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su 'grol bar bya'o zhes de'ang sems can thams cad la gtod
454b3(khri brgyad): par byed do/ /btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can thams cad zag pa zad par gyur cig ces bsgom zhing de'ang de dag la gtod par byed pa 'di ni/ shA
454b4(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
454b5(khri brgyad): gang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa de dag nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag gis snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang rnam pa thams
454b6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /
454b7(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa dag la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
455a1(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag dang ma 'dres par gnas te/ sa
455a2(khri brgyad): gnyis po de dag dang / nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa mi bskyed kyi/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod pa dang / 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems
455a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa dag la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
455a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong bar gnas
455a5(khri brgyad): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa dag la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
455a6(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan de dag nyid dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag nyid la snyoms par
455a7(khri brgyad): 'jug cing ldang yang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ba 'di ni/ byang
455b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas pa'i thabs la mkhas pa las byung
455b2(khri brgyad): ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang /
455b3(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par yang 'jug cing ldang yang de dag kyang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam
455b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog kyang de dag gis nyan thos kyi skyon
455b5(khri brgyad): med pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
455b6(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
455b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i theg pa chen
456a1(khri brgyad): po yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong
456a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
456a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni chos thams cad la rnam par g.yengs so snyam pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'o snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa
456a4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag go snyam pa dang / mi rtag go snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa
456a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ bde'o snyam pa dang / sdug bsngal lo snyam pa dang / bdag yod do snyam pa dang / bdag med do snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ de'ang
456a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/ / //
